We were free to help ourselves to anything in the apartment. There were always fresh towels in the bathroom. Sean works from home and was so quiet that a lot of times we didn't even know he was home! Everything was clean and clutter free but there was a level of dust/grime that was a bit more than what I'm used to seeing at other airbnbs. There was an interesting smell to the apartment upon first entering that I can only describe as a boy's college dorm when he finds out his parents are stopping in for a surprise visit but we eventually went noseblind to it. There was one evening where we arrived back to the Airbnb at about the same time as Sean and he had been out with friends. He was drunk (which was fine because hosts are more than allowed to have lives outside of  hosting!) But I'm relatively introverted and not interested in drinking so I felt uncomfortable when he was very chatty and throughout our conversation began repeatedly asking if we wanted a drink (from the fridge) and then later if we would want go out to the bar. We said no but he kept insisting. He did eventually stop asking. I don't think there was any ill-will in his asking -- I think he was just trying to be friendly and hospitable.  Overall, our stay with Sean was a positive one. Personally, I wouldn't stay again because I like to keep to myself. But Sean's place is perfect for any extrovert who loves a good night out and is looking to meet new people.

author: Ryan
comments: This is a great space, in a perfect location of Toronto from a wonderful and friendly host. Sean has thought of everything, his apartment is very well equipped and you couldn't ask for a more welcoming individual to stay with. There's a reason he has such high reviews, don't hesitate to stay here, you won't regret it!

author: Andrea
comments: It was amazing! Check in was super easy and same with check out. The place was cozy and super cute. It was in a perfect spot in town too♡ I will definitely be staying here again! Thank you SO much for everything! I highly recommend

author: Micky
comments: We loved this apartment. Thank you Mila. Perfect city location. Enjoy.

author: Xiaoman
comments: Amazing location!!!! Walking distance to many attractions. Great view! Loved our stay!

author: Alexis
comments: So we planned this trip for a relaxing anniversary getaway. When we got there from the time it took us to figure out where to park/ the time it took to figure out how to get the fob, park and THEN find the right building where our room was located, about an hour had passed. When we finally got into our room our first impression was that the place looked tidy. When we went into the bedroom we put our things on the bed and noticed about 10-15 hairs and even worse... nail clippings. Literally gagging. We looked around some more and noticed the chair in the bedroom was covered in stains, there was a face and hand print against the window of the bedroom, the kitchen towel had food crusted on it still and the couch was covered in what I’m assuming was dog hair. I messaged the host asking her if she had seen the condo after the cleaning and prior to our arrival and I got no response for hours until I messaged her again complaining of the uncleanliness. She was understanding and was upset the cleaning lady didn’t do a good job but made no effort on her own to fix anything. When we got there after traveling 4 hours, we were forced to do laundry which took us longer to even figure out. Long story short we ended up having to sleep on the bed with just a sheet. We went there expecting to be able to enjoy the whole day and instead had to do chores in a place that should have been cleaned prior. She was understanding but only offered to compensate me with a $33 cleaning fee. I feel like our whole experience was ruined because we were so grossed out with the space. We couldn’t even shower because it was not cleaned either. Overall I’m disappointed she didn’t go there to finish the laundry and make things right when she lived in the same building. I read that this place was dirty from a couple people and I wish I had listened !

author: Briant
comments: Super  clean!!

author: Josh
comments: Very nice, the location and condo were excellent. I would book again if i needed to stay in the area.

author: Steven
comments: Great location, great price. We will stay here again

author: Amanda
comments: Comfortable and convient location.  Will recommend.

author: Brock
comments: Clean place, great location, answered questions fast

author: Carolyn
comments: Great place to stay

author: Melissa
comments: This place is amazing. It's beautiful and clean. I felt very safe and it is in a great location. Mila was an excellent host and answered all of my questions very quickly. Would highly recommend!

author: Tiffany
comments: Immaculately clean, spacious apartment. The hosts were very kind and professional.

author: Sheridan
comments: Wonderful home and the owners are sweet folk. In a very calm quiet neighborhood.

author: Andrew
comments: Clean space. Host was super timely in replying to us. Free parking and swimming pool is a plus

author: Delores
comments: Great place, I would definitely come back and recommend this place to my friends.

author: Lisa
comments: This was my first time with AirBNB and if this is the quality of AirBNB I will never stay in a hotel again. Thank you Paul and Lena

author: Eva
comments: This was a great spot to stay during our visit to Toronto. We drove out there from Chicago and Lina was great at keeping in touch. She also made checking in super easy and gave us helpful information. The appartment is cozy, you have everything you need and it was a 30 min drive (more or less depending on traffic) to the entertainment district. It's also close to other attractions and grocery stores if you cook (we loved metro, it's similar to a Mariano's). Overall, we had a great experience.

author: Jim
comments: Best Airbnb experience I've ever had. I had to change my check in time and Lina was very accommodating. After a complete tour of the apartment and beautiful grounds, Lina shared great insider tips to navigate the city. They complied a binder with all the needed information as well as addresses to local restaurants, shopping, and bars.  Lina and Paul are definitely super hosts!! Additionally, their place was spotless and very modern. I would highly recommend. Next time I'm in Toronto I will definitely schedule around their availability. They were really nice and very helpful. Bonus for use of the swimming pool  We had a wonderful time. Thank you for sharing your home with us.

author: Renee
comments: Our stay with Lina and Paul was wonderful! We were greeted in our arrival. The apartment was exceptionally clean, and the bed was very comfortable! The landscaping was gorgeous! It was plenty of space for the 2 of us. Thank you!

author: Jonathan
comments: very nice place. very friendly

author: Vasek
comments: Good location for Toronto discovery, quiet and clean place.

author: Ming
comments: Great view and location

author: Paul
comments: Thanks for the stay - it was great!

author: Erin
comments: This place is the perfect spot for a quick getaway to Toronto. We stayed for one night before flying out of the Toronto Pearson Airport and wanted to get a feel for Toronto. This is a good location and you can get a quick 8 minute Uber to pretty much anywhere you would want to go downtown. It was also great for the free overnight parking. I wish we had more time to explore the surrounding area!

author: Samantha
comments: Charles was very nice host. He always answer me back on time and accommodate all my needs. The apartment was nice. And the location very good as well. Thank you for having us

author: Gail
comments: Charles place was just great.  Beautiful view and convenient to downtown Toronto.

author: McKenzie
comments: This place was such a gem! The space was so amazing and will def come back next time !!

author: Jacob
comments: Super accommodating and very friendly!

author: Jesse
comments: Good host and generally walking distance to downtown.

author: Lucy
comments: Charles was a great host! Very friendly and quick to respond. Checking in was easy, and the apartment itself was very clean and cozy. We really enjoyed our stay!

author: Debbie
comments: I enjoyed my stay in this well-located apartment with its beautiful view. Charles was flexible, responsive, and attentive to detail.

author: Tabby
comments: Great spot, easy check in, and a good location. The shower valve is a teensy bit broken though.

author: Mike
comments: Great spot! The location was perfect and the bonus was the giant bathroom/tub. definitely would stay again

author: Suresh
comments: Expired Tea bag and 1 towel

author: John
comments: Ok place

author: Stephen
comments: The area is by a lot of good things to checkout. But it’s also near an area which I didn’t feel too safe walking around alone at night. I also wish they would’ve let me control the temperature and would have provided more than 1 roll of toilet paper.

author: Polly
comments: Unit was clean and comfortable and as presented in the listing.  As others have mentioned towel amenities are still sparse.  Easy access to metro and possible to walk to dining/shopping. As in many cities a ride share or taxi at night is suggested.  Check in/out was simple and communications with hosts were prompt and courteous.   Value was good for busy tourist season...We would stay again if looking in this area.

author: Chardonnay
comments: The location is great! We were within a fair walking distance to a lot of restaurants and shopping. The place was clean and comfortable. The only thing that made the stay a little awkward was each guest was only give one bath towel. There were no hand towels or wash cloths so there was no way to wash your face and body. There was also no paper towels, napkins or ice available. The ice maker on the fridge did not work and there was no ice tray. Overall it was worth the cost and we were satisfied.

author: Holly
comments: Great location, parking lot is directly across the street!  Place was extremely clean, well laid out and we exactly what we needed.  We only had one misunderstanding and that was on our part and the hosts we're extremely accommodating!

author: Elizabeth
comments: Very nicely laid out space.  Bathtub is superb and an unexpected amenity.   Fabulous location.   Check in and set up of lockbox worked well.   So appreciated quick responses and advice about the area

author: William
comments: Great

author: Karyn
comments: An excellent value for your next stay in Toronto! Great host. Quiet, private, comfortable.

author: Chris
comments: The value for this spot is incredible. Great location and has all of the basic things you would need. Would definitely recommend

author: Diego Fernando
comments: What a great place! Will def come back in the future!

author: Leo
comments: Max was a very warm and welcoming host. His place was clean, organized and served the needs of a 1 person stay for 3 days. Check-in/Check-out was extremely simple and would definitely stay with him again.

author: Simon
comments: I had a very comfortable and relaxing five-night stay at Max’s apartment while in town for a conference. Located right by the charming Cabbagetown neighborhood, with inexpensive shops, bars, cafes, and restaurants, Max’s place was very nice to retreat to after long days of conferencing. The room was very clean, quiet, and comfortable, and though the bathroom and kitchen are shared with other guests, I never had any problems with noise or conflicting schedules. It felt as if I had the apartment to myself! Max is a very gracious and available host, always to be reached for questions or concerns. I highly recommend!

author: Eleanor
comments: Lots of convenient stuff near by and a really clean space. Max is very nice and quick to respond, ready with answers about how to get around the city and many other things.  Check in was smooth and comprehensive.

author: Ruichuan
comments: Clean, private room. And nice host.

author: Stephanie
comments: I would recommend taking the buses & trains in the area to become familiar with Max’s place. The room was neat and clean. I would be out all day exploring the city and calmly unwind at the end of the day.

author: Carol
comments: If i have chance, i would like to book it again. Highly recommend it!

author: Annie
comments: Great location next to cabbage town, Max was helpful and friendly with plenty of local tips and checkin was a breeze. Clean room, no frills no fuss and great value. Thanks for the stay!

author: Geneadel
comments: Shared space with adequate bathrooms, clean with some shower toiletries in case you forgot your own. Good location.

author: William
comments: Quite clean, convenient checkin and easy to find! It was private and comfortable.

author: Aleigha
comments: Very clean. Very peaceful. Not a good place to stay if you're looking to hang out at the airbnb. Must be quiet at all times.

author: Remington
comments: Good stay. Great value for location.

author: Vitalii
comments: Decent stay for that money.

author: Matthew
comments: The WiFi did not work, coming from the US I could not use my cellular data and therefore, could not access the internet the entire stay.  The "free" parking is also a joke.  6+ cars need to fight for 2 spots.  Good luck.  I will never stay here again.

author: Peter
comments: If you are looking for a basic room to spend the night, this is the one. I will most likely book this room again.

author: Lauren
comments:
The room and house was great, clean stylish modern. This is not a typical house situation as it is a house but run more like a hostel. The owner does not stay there, it’s only guests. That said we read the reviews and knew exactly what to expect upon arrival. 

The room was as shown, although the room on the recons floor was quite hot and the bed was very uncomfortable. We were also warned via the standard email to guests that you could “only whisper” inside the house and any noise complaints would result in extra charges. While a bit off putting, this did result in a relatively quiet stay while we were there and we weren’t kept up at night by any other guests. 

Also, the “free parking” is a bit misleading. There are only two spots in the back for upwards of 6 guests at any given time. Both were taken the entire duration of our stay. Luckily we got dropped off so we didn’t have to deal with finding alternative parking as I didn’t see any around. 

All around if you’re looking for a decent accommodation in an up and coming neighborhood just outside of the city you’ll find it here. We should also mention that a lot of surrounding properties to this one are boarded up (it seems like this area is just started to become ‘gentrified’).

author: Richard
comments: The place was super clean and stylish, the host was responsive and sent clear messages of how to check in. You’re not too far from the city, and you’re close to many coffee shops and local eateries.

author: Aditya
comments: This is a wonderful place to stay and explore Toronto. The house itself is safe and stylish. The rooms are also great in terms of upkeep and facilities. Has a nice hotel feel to it. Would definitely recommend.

author: Aj
comments: Great location near Dundas square almost in the heart of downtown. Very clean and quaint space. You can hear your neighbors in the spaces above and below you so it’s best to be quiet, but still a lovely place to be. I would recommend staying here for sure.

author: James
comments: good spot

author: Corey
comments: Awesome location right in the heart of the city! Construction all around that starts real early and the sketchy block right behind made a bit worse by the paper thin walls. Easy check in and out and beyond convenient for the city jus bring ear plugs.

author: Jared
comments: Had a pleasant experience with this location, the management team was always helpful answering any questions that we had.

author: Jillian
comments: Great space, good location the only thing is you can hear people on other floors talking and walking around.

author: Khurram
comments: It is center of the city and we have had a good stay. They managed good communications. will stay again.

author: Isuru Adhisha
comments: Enjoyed my stay here. Easy check in, close to downtown core.

author: Raul
comments: Hard to sleep/This place is loud, parties occurred both Friday and Saturday.  The room is very bright due to a red exit signs that lights up your entire room. The cleaning service only provided one roll of toilet paper, no napkins. The entire place smelled like an old damp dirty mop job. The staff did help me when I called and asked to have a late checkout. Very responsive

author: Jongho
comments: The place was spacious, and I was pleased with my stay at this location. Management was also friendly and quick to respond to my requests. The location itself is good, in downtown and close to the subway and the Eaton Center mall, but is next to a construction zone, so it can get a bit noisy, but overall didn't bother me too much.

author: Joshua
comments: Great accommodations for a larger group of people. Nice central location and easy to walk to most places. The only downside was there was a bit of bad smell that took a little getting used to. But over all a very good experience.

author: Ronak
comments: Nice place for a quick and wallet friendly trip if you want to be close to downtown. It’s not meant to stay in, it’s more for if you are just coming home to sleep and shower. Host is communicative, rest is easy.

author: Kyle
comments: The check in and checkout process was very simple. While there, the host checked in several times to make sure we had everything we needed.

author: Stefan
comments: Thanks

author: Nina
comments: The stay was good overall. The only thing was that the kitchen wasn't clean and there was this closet next to the bed with some sort of machine in it, the machine made a lot of noise and did that the whole night. So if you're a light sleeper, I wouldn't recommend.

author: Christina
comments: Well for starters .... it's located in the middle of the slums in Toronto. The Pictures posted DO NOT accurately depict the stay. The main door was just a push lock something typically seen on a bathroom door with no external lock. There were mutliple dents, holes and dings on all of the walls, as well as a film of dust on all of the appliances. The pictures posted glamorize this hole-in-the- wall dump, my friends and I ended up canceling upon arrival and getting a hotel. If you want to stay in a unclean, noisy shack for a night then this is the place for you !!!!

author: Vishal
comments: amazing place to stay

author: Anna
comments: Great spot! Super clean, quiet, and the hosts were incredibly attentive. Close to the streetcar lines and walking distance to Dundas Square

author: Bryan
comments: Great location in the heart of Toronto

author: Sarah
comments: The loft was great. Cute and perfect for walking around to see the main sites of Toronto!

author: Dimitri
comments: Water damage on the ceiling from the HVAC unit that is in an apartment closet that is cooling the entire floor/building.   Bedding for the 2nd bed was locked up with a sign asking us to message them for combo.  After messaging I was asked why I needed extra bedding.

author: Camille
comments: Great place

author: Kallysta
comments: We were unable to make this trip but Elaine and Greg were courteous and we plan on using their services in the future

author: Lauren
comments: The place was very well decorated and accommodating. In a good central area that is pretty close to most things. Elaine was lovely and gave great tips and suggestions on travel plans.

author: Luis
comments: Great place for last min booking, that’s what I did since my flight got cancelled

author: Keith
comments: Cool part of town, near the Distillery District.

author: Dan
comments: Elaine and Greg were a great host. I'd recommend anyone wanting to explore downtown Toronto to try out their place. Its next great restaurants as well as being located at a safe location. I enjoyed my stay while at their place. Try it out, you'll love the cleanliness, privacy, and most of all, the comfort.

author: Deshawna
comments: Good location from everything you may want to see

author: Hamid
comments: It was perfect .

author: Julia
comments: The location is great. However, there was some late night family drama that made us feel uncomfortable and involved outside officials in the home. It felt like it was a private home more than a place of hospitality. You can expect to share bathrooms with other visitors. If you have a private room, it doesn’t lock from the outside. It has a very communal living feel. There also wasn’t air conditioning, and opening the window let in noise from other visitors outside late at night. However, the hosts were nice when we talked to them and gave good advice, we were able to come and go as we pleased and the place is affordable.

author: Janita
comments:
This home is in a great location for guests attending downtown conferences or interested in a stay close to Toronto's center. For young or on-a-budget travelers with a roommate who are fine with communal-style living, it's a pretty good deal. The shower, for instance, heats up quickly and there are plenty of neatly-wrapped bath towel sets for guests as well as fluffy bathrobes and shower shoes to wear.

But I must share that I would not recommend this Airbnb to the majority of travelers, for the following reasons:

1)	It is more a boarding house than an Airbnb. Most Airbnbs provide Continental breakfast, paper towels/napkins, bottled water and a very welcoming atmosphere. This is a place where many items are rationed and guests are asked to follow detailed rules posted throughout the home and communicated by the owners' live-in manager.

2)	We met at least five different tenants in our time there. In addition, there was at least one young man who came in to get towels and take a shower only; he said he was a good friend of the owners. Lastly, the owners, their teenage son, the manager and her (very nice) husband all live in the home. All were polite but there were a lot of people in this home and faces changed frequently.

3)	At this rate, in comparable cities I've visited, guests can find a private apartment or one half of a townhome where they will experience a greater degree of "hospitality" and be made to feel more like valued guests than temporary for-profit tenants who might "tear up" the property. In fact, this experience is one reason that I probably will no longer consider an Airbnb that isn't an offer for "entire home."

author: Zakaria
comments: Excellent location and cosy place, with the free parking it makes it a bargain for the area. Very close  and walking distance to Rogers Center, Union Station and the Entertainment and Financial districts. The location was also close to three groceries (including a 24 hour one) with lots of takeout and dine-in options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Very convenient for long term guests. The place itself is larger than most 1 bedroom units. The building is very quiet. Overall excellent stay. I actually left my watch at the place, the host was nice enough to arrange for me to get it through an extra key. As far as Hosts go, he went above and beyond and out of his way to accommodate me. I would give the host 6 out of 5 (if i could).

author: Nicholas
comments: Had to cancel this reservation due the the COVID-19 pandemic, but Jay was very attentive to messages sent and responded quickly and effectively throughout our communications.  Hoping to book here in the future!

author: Mikyle
comments: Nice apartment that is was affordable for the experience, was able to walk everywhere we wanted to see in Toranto. Minor inconvenience and made my partner uncomfortable that it seemed that Airbnb was not allowed under their apartment contract per my opinion based off provided information if message to owner details that Airbnb leasing is allowed under their apartment contract I will remove this part. Mikyle

author: Breanne
comments: This is a great apartment, well located and well furnished. Check-in was super easy, following a quick walk from Union Station. It's incredibly spacious, well furnished, and super clean. The description is accurate, and still we walked in and went, "Oh, whoa." It was just two of us, but there's plenty of room for four. Everything was clearly laid out in the house manual too. I'd stay here again anytime life brought me back to Toronto.

author: Elizabeth
comments: The apartment was perfect for us and was convenient to walk everywhere we wanted to go in Toronto. The view of the CN tower was amazing too

author: Dalia
comments:
Jays place was fantastic! 
It was an amazing apartment with great features. Very close to everywhere downtown(walking distance) Jay was quick to respond when I asked for a later check out and the bed was super comfortable and cozy for a winter weekend in Toronto.

author: Tang
comments: Good location, as described. Would stay again.

author: Aba
comments: Jays place was amazing! Great location, easy to get around, very stylish place. Jay was great with communication. Would definitely stay there again.

author: Rachel
comments: We had a great time in Toronto, and Jay's place was conveniently located downtown. Clean apartment with private parking, and we enjoyed having a kitchen to cook breakfast in and the washer/dryer to do laundry before we returned home from vacation.

author: Kriss
comments: Super convenient location. I loved the secure underground parking. Host was thoughtful about leaving water in fridge along with some condiments and honey for tea in the cupboard! Very comfortable accommodations. Hope to visit again in warmer weather to make use of the patio!

author: Richard
comments: Comfortable, clean home-away-from-home. Excellent location in a wonderful neighborhood a short walk from coffee shops, restaurants,  retail stores and a transit station to catch a subway train downtown. Have stayed in Nik’s home twice, am looking forward to No. 3. Highly recommend.

author: Claudia
comments: Great space! Really convenient and clean. Highly recommend it.

author: Spencer
comments: Awesome little space! You can’t beat it for the price and it’s in a wonderful little neighborhood!

author: Fouad
comments: We had a great time at Nik’s place. The place is clean and easy to access. There is parking. We had excellent time staying at this apartment. Highly recommend this place and the host.

author: Dominique
comments: This place was perfect for me and my bestfriend’s stay in Toronto, will definitely stay again

author: Cheyenne
comments: Nik’s place was a great find! My friend and I both slept comfortably, were able to cook meals, and take warm showers. The location was great and the added bonus of being able to park our car on site for no added cost was so convenient! I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to friends and family. The host responded quickly and was very hospitable. 10/10

author: Clare
comments: Nik’s place is a great, quiet spot to recharge after exploring. Plus free parking!

author: Jennifer
comments: Beautiful, tree lined neighborhood, on street parking and easy, private check in all at an affordable price.

author: Partha
comments: Nik's place was really comfortable. I was a solo traveler and it met my expectation. Highly recommended if you are a solo traveler or travelling with your partner.

author: Michael
comments: Quick responses and great location! My wife and I had a great time in Toronto.

author: Tiffany
comments: You can’t beat the location!  With access to The Path and a short walk to Union Station, this apartment was so convenient! If you check out early and want to explore the city, I’d recommend storing bags at the Intercontinental Hotel across from the train station for $5 per bag.

author: Shreyas
comments:
It was the best place I have ever stayed in!
Couldn't ask for more.
Highly recommended

author: Tom
comments: Great location and view! Felt like a rock star in the penthouse.

author: Armin
comments: Don't think twice about making reservations at this place! It was beautifully laid out and the view from the balcony is breathtaking! Most attractions are within walking distance and there are dozens of restaurants.

author: Kyle
comments: Overall a great place to stay with amazing views and great location.

author: Gabriel
comments: Thus place was great I highly recommend

author: Aaliyah
comments: Stayed for one night and the place was nice and clean. I was traveling with a friend and it was spacious enough for the both us. The location was great and right in the heart of downtown. The free parking was a plus as well too. At first parking was confusing to find (the garage itself is a weird set up). Overall, I was happy with my stay and would recommend!

author: Kyle
comments: Amazing place, amazing view. And spectacular host. Highly recommended

author: Kelsey
comments: This place is great! Great views and a perfect place to stay while visiting Toronto.

author: Madison
comments: I had a fantastic stay here! I felt right at home when I got there. Within walking distance of some big tourist attractions. If I ever come back to Toronto, I will definitely stay here again!

author: Andrew
comments: Great place.  Matt is very organized and a kind host.   I’ll be a repeat renter.

author: Dave
comments: This property is excellent. The owner is responsive and considerate. You immediately feel at home here.

author: Stephanie
comments: Great place in a wonderful location. Matt clearly puts a lot of effort into making your stay a positive one.

author: Mark
comments: Thanks Matt, great place to stay for my trip to Toronto to watch the Leafs play. Very convenient downtown location and wonderful place to stay.

author: Delong
comments: amazing place and decor, incredible location, close to Union station and everything essential. Will definitely try to book again when im in Toronto

author: Kristyn
comments: 1 night stay was great for a quick trip.

author: Stephen
comments: This is a great condo in a very convenient location. Everything was spotlessly clean and Matt was super friendly and accessible. I’d stay here again.

author: Jennifer
comments: The condo is really cute, and perfect for 2 people. The location is great and within walking distance of a all sorts of great attractions. A couple of drawbacks are no on-site parking and the need to download an app in order to initially get into the unit. While there is a great binder with places of interest, restaurants, etc., also Included were quite a few notes of things that couldn't be used. While I understand the need to set certain boundaries, it started to seem like we were an imposition, not paying customers.

author: Ben
comments:
Matt was accommodating with the check-in process, great location, and very well kept. 

However, there was way too many instructions and rules which made me feel not at home at all. The apartment felt warm even with the AC on (I couldn't bring it lower past a temperature according to the rules.) I have encountered a couple of annoying fruit flies too.

author: Randall
comments: Great location and host!

author: Uriel
comments: I seriously want to live somewhere like this place some day!

author: Katlyn
comments: My stay at the condo was amazing. I will definitely book again

author: David
comments: This was a sparkling clean place in a great location.

author: Adrianna
comments: Everything was close and in walking distance. Condo was clean and Shawn was an excellent host

author: Celal
comments: Very easy and professional access to the building. Very luxurious and clean. It says its across the CN Tower, which is true and actually right next to it, but you can not see the CN Tower from this room, it's on the opposite side of the building but it still has a great view of the buildings! No way you'll regret spending the night here; It's very nice and the location is close to everything! Worth the money.

author: Trevor
comments: Needed a last minute place to stay for work. Shawn came through for me with this spacious, clean, and convenient apartment. Check in was a breeze. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!

author: Alyssa
comments: Great place to stay, only wish I had booked sooner so that I could have stayed longer than 1 night! There are lots of rules and the check in process looks complicated so having anxiety, I was a little nervous. It ended up being super easy with no problems at all and Shawn made sure I knew I could call if I needed help with anything. Great host!

author: Michael
comments: Shawn is quick to respond, and provides all the necessary info and help in advance of arrival. Also accommodating for special requests!

author: Tara
comments: This is a great spot. Perfect downtown location. Very clean. Large gym area for your morning work out. Just all around a great find. Wish we could have spent an extra night!

author: Joanna
comments: Sean's condo is centrally located, clean, and in a great building. Would recommend if you're looking for an easy, comfortable place to stay for a work trip to Toronto.

author: Jaymee
comments: Great place for a quick trip!

author: Je Young Jessy
comments: Lovely studio beside the lake! Really convenient and close to the streetcar. Quiet and nice neighbourhood!

author: Rima
comments: Convenient

author: Anni
comments: I had a pleasant stay at Azin's apartment. The location is great, steps away from the street car. The studio is amazing with its stylish decor and amenities, which has a gym, an indoor pool and sauna.

author: Tom
comments: Great location, and a very responsive host!

author: Erica
comments: Had a fantastic stay. Azin was super helpful

author: Jean
comments: This condo may be modern but it is not cute, in fact rather esthetically unpleasing except for the bathroom. it needs a thorough cleaning as well. The picture, as noted by another guest, is deceiving. It doesn't show the bed in the middle of the room just one foot away from the couch. The rest of the condo is the foyer and bathroom, so it's really in the nature of a bachelor studio. Windows and door to small balcony look out on a freeway and many high-rise condo buildings. Kitchen utensils for cooking were nearly nonexistent. No breakfast is provided. Host was hostile and misleading in dealing with problem that arose although the problem was eventually solved. This listing does have the advantage of an excellent location.

author: Bryan
comments: Great location! We enjoyed our stay.

author: Nicole
comments: Azins place was a small quiet studio withing 30 minutes from downtown which was nice, we used the streetcars and buses to get around. Upon arrival (after our flight got delayed and we got on the wrong street car) she met us in the apt and gave us some great tips of things to do in Toronto. As we had seen in the description there was a light breakfast included, well we were only given packets of jelly, peanut butter and cream cheese which atleast the 1 packet I opened was stale,  we did not get any bread, so made the packets useless (glad there are 24hrs markets). We also wanted to stay in one of the nights to watch a movie, the Netflix was a great bonus, but the TV had a terrible audio and made it unbearable to watch.  We personatly felt the bed was quite hard to sleep on and we would wake up with backaches most of the time, which is not great when you are walking 20,000 steps a day. Overall it was an interesting place for our first visit to Toronto and it was in a very secure building.

author: Jennifer
comments: Stylish studio in a great location! We stayed here for a concert at Budweiser stage which was an easy 10-15 minute walk through the park away. 10-15 minutes in the other direction will get you to some great places to eat. I would plan to get breakfast elsewhere as bread with jam was all that was offered.

author: Claudia
comments: We had the BEST stay. The place is conveniently located and absolutely sparkling!! The studio was clean, cozy and brand new. Luisa was an excellent host and responded immediately! We’ll be back!

author: Nanci
comments: Beautiful and spotless apartment in a great location. Loved the privacy and Luisa was very friendly and helpful.

author: Desiree
comments:
It is such an adorable, cozy, and quaint Airbnb. My friend and I really loved the fire place that added such a comfy touch during the chilling cold season. Located about 10/20 minutes bus, or a 30 minute-ish walk to the Downtown area. There are also so many great restaurants around the area that are walkable! 

Luisa is also very responsive to whatever we need. It was such an easy process checking-in and out of the Airbnb. All in all, I had a great experience. I would definitely love to stay at Luisa's place again the next time I visit Toronto!

author: Logan
comments: Great space and location! Neighbor is a little noisy but wasn’t a big issue. Would recommend

author: Amber
comments: Perfect location with an urban feel

author: Kerri
comments: Had a wonderful stay at this lovely studio with my sister! Perfect size for two. Sparkling clean space. Peaceful sleep with the fireplace. The location was exactly what we were looking for in terms of spending one day in the city exploring shops and restaurants. Check in was made easy by Luisa and parking was affordable. Hope to visit again sometime soon!

author: Andrew
comments: This place was perfect for a one night stay! Not too far for downtown Toronto. Easy checkin plus clean and spacious. I would for sure book again!

author: Kevin
comments: The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location is nice, with a bus right at the corner and some good bars and restaurants nearby. Great bang for your buck!

author: Marshall
comments: Very nice and tidy little place

author: Calyx
comments: It was a very cozy and spotless studio; perfect for resting after a long day of exploring!

author: Jesse
comments: The place was amazing. Great view! Only thing that could be better is cleanliness. The window looking out had fingerprints all over the window and there was hair on the ground in quite a few spots. Overall it was amazing though!

author: Juan
comments: This place was beautiful! Helen was an amazing host, responses were very quick. It was near everything one can ask for, especially if it’s your first trip to Toronto. I highly recommend going with this place! Amazing, clean and beautiful apartment. 11/10!

author: Tracy
comments: The place was perfect, as we had dinner reservations at the CN tower and it was right next to it.  The view was amazing !   I would definitely suggest parking right at the building -very convenient. Thanks Helen.  Would recommend and book this place again!!!

author: Alissa
comments: Clean, organized and comfortable place

author: ByeongHo
comments: It was great experience staying at Helen’s place. The view was amazing and we are satisfied with her being supportive duing our stay.

author: Amaryllis
comments: Amazing time spent!! Will def come back again! The views were astonishing and the place felt like home. Highly recommend. You won't be disappointed!

author: Leandra
comments: Helen's place was lovely! Unbeatable view, comfortable bed, stylish, and super easy check in.

author: Kelly
comments: We had a great stay at Helen's condo.  The location can't be beat.  Within walking distance to Roger's Stadium, Scotiabank Arena, Union Station and lots of great restaurants.  The view from the 59th floor was STUNNING.  The place is clean and had everything we needed.  Remember to book your parking ahead of time.   Helen was super helpful and responded very quickly to all my questions.  Would highly recommend.

author: Sophia
comments: We had a great time staying at Helens place. It was in the perfect location surrounded by restaurants and shops. The place was great with a beautiful view of Toronto. Would recommend this place to anyone!

author: Russell
comments: Beautiful sky rise condo right in the heart of downtown within walking distance to all of Toronto’s best attractions ! Helen was so helpful even though I booked last minute. She was fast to reply and confirm my booking. The view from the condo is absolutely amazing and made our trip extra special.

author: Patrick
comments: Olya is a super thoughtful host. Even though we didn’t use it (because of pandemic times) she provides her guests with a folder ‘guide’ to the area, letting us know the best spots around to do groceries, go out for coffee or a drink, complete with maps and everything. The place was very comfortable, I loved the big balcony. Also, the place has a really cool style, me and my wife love the ‘Amelie Poulain’ gnome idea for the chairs, it makes the art on the walls personal.

author: Kathryn
comments: Great location in downtown Toronto. Thoughtful host- - plenty of toiletries and towels available for the perfect stay

author: Megan
comments: We had a great say at Olya's apartment! It's in a perfect location - walking distance (or a quick Uber ride) to Union station, Meridian Hall, and a bunch of great restaurants and coffee shops. It was homey and full of all the amenities. Definitely would stay here again!

author: Abigail
comments: Our stay was awesome and the place was beautiful and very inviting!

author: Christopher
comments: Great apt in a very nice bldg in the heart of Toronto. V good for biz or vacation. Easy to check in. Gym; coffee shops; restaurants all nearby.

author: Nicole
comments:
Clean and cozy apartment in a great and super convenient part of the city!
Check in and out was super easy- host is really easy to communicate with and responsive. Would highly recommend!

author: Caroline
comments: Our stay was great and I would recommend to anyone looking for a well-appointed stay in a central location. The apartment is cozy yet well designed and Olya had everything available we could need. Check in and out directions were clear and Olya was easy to reach on a moment’s notice. We were within walking distance of most everything we wanted to see and do in Toronto and would certainly stay again.

author: Mary
comments: Perfect apartment for a business trip.  Great location. Bright and comfortable.  Easy check in and out with accommodating host. Loved having Sonos and Netflix.

author: Jen
comments: I think everything I would have written has been covered by others -- great location, great host, thoughtfully appointed.

author: Tanya
comments:
This place was perfect for a short 3-day business trip.  It had everything I needed and more. Great WiFi, comfortable bed, good working heat, and an easy 1 block walk to the underground PATH to escape the cold during my walking commute. 

Olya was in top of any question or request I had.  Checking in and out was simple and hassle free.  The unit was quiet both during the day and night, so much so that I slept for 10 hours one night!  

I highly recommend for one to two people and will definitely return.

author: William
comments: My stay at this Airbnb was was great , it was super clean and well appointed. Check in was easy and fast. Great neighborhood also , I look forward to staying there again

author: Forest
comments: The place is pretty standard but exceptionally clean. The walls are so thin you can hear every word but the place is cute and really centrally located.

author: Misha
comments: Great, clean place, but makes you feel a bit isolated and has no human interaction.

author: Akarsh
comments: It's was a pretty good stay. The room was clean. Finding a parking spot was a bit troublesome.

author: Sam
comments:
This was sadly my greatest AirBNB let down.  The place was very barebones, cleanliness was passable but lacking, and it just didn't have any elegance or even a simple but home-like comforting atmosphere. 

Please be aware this property is shared amongst many others.  This is not a personal home with a few guests.  Also note private parking spot is not guaranteed as it is shared between several guests.

Would recommend if price and convenient location are your ONLY concerns, otherwise we would recommend looking elsewhere.

author: Karlyn
comments: I had a great time! Beautiful place- good bang for your buck :) would recommend

author: Jay
comments: A nice place to stay!

author: Connor
comments: Great place and very affordable in a nice area. Would definitely stay here next time I’m in Toronto!

author: Ngoc-An
comments: Exactly what I expected! Great location to walk around downtown, clean, super fast communication, no problems at all. Yes, sound travels in the house but that was clearly stated and we didn’t have any problems. Thank you!

author: Stella
comments:
Pro: This is the only room on the ground floor, very close to door and kitchen, and you’ll pretty much have the bathroom at the basement to yourself, which is super convenient. The management team is quick in responses. We were also very lucky to be able to park the car at the back. Subway is just a few minutes away - great location. 

Con:  This is the only room on the ground floor close to door and kitchen, so you can hear all the talks/footsteps/doors. I read lots of reviews and came prepared with earplugs but still got waken up before 7am by someone rushing above on the hallway/flushing toilets/rushing up and downstairs and finally slammed the door at 7:48am. It’d be great to put a note somewhere asking people to slow down.

author: Jacob
comments: They will tell you to park at a garage a few blocks away if you drive for like $20 a day. House is attractive inside and as a more affordable accomodation in a convenient, albeit not nicest, location- it's worth considering. You can hear everything going on in the house through the walls. Alot is happening in the house with all the other guests. Was constantly waiting on the shared bathroom. Hosting didn't feel particularly genuine, more like they were going through the motions but were not enjoying it. But maybe that was just with me.

author: Kriziel
comments: Very clean and hospitable and gave great tips for local places!

author: Alexander
comments: Respectful and welcoming people. Parking was the only issue I had. Granted I'm not use to not having on street parking. Would definitely stay again.

author: Phan
comments: I have been in Toronto multiple times a year this is the second time I choose to stay with Greg and Elaine. The first stay about a year ago is a blessed. However, this time is not. Greg and Elaine both gone out for vacation and leave the house for Jackie to manage. For some reason, we and Jackie did not get along. She is so rude that she thinks we are her child or something. The first time we argue, I said I already talk to Greg about the problem already, she told me that I’m a liar and do not believe anything I said. (She won’t even let we go up to the room). The second time I feel uncomfortable is on Dec 27, 2019, when I asked to change my bedsheet (since I stay for 13 nights). Jackie refuses to and said that I did not even stay here long enough for the sheet to be changed (Dec 18 to Dec 30 maybe not long enough for that). When I said I been here for more than a week already, she again told me that I’m lying and refuse to change my sheet since the daily task already schedule (what a joke). Fine! She asked me if I want to do it myself. Tbh, this is the first time ever in my whole Airbnb thing that I need to change the sheet my own for my stay. I mean like wth? I already pay for my cleaning service. Another thing is the bathroom that we suppose to share with other guests, it was dirty most of the time and we have to clean it ourselves like twice in the whole stay. I did mention it to Jackie on the last day and hope that they would fix the situation soon since it is very unprofessional for a host to be like that.  Well, this stay is not doing very well for me. I used to recommend I friend to stay here but not anymore. I love the house, I love Greg and Elaine but maybe this is not worth anymore for the headache I have to deal with. Have great years ahead of you guys.

author: Kames
comments: Cool spot.

author: Julie
comments: Close to Downtown, multiple guests, have to share a bathroom

author: Chetan
comments:
Such. A. Clean. Place. 
Really enjoyed my stay! Wonderful place overall with lots of local tips.

author: Tianna
comments: Awesome place, the location is a little far from the city but walkable.

author: Merrick
comments: Had a great time! It was really cool to talk to everyone staying there and the host are very knowledgeable on fun things to do in Toronto! Would stay again!

author: Tierra
comments: Great place, very close to downtown. Quick Uber ride  or walk. Very nice!

author: Hannah
comments:
Incredibly beautiful space in a fun and lively area of Toronto. The space is decorated to the nines and feels like living on a movie set. 
The building itself feels a bit old, and we were able to hear a lot of walking around and talking from other apartments while in the space.

author: Kenyatta Naji
comments: Gwyn + Matt's Place was incredible! I highly recommend any of their spaces, as they are one of a kind and nothing short of amazing. The atmosphere, the accommodation, the accessibility. A1.

author: Vincent
comments: Beautiful loft, we had a great time

author: Owen
comments: Great host and great place. Worth it!

author: Brett
comments: Had a great stay at Gwyn's Plant Paradise!

author: Ashley
comments: STAY HERE! You won't regret it. Amazing vibe, easy check in, wonderful experience. Would absolutely stay here again.

author: Mary Claire
comments: Such a cute and unique place! Incredibly clean, with perfect little touches throughout. Very responsive, helpful owners who keep the place immaculate.

author: Nathan
comments: This is the most beautiful space to stay in. It was a peaceful restful spot and we loved every minute of it. If your in Toronto there is no other place you should stay!

author: Haley
comments: What a wonderful place to experience downtown Toronto. Very responsive guests, the place is truly unique and quirky.

author: Kit
comments: It was a beautiful place that made me feel entirely at home. I only wish that I had been able to stay there longer.

author: Blake
comments: A clean place with all the amenities you will need. Right next door to the CN tower and Ripley’s aquarium. Super close to all kinds of bars, restaurants and shops.

author: David
comments:
Awesome place with easy parking and great location. Clean with high end furniture, kitchen cabinets etc.
A step up from the last condo I stayed in nearby for the same price.
Will book again (in the summer when the pool is open).

author: Thomas
comments: great access to sporting events

author: Andres & Janet
comments: Loved everything about it. Amazing location and views from the balcony. We walked everywhere from there.. great nice, cozy and clean place!

author: Megan
comments: Jordan’s apartment was in a good location. The apartment was comfortable for 4 of us and the extra room was a perfect size for 2 people in addition to the main room.

author: Nicole Sheet May
comments: Jordan's place was great! Sparkling clean and well furnished in a fantastic location.  All our questions were answered very promptly and check in was super easy. Will stay again!

author: Molly
comments: The place was amazing! Location was awesome and the view was amazing. The only issue was that the WiFi listed didn’t pop up so we didn’t have access while we were there. Other than that it was perfect, would definitely stay again!

author: Helen
comments: Amazing well appointed apartment in the heart of everything. Spacious, clean and functional space across the street from the CN Tower. Park your car in the secure provided space and walk around the city. Make sure you go down to the pool and gym. Will definitely book with Jordan again next time we are in the city. Thanks.

author: Greg
comments: Great location with great views

author: Sara
comments: Condo is beautiful and in a great location!

author: Kaycee
comments: Great location, clean, responsive hosts.

author: Saba
comments: Not clean, small, and the unit did not look as lavish as the pictures at all. Not sure why it’s a “plus”.

author: Archit
comments: Awesome. Provide some sugar as well

author: Sean
comments: An excellent stay for anyone looking to explore downtown Toronto! Would recomend!

author: Kim
comments: The places was wonderful. I would definitely recommend this place and when i visit again i would love to revisit this home. In the perfect location of Toronto to walk around to find everything or just a short drive away from the CN tower. The place was cleanly and well decorated. The owners are very diligent in making sure everything is okay snd that you got in easily. With pictures its easy to find and having a personal garage for parking made bring in the city easy. I loved this place and cant wait to return!

author: Shuihan
comments: It’s a lovely cozy place in a quite neighborhood. The place is bell designed to maximize the usage of the limited space. The pictures of the house are vell taken. They zoomed out as far as possible, so the place seems bigger in the pictures. But the truth is there is no room for travelers who have two or more languages to lay down their suitcases. But besides this, everything else was perfect.

author: Annie
comments: Our hosts were awesome! So caring and considerate, everything was made so easy! The communication, the check in/check out was effortless. The home was in an ideal location for our needs. We highly recommend and can’t wait to stay again!

author: Nicholas
comments: Great place if you are needing to be in downtown Toronto with easy access to food etc. Free parking is a huge plus and it had a gym you could workout in without having to pay. I'd stay here again. Great for two people, more than that would be too crowded.

author: Daniel
comments: The apartment smelled like marijuana the entire stay. Also the heat was broken as it was not able to be turned down, the apartment temp remained over 80 degrees making it difficult to sleep. It was not stated anywhere on the AirBnb posting that the garage had a  height clearance. I was not able to park my van in the extra parking space that I paid for. I would not have rented this place if it did not coming with a parking space. This was extremely disappointing.

author: Omar
comments: Great location. This place was amazing I would definitely stay here again.

author: Grant
comments: Great place! Space exceptionally clean and well designed. Killer views that include the CN tower, aquarium, and airport. Easy check in and host was very responsive to messages. I highly recommend this place and would recommend staying.

author: Madison
comments: Cozy and cute space with an absolutely amazing view of the CN Tower. I can’t imagine wanting to stay anywhere else in Toronto!!

author: Phyllis
comments: Fantastic! What an ideal location with a fabulous grocery store about a block away! It was a surreal reunion for the three of us and the condo was an amazing place which added the perfect touch. Jonathan was the host with the most who saw to our every need. Thank you!

author: Mark
comments: You won’t be disappointed

author: Stuart
comments: Great view of CN tower from the balcony and great location! Check in was a breeze and the host responds quickly to questions.

author: Jennifer
comments:
Jonathan’s place was everything we had hoped for. The views of the city alone made it worth every penny! 

The apartment is centrally located to great restaurants, coffee, and shopping. Uber’s came quickly and without any issue. 

The apartment itself was very clean and beautiful on the Inside and had everything we needed for the trip.

author: Latolya
comments: This place is amazing, super clean, amazing views, in the heart of everything!!!

author: Amanda
comments: Great location downtown, could easily walk to nearby restaurants. Beautiful view of the CN Towner and bay. Condo was clean and had everything we needed.

author: Rebecca
comments: Unreal views. Great communication. The location was central to everything we had planned.

author: Katelyn
comments: Jonathan’s place was incredible. The view was unbeatable! The space was clean, with everything I could have asked for included. I have already recommended this place to friends of mine and would highly recommend it to anyone searching for a good stay in Toronto! Jonathan was an excellent host who communicated everything needed to make my trip great!  I will stay here again when I come back to the city.

author: Martin
comments: Great communication.

author: Lisa
comments: The apartement has great things and not so great details to it... it definitely wasn’t as clean as described. Livingroom and kitchen where okay but the carpet In the bedroom was pretty dirty and so where to corners in the shower. There where also weird dots on the toilet seats and the AC didn’t really work that well either, which shouldn’t be a problem durin winter. The apartement has a weird smell to it which is why we kept the balcony door open most of the time which could get difficult during colder seasons. Besides that the location was great and the host was replying really fast which was great!

author: Tyler
comments: Great space in an awesome location close to downtown!

author: Michelle
comments: Awesome location with a great view of the CN tower. Very safe neighborhood and an easy walk down Fort York to convenience stores, trendy bars and restaurants, the CN tower, and Blue Jays stadium to catch a game. Everything was very clean and comfortable for us. Made our home for the weekend in Toronto a great experience!

author: Jimmy
comments: Would definitely come back here

author: Amber
comments: At a perfect location. I felt safe and loved having a good view!

author: Junior
comments: This place is as good as it looks. The location is amazing and close to everything downtown. The apartment is such a nice size and the balcony is big and looks right towards the CN Tower. Would definitely stay here again.

author: Amanda
comments: Very beautiful space. There is a parking lot right around the corner. Just be sure to double check if there are any events going on because the lot can become full. $8 (USD) and you can just download the app and add more time through there versus going back to the lot everyday. Perfect location and Ivan provided great and fast communication. Would definitely stay here again! Thanks for hosting!

author: Kayla
comments: The view and location are spectacular. Ivan was very easy to communicate with. I did leave something behind and he has agreed to send it to me, so I am very grateful! Thanks, Ivan!

author: Todd
comments: This was a great place to stay! Medium walk to downtown, affordable and clean!

author: Laura
comments: Stella's place was beautiful with a great location and view of the CN Tower.  Very cozy and comfortable with everything I needed.  Perfect for attending conventions at the MTCC which is just across the street.

author: Gina
comments: Great location. Very responsive and helpful. The place is beautiful.

author: Francisco
comments: Stella is amazing! Such a helpful and caring host. Her and her team are amazing we greatly appreciated our space and the wonderful recommendations.

author: Paige
comments: Wonderful perfect location! I would highly recommend to anyone and would love the come back in the summer!

author: John
comments: Great location & easy logistics — would definitely use again or recommend to others.

author: Marlo
comments: Stella's place is in a great location and she is a very responsive host. Check in and out was super easy. The apartment is quiet and the bed is cozy making for a good night's sleep.

author: Paul
comments: Stella’s airbnb is very clean and very well situated in a prime location. Only a 10 minute walk from union station.  I would definitely stay at stella’s again the next time I’m back in Toronto.

author: Lotta
comments:
We stayed at Stella’s for TIFF and her place was just great - clean, functional and smack in the middle of it all! Stella communicated with us very well and everything in the apartment was as expected !
I can wholeheartedly recommend Stella’s place if you are visiting Toronto and especially for any of the Enterainment district attractions !

author: Connie
comments: Excellent 1 bedroom studio apartment - great bed!  Perfect for me as a solo working person attending TIFF. Could walk everywhere. Thanks Stella!

author: Paul
comments: A wise choice for anyone looking to be at the heart of the Entertainment district!  Stylish, very comfortable, and a crazy good deal for the price.

author: Stacy
comments: Room was larger than expected - nicely decorated and comfortable. It’s not a luxurious house; but it’s safe, clean, comfortable, provides privacy and necessary amenities. For the price it can’t be beat. More importantly, location was awesome.  Great diverse restaurants on doorstep, and only 26 min walk on Bloor Street to heart of downtown.  It’s a nice walk for sight seeing.  Host tried his best to accommodate early arrival which made my arrival to Toronto so much easier.

author: Rui
comments: A very nice clean place, good price for this location. The only downside is that you can hear subway pass when quiet in the night, but not loud.

author: Jessie
comments: Really nice, spacey, amd clean room. Very nice amenities and hospitality

author: Tíara
comments: Overall I highly recommend this place. The cleanliness and communication are top-notch. It's in a great location with lots of restaurants and shops and things to do nearby. The room is perfect for two and even better for one.

author: Elliot
comments: This was an amazing experience for me. I was staying in Toronto for two days and needed a cheap place to stay. Frank and Kelly offered their home at an amazing price. Everything was clean and as listed. Great spot because parking and shopping are less than a minute away. I will be coming back and reccomend anyone in the area to try it. Also say hi to the other guest you will meet some cool people!

author: Mathieu
comments: Good location in Koreatown with lots of options for food and drinks. Very clean. Good communication, making the check in and check out process very easy.

author: Lukas
comments: Convenient location in the heart of Koreatown/The Annex. Short walk to Little Italy, Kensington Market, ROM, and other destinations. Convenient municipal parking lot next door. The space was clean and well-maintained with easy self check-in.

author: Jeff
comments: Cozy room, quiet, nice bathroom, and not too far from where you wanna be!

author: Christopher
comments: Lovely rooms, great location.

author: Asa
comments: Beautifully furnished, private lodgings. Door to private room had a lock and key provided. Never actually saw the host but heard them home. There was a second room occupied by another Airbnb guest that we briefly met. Other than that everything was rather quiet and enjoyable.

author: Noel
comments: Very nice and easy to get to home. It was right next to great food places on younge street as well which was walking distance. I even actually used the wrong apartment and Nic was very nice about it. Will definitely book again next time im in Toronto!

author: Anneliese
comments: Nik's place is definitely worth it for the price. It is about a 10 min walk to the subway and about 20 minutes to downtown depending on where you want to go. It was fairly clean with the exception that I found several red stains on my bedsheets... One thing I do want to mention was the terrible communication. I didn't know whether I was allowed to check-in early until i was enroute to Toronto despite my numerous messages weeks prior. He offered to keep my luggage instead of letting me checkin earlier but didn't respond after I asked him how I could do so...not professional. But he seemed nice when he did respond..

author: Emma
comments: Great space for the price! Comfortable place for a weekend away with a friend :)

author: Caroline
comments: Great stay, the location is great and the place has everything you need for its price

author: Shawn
comments: Exactly as advertised. Great value for the money! In the center of any place you'd want to go in the city.

author: Riley
comments: Amazing place! Free parking is a huge plus, the place was super clean. It was a bit small but it is absolutely perfect for people trying to get out and explore the city who need a nice place to rest at night. The location is pretty close to the downtown but it in a very quiet neighborhood. Nik is a great host and we will definitely be staying at his place again when we are back in Toronto!

author: Chris
comments: Its a great place for the price and location

author: Kim-Anh
comments: great value and fast communication

author: Emma
comments: Great value for the space and location! Nik’s place was super clean as well

author: Bijoy
comments: This place is perfect for a quick weekend excursion to Toronto! Would recommend!

author: Hailey
comments: Directions/check-in directions were super thorough! It was a very cute space

author: Gurjant
comments: We had a great stay at Alper's. The self check-in was smooth and hassle-free, the condo was clean and located at a great location. I would definitely stay again!

author: Elana
comments: Very accommodating despite me being so needy and late. It’s an excellent location, free parking spot was very nice, and Alper was an excellent host who answered all my questions very fast. Would stay here again.

author: Alexis
comments: Great modern place to stay if you aren’t traveling with a lot of people! The location was great and the complementary parking was conveniently located. Would definitely come back!

author: Meghan
comments: amazing location, easy check in and a great host! would stay again!!

author: Jeremy
comments: Place is right in the middle of everything. It's nice because you can walk to all the great places.

author: Jonathan
comments: Great space, great location. Host communicated well with check-in/out instructions. Listing exactly as advertised. Highly recommend for a clean and comfortable stay in Toronto!

author: Jennifer
comments: Perfect location! Great for our family of 4 with 2 young kids. Condo was spotless and had everything we needed. The check in directions and pictures were very helpful.

author: Hannah
comments: Alper’s place was super clean and gorgeous. It’s the perfect place for a nice romantic stay in the heart of Toronto. We will be back!

author: Margot
comments:
Alper is an amazing host — thoughtful, helpful, quick to accommodate, and he checks in to make sure you’ve got everything you need or want. 
In addition to phenomenal location, location, location, his places are clean, fresh, stylish and comfortable. You really feel at-home and taken-care-of. A true delight! Thank you!

author: Kaylee
comments: This place was amazing with a great view!

author: Grailey
comments: The apartment was in a good area, was able to walk to basically everything we wanted to do. Plenty of shopping and food nearby. Big parking lot across the street was easy to access and was not that expensive for parking

author: Anthony
comments: nice place, very clean, near local bars and clubs location was good right next to the city within walking distance

author: Eric
comments: always a pleasure staying here

author: Daniela
comments: Great location!

author: Kiran
comments: Everything about this location was a bit disappointing. We found ants in our room, the island in the kitchen was extremely sharp and dangerous, there was extremely old coffee grounds leftover in the coffee machine, the dishwasher was broken, the kitchen exhaust was broken, the extra bedding was locked up in a closet. I did not have a good experience at all.

author: Ahmed
comments: It was nice I would definitely go there again if I could!

author: Megan
comments: Comfy place in a fun part of town. Super easy check in.

author: Ben
comments: Nice place in a good location

author: Eric
comments: I have stayed here before and of course there would have to be a reason for me to return to the same place again. The room is just what I need and everything is within walking distance. It is always clean and a comfortable stay, thank you!

author: Mosi
comments: Awesome place, (Email hidden by Airbnb) easy to access and clean.

author: Kim
comments: Beautiful, spotless, awesome views and location. Would love to reserve again for a blue Jays game since it's so close. Nice decor and high end building. Very comfy bed!

author: Kiniah
comments: Should be the first place you think about staying the host has an amazing response time and the place and view is just amazing!!  One of the best experiences ever wish i Stayed longer

author: Beth
comments: Erin and Carole's place was immaculate and well situated, with friendly people at the desk. I also really appreciated their responsiveness to messages, and I would definitely stay again when in Toronto!

author: Adam
comments: This is a fantastic place to stay! Their place is in a beautiful building right across from the CN Tower and Rogers Centre. It's just down the street from King and Adelaide streets, which have a lot of restaurants a nightlife, so it's an easy walk. Everything else is close by as well. The apartment was sparkling clean, the beds were so comfortable, and the place had everything you could need. There was even a nice little balcony. You can also use all of the recreation amenities in the building. If you're traveling with a car, I highly recommend buying the parking spot for your stay. It's a great deal and you don't have to worry about parking anywhere in the city. We kept the car parked and used Uber/public transportation to get around downtown. Thank you for a fantastic stay!

author: Jessica
comments: Erin and Caroles place was amazing. So clean and great location. I would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you for having us!

author: Keith
comments: Very very clean , Great location centrally located to everything. Had a great time , truly recommended .

author: Patrick
comments: Absolutely fantastic. Awesome location and very friendly and quick hosts.

author: Jason
comments: A&C’s place was in an incredible location and was perfect for what I needed in my business travels.

author: Morgan
comments: It was a great location to be able to walk around toronto and it was very clean.

author: Tarun
comments: Nice place

author: Tonya
comments: Loved the location of the place and it was very clean easy to find. Also there are alot of things in walking distance from the place. My son enjoyed him self with the pool and more would deff stay here again

author: Lindsay
comments: The location was great. The place itself is showing its wear. The bathroom could use refreshing deep clean and some updated items. Make sure you ask about what included shampoo and body wash is give, we brought our own and I was happy we did because we would not have used what was provided. The check in and parking process need to be tightened. Also, if you are selecting early check in, make sure the host is available. He was not for our check in and it left for a mess of a check in process. Also, be mindful that you will have to park your car somewhere before and after you can utilize the "Free" parking as the parking pass is located in the unit.

author: Emily
comments: The check in process was a bit confusing, but simply because there are so many apartments- however the hosts were immediately available to direct us to the correct location and give us helpful steps. We also had a small issue with parking but the hosts were incredible responsive and were able to help us out after our stay for the issues that we had. We would HIGHLY recommend this space, it was a great location, incredibly clean, and great for a girls weekend away.

author: Anna
comments: Experience was amazing, would highly recommend and would stay here again if back in town.

author: Tanja
comments: The apartment is lovely and comfortable as well as in a great location. The check in process could be improved, but otherwise a great experience

author: Janior
comments: Great location in Downtown Toronto. Host was very available for any questions we had and tons of nearby places to eat. Everything was a short walking distance from the place which was great!

author: Dan
comments: We had a great time at Steve’s place. He was very thorough and timely with his communications. The place was in a prime location, convenient to Union Station and many of the cities highlights. Check-in/out processes were easy and having a parking space was convenient as we rented a car for a day to go to Niagara. Would definitely recommend and stay again in the future.

author: Grace
comments: Perfect location

author: Nurul
comments: Steve is a great host! The apartment looks exactly how it is described online. His place is amazing and conveniently located within Toronto attractions. Walking distance to nice cafes and restaurants. Longos grocery store is in the same building vicinity. Union Station is just around the corner so easy access to network of public transportation. Parking space is provided and that is definitely a huge plus. Communication throughout our stay was perfect, with very fast response time. We would recommend Steve’s place!

author: Lin
comments: The place is awesome!The house is well maintained and the rooms are neat and clean. Great location with tons of sites to explore. Furthermore, the cleaning staff are very diligent. I will say this is one of my best Air Bnb experience.

author: Lin
comments: Great place to stay in Toronto

author: Matthew
comments: Terrible. Terrible. Terrible. No privacy. Too many rules. Such as whispering in your room and shoes off in the house. Take loud talking down the block. It was so mad we left moments after checking in and went to book a hotel.

author: Kelechi
comments: Awesome place. Although I forgot my keys in my room and locked the door, and I was unable to enter my room for 3hours. The host was interested in money rather than my comfort at that time. They almost charged me a lot to unlock the door.  But I didn’t pay anything cos there’s no signage showing that the door locks from inside. I hope they have a signage up now. Other than that, it was a clean place.

author: Stephen
comments: Great place!

author: James
comments: Nice cozy space. Was a good place to stop and sleep as I was out and about in the city.

author: Aja
comments: If you're looking for a great place to stay in Toronto, this place is it! Just a few minutes away from Downtown Toronto. Very easy transportation options all around. The room looks exactly like what you see in the photos. The only bad comment that I have about is the room was that the bed was a little stiff, there were some nights I had a hard time sleeping. The bathroom is very clean and nice. Checking In was no hassle at all,  the host gave amazing directions and instructions.  The WiFi wasn't the greatest at times, it did lag a lot but not a major issue since most of your time should be spent out of the house. You do share this household with other travelers which isn't a big deal. I didn't run into the other that much but when I did, they were all very friendly. Overall, this stay was by far amazing. If and when I come back to Toronto, this is where I'm staying.

author: Elizabeth
comments:
Cons:
This is a crash pad: 8 rooms of guests (16 people approx for 2 bathrooms)
Paper thin walls (can hear everything)
Bed is very plastic sounding when rolling over
Parking: if you get a spot in back (only 2) it is good. If you don’t, you’re SOL
Worst pillows I’ve ever had in my life
Very strict rules
Someone rang the doorbell for 10 mins straight at midnight. When messaged the host about it, they blew us off like we didn’t matter. 
Right on a noisy street; no central air or air flow (no fan) so had to have window open and heard loud street noise all night. 

Pros:
Location close to restaurants and coffee shops. 
Clean and bathrooms well stocked
Across the street from a free running track that was very nice

Overall would not recommend except in a pinch for a night

author: Kathleen
comments: Clean room, nothing fancy, but everything tidy and useful (good reading lamp, towels, etc).  Great communication from hosts.  Easy walk to the subway.

author: Richard
comments: Great location, clean bright space. Host was very understanding when I made a mistake in booking the wrong dates. Appreciate the prompt and helpful communication.

author: Nina
comments: Frank was a great host, and responded quickly to any questions that came up. Room was as expected, clean and comfortable. Great location right next to Bathurst station, and every shop you would need right around the corner. Thank you Frank for a great stay.

author: Maria
comments: Frank saved me after my first Bnb was trash! His place is beautiful, and he is a great host! Don’t think twice and book him!

author: Leah
comments: Frank was patient and kind; it was a pleasure staying at his place.

author: Nouf
comments:
Staying here was outstanding! This was my first time staying in Toronto and getting a chance to catch a deal like Frank's place was a win. The room was even better in person, and the location was convenient to coffee shops and restaurants. My friend and I shared the room which fit us perfectly, and the other guests from the rooms next door followed the rules the house rules of "quiet time at 11pm" which made it great for the overall guests. 
Recommend 100%!

author: Joanne
comments: Great location, room and bath as expected. Clean, pleasant.

author: Emma
comments: Extraordinarily clean place. Wonderful location. Only a 2 minute walk through the Bathurst subway station and dozens of fantastic restaurants nearby in Koreatown as well as bars open late. I never once had to use an uber/lyft to get around since there was so much public transportation nearby.

author: Yana
comments: Great clean room and amazing location - a two minute walk from Bathurst station. The tub/shower is shared among 2 other rooms but there is a second toilet downstairs. Room has a nice window to the backyard that can be opened. We had a hot weekend in the city so the older vent system in the home does not cool the room very much. Overall Frank was responsive and the Airbnb is a perfect place to crash after exploring the city all day.

author: Ellise
comments: Super cute and clean home with a really great location. A bit of noise from the subway, but not bad at all unless you're a really light sleeper. Frank was wonderful and easy to coordinate with.

author: Carl
comments: A clean house, reasonably close to the downtown.  Koreatown is quiet but has a number of restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores.

author: Quyen
comments: Franks place was freaking awesome if you really enjoy being in Korean town. It’s legit in middle of Korean town. Easy to check in. Clean. Everything in description was very accurate.

author: Mariah
comments: Krume's place is so amazing! It's located at such a great spot as you're 15 minutes from downtown and the streetcar is a 2 minute walk. The place was very clean and Krume was very quick with responding to all our needs and getting us taken care of. Definitely recommend!

author: Kerry
