comments: I nice private spaces to call home for short time, stores near by, a great bakery in the area , and lot of small business to visit, what like most was the availability to hop on local transit at any time . Thanks Krume once again !

author: Sam
comments: Amazing place to stay in Toronto. Great location, perfect for single travelers and couples.

author: Matthew
comments: Modern, clean, and exceptionally located studio!  Great stay!

author: Anna
comments: Perfect place for a business trip! Great location, very clean and cozy, loved it! Would be happy to stay again!

author: Erin
comments: The space is small but comfortable. The location is great. If you are not familiar with Toronto know that there is the convenience of the Queen streetcar steps from the front door but that also comes with the noise of the streetcar so if you are a light sleeper it may not work for you. Great hosts who were friendly and were quick to respond.

author: Abby
comments: Lovely host and a cute little place if you’re looking for somewhere within a ten minute drive to downtown Toronto! The host assists you with figuring out parking details as well which I thought was very thoughtful!

author: Jade
comments: Krume’s place is exceptional! It is conveniently located on Queen Street and about a one-minute walk to the bus stop on the 501 line. The apartment itself is sparkling clean and modern, and what’s most amazing is our communication with the host. Krume is extremely responsive and cares for our stay, and had given us many helpful tips for traveling in Toronto. My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Krume’s charming apartment and would highly recommend it to anyone else!

author: Katie
comments: This is such a sweet little gem in the Leslieville neighborhood of Toronto. It's very cozy and you have everything you'll need. Plus, you just step outside and you're on the main street with shops & restaurants.  The only downside is that you do hear the streetcar thumping very regularly but other than that-it's a great place to stay. The owner's communication is excellent!

author: Kayla
comments: Great location. Very clean comfortable bed. Details are on point. The minor things you need were ready and available.

author: Ban Ian Pole
comments: Very clean place, the location is convenient and in the heart of the city. Lots of food places outside the building. Walking distance to everything.

author: Paul
comments: Great value, great location, friendly host!

author: Adam
comments: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Simin’s place was absolutely amazing, smack in the middle of downtown Toronto. Simin was accommodating with both a late check-in, and allowed us to keep our bags there after checkout until our flight. Anytime something was needed, Simin would reply within minutes. The place is beautiful as well! When visiting Toronto again, I can only hope her place is available!

author: Allie
comments: Simin’s place is beautiful and in a great location! She responded promptly, the place was clean, easy to access and centrally located. Would definitely stay here again!

author: Daren
comments: Wonderful location and great value! Would stay here again next time visiting Toronto.

author: Deborah
comments: A great central location in the heart of down downtown Toronto. Very responsive host. We would stay here again.

author: Rebecca
comments: High recommendation! Nice place and Simin is very nice person! It was pretty good experience!

author: JoAna
comments: Simin’s place is great! Close to all the local attractions! Super clean, bed and pillows comfortable! Would definitely book again!

author: Jamie
comments: Lovely location, excellent value! Toronto has expensive parking in the area. It's  a quickly growing city with LOTS of construction.

author: Dezmon
comments: Convenient location and Great view of Downtown Toronto!

author: Eleni
comments: Great place to stay. Owner communicates with you quickly. Place was clean, comfortable and had a parking spot for my vehicle.  Would definitely recommend.

author: Carlos
comments: Is an  amazing host and the place is very private, I love it

author: Joclyn
comments: Cute little basement suite. Really nice host who was very helpful and provided us with extra blankets. Close to public transportation and decent food as well.

author: Alexios
comments: The host was very attentive and the apartment was especially clean and comfortable.

author: Jimmy
comments: Great cheap option for a place to stay outside of Toronto

author: Amanda
comments: Clean space and off street parking made me glad I chose this listing.

author: Michele
comments: Easy to get to and parking spot was helpful. Friendly host.

author: Logan
comments: Great place. Would definitely stay again. Very easy check-in/out. Neighborhood has lots to offer as in food and shops close by. Busy location with lots of people walking around if you’re into that

author: Abbey
comments: Great place for a quick stay.

author: Cody
comments: Near subway stop, cool space, clean. I would highly recommend

author: Kezia
comments: Lina’s space was very nice and clean. The view of the city was great and it was so close to everything. I would definitely book again !

author: Jamie
comments: Picking up and returning the keys from the key cafe was so simple and the apartment was great for our needs.  The apartment was a little tired, but it was clean and as described.  Lina was very helpful when I had questions about the tv, it was much appreciated!  Would stay here again.

author: Annette
comments: The location of this place is a short Uber ride to all the sights and neighborhoods downtown And has a lovely view of the city. However, this place needs more attention to its cleanliness and maintenance. The toilet looked like it had not been cleaned from the previous guests, there were some crumbs on the kitchen island, and the beds were missing top sheets. The lighting was on the dark side, and could benefit from more lamps and new light bulbs. It would also be nice to have more cozy seating in the living room area as there wasn’t enough seating for a family of 4. We were a little disappointed with our stay.

author: Isabel
comments: overall a great location, I would be careful about using the kitchen. I tried to boil water and an alarm inside the apartment went off because the stove-top had some grime on it (which isn't immediately visible), gave us a scare and some major headaches for a couple hours. Apartment was cozy and warm, great size, good price.

author: Meaghan
comments: The place is pretty accurate to the pictures. The view is the best part, I loved the open windows and the bathroom was a perfect size for a group of people getting ready. The place was not the cleanest but it was not dirty. Definitely worth the price.

author: Lindsay
comments: Over all location was great & the host was responsive to messages. The key check-in & check-out process was really easy & convenient.

author: Matthew
comments: Great view and great location. Walkable to a lot of Toronto. Kid friendly and free parking! Some minor cleanliness issues like stains on carpet, on couch pillows, and on the shower curtain. Overall great place to stay.

author: Mohamed
comments: It’s ok

author: Derek
comments: Great location, apartment was clean & in a convenient location. Would definitely recommend. Thanks Lina

author: Haris
comments: Beautiful, spacious, condo in a great location with beautiful views of Toronto. Simple to follow instructions for check-in

author: Tony
comments: Great view from the balcony and the communication is great with the host

author: Sibi
comments: Nice and clean apartment. The kitchen had all amenities to cook. Spacious dining area and living room.

author: Kris
comments: Awesome location downtown in a beautiful and spacious 2bdrm. Large balcony with CN tower view. Excellent hosts, easy to communicate with and friendly. Good WiFi, nice kitchen, new appliances, hotel like building. Highly recommended!

author: Lisa
comments: The apartment/location was great. We appreciated the cleaning and paper products. The host(s) were quick to respond. We hope to get back to Toronto and would stay there again.

author: Andrew
comments: Erin’s condo is the perfect spot to stay for a weekend in Toronto. It was so close to all of the neighborhoods we wanted to hit, and we walked the whole weekend. She is an excellent communicator and a better host.

author: Liam
comments: this place is perfect! highly recommend

author: Shamell
comments: I wish I could give it 10 stars. Erin & Carole were great with the response time. Always accommodating and willing to help. Would definitely stay again.

author: Joey
comments: Comfortable and convenient place to stay— perfect location with a beautiful view!

author: Braydon
comments: As great as described, clean and in the heart of the entertainment district so a very great find with great available amenities

author: Patrick
comments: Great space in the heart of the hustle and bustle. The building is also very accommodating to Airbnb renters and were super helpful.

author: Molly
comments: Frank’s place is a perfect location! Right downtown near lots of restaurants and easy access to other areas in Toronto! The space is perfect for 2 people or 1 person as it is small. The place is very clean and stylish! Would stay here again!

author: Samantha
comments: Frank's place was really great, it was clean, cozy and stylish too! I really liked the location because it was central to everything, but quiet enough at night and safe to walk around. The apartment looks just like the photos, I'd totally stay here again :)

author: Jonathan
comments: Frank's place is well equipped, with all the modern conveniences - the in-house washer & dryer were very useful. Everything was immaculate, and the space looked almost brand new. Frank's communication was excellent - he responded to most requests within minutes. The space is a bit limited - it would be nice if there were more room to store luggage - but we made do with the closet, and the useful desk. Not much of a view - the window opens onto an office building, so we mostly kept the curtain closed. Overall, a great value and superb location.

author: Hailey
comments: Frank’s place is sparklingly clean and in a great location. The unit itself has everything you need and is on a very safe, private street.  I would highly recommend this stay, and I will definitely be booking again!

author: Caitlin
comments: Clean space, great location, great value

author: Rosalie K
comments: Beautiful apartment, the perfect place to stay during your next trip to Toronto! We were so centrally located, and parking was easy. I highly recommend Frank’s place to anyone!

author: Michael
comments: Nice apartment with an excellent location in the best part of downtown Toronto.

author: Jessica
comments: Beautiful, sparkling clean place in a trendy part of Toronto. Frank was easy to communicate with, and check-in was a breeze. There's a  bit of street noise at night, but it would only be an issue if you're super sensitive to street noise. It wasn't a problem for us at all! Lovely spot--would definitely stay here again.

author: Amber
comments: This was a lovely place to stay!  Was in town for just a few days for a wedding and this was a perfect place to crash at the end of the day.  We rented a car last minute and parking was a bit tricky since it's downtown, but otherwise loved our time!

author: Thom
comments: Frank's TO pad is a solid place  to stay for both vaca and biz travelers. You really cannot ask for a better location. Everything aligned with what the descriptions / photos and the bed was a lot more comfy than other ones I slept in. Would stay again if back for work or play.

author: Josephine
comments:
Great location! You have a nice view - beware Lake Ontario and can tower are only mostly visible from one part of the window, the rest faces other high rise condos. 

The space itself was okay - it definitely could’ve been tidier. The space was obviously lived in and hadn’t been truly deep cleaned in a while which was a little sad. I was really hoping for it to be perfect! There was a lot of dust/hair/stuff on the ceiling to floor windowsills (gorgeous windows though). The bathroom was similar and the sink had like stains from water/where it had been turned or something that was super noticeable since the sink is white! 

Jason was super communicative and a convenient host otherwise though. The check in process was super easy and he usually responded to messages/any needs quickly!

I will say, we booked last minute so maybe that had something to do with the apartment not being fully clean, but if it’s listed as available then it should be in the right condition to rent out OR it should be communicated that the space isn’t clean for some reason or something.   

This listing has a lot of potential and an amazing location!! Thank you again, Jason!

author: Loretta
comments: Excellent location, easily accessible, and responses were fast and efficient.

author: Ricardo
comments: Jason is a great host and the apartment was amazing! Great location and beautiful view!

author: Kevin
comments: Amazing, amazing place to stay! Booked super last minute and Jason was quick to respond and answer my questions. The space is in a very convenient location and was very comfortable. Will definitely refer to other people and will book again.

author: William
comments: Can't overstate how incredible the view is from this apartment. Super close to everything downtown, but also a good place if you just want to lay low for a night and watch netflix!

author: Ali
comments: great place! great location everything you can think of very close by

author: Kristen
comments: I had a fantastic stay at Jason’s condo. He was incredibly responsive and provided clear instructions to check in. The space itself was exactly as described and was very modern with all the amenities you’d need. Plus the view was outstanding!!!! I’d absolutely stay again and 100% recommend this condo to anyone who wants to stay in the perfect location in Toronto.

author: Massi
comments: great place, close to everything! would come back again

author: Isiah
comments: Good location, good views

author: Katrina
comments: Was my first time doing Airbnb and did NOT disappoint! Had a wonderful stay. View was absolutely amazing, as well as the whole room, and in the best location.  Check in was quick and easy too! Keeping a look out to stay here again!

author: Maxime
comments: Phil was kind. The location was pretty good, close to lake Ontario.A little small for a family of 4. And the caught's mattress wasn't enough comfortable.

author: David
comments: This is a great place in a nice neighborhood!  It is very well kept and the houses around here are beautiful. Note that the entrance is downstairs from the front door and you need to buy a pass for on street overnight parking. The apartment is clean and we even got a bottle of wine and package of popcorn! Also Phil had literature available to help us decide what to do. We love Toronto and the shops and parks are great!

author: Elizabeth
comments: The place was very cute and cozy! A cute little neighborhood that was very busy. Close parking was a little difficult to find on the street especially if you're not great at parking. We appreciated the nice surprise treat when we arrived. The bed was also very comfy and I liked the fact that there were extra blankets available. Short walk to public transit. A more clear explanation on where to enter exactly into the suite would have been helpful since it was very difficult to see at night. I would stay here again!

author: Shestin
comments: Super cute neighborhood, easy access to public transportation

author: Nicole
comments:
Phil’s place was clean and had so many thoughtful details! There were many considerate touches throughout the place. Both the bed and couch bed were very comfortable. Also Phil was really easy to communicate with!
The reasons I rated this place 4 stars were:
1) While the location is awesome, attaining the parking permit was difficult. The Toronto City website didn’t work on my phone and constantly froze even on a computer. And after jumping through all the hoops to print, it ended up costing us $17 for a 48hr permit. 
2) You can easily hear anyone walking and talking upstairs. If you are a light sleeper maybe this isn’t the place for you. 
Otherwise we had a very enjoyable stay!

author: Mercedes
comments: Great value for our layover, thanks Phil!

author: Curtis
comments: Nice space in a great location and very welcoming host.

author: Natalie
comments: Neat little space to escape the busy hustle of Toronto, but close enough that you can get downtown fast! It was very nice to come back to this quiet place after exploring in the fast pace of Toronto

author: Jack
comments: Had a great time at this place. Was exactly what I was expecting  and very reasonably priced.

author: Julianne
comments: Great little apartment! Loved the place and the neighborhood. We only had 1 night to stay but would definitely go back to explore more.  Lots of trendy shops, restaurants etc not too far from the apartment. Phil was great with communication and the welcome champagne was a nice little extra perk.

author: Renaldo
comments: Great location and quick responses, it was a great stay

author: Gabriella
comments: awesome stay with Spencer!!

author: Filipe
comments: Spencer’s place is very well located, clean and good if you’re in town for a few days and want to enjoy the more cosmopolitan aspects of Toronto. The apartment is in the 2nd floor and there are two flights of stairs that can be challenging if you’re taking heavy luggage. Other than that, the apartment is as described. You wouldn’t regret staying here.

author: Erica
comments: Great location. Spencer’s place was easy to access and very private. Would recommend!

author: Morgan
comments: The place was clean when we arrived with more ammenities than expected. It's in a really cool area of Toronto with lots to do right out of the doorstep. We enjoyed our stay here very much.

author: Julie
comments: Our stay was good, it was a quiet and safe space. The location was the best part. Street parking was difficult to find so we ended up parking in a costly deck quite a few blocks away. The amenities were bare minimum and we were missing several items such as hand soap, a trash can outside of the bathroom, and enough sheets and towels for our three quests. It did not feel clean but it was acceptable. The balcony view isn’t great, and there’s a fan of some sort right outside of it that makes it unusable from the noise. If you’re not planning on spending much time in the apartment, it would be a good place to stay.

author: Abby
comments: This location is absolutely perfect to get to see all of Toronto! You’re close to plenty of shops and restaurants/cafes. Public transportation and paid parking are also less than a ten minute walk away. Inside is very clean and roomy, with a nice balcony too. Spencer gave detailed instructions on how to get in/out of the suite and was available for any sort of questions we had. I would definitely recommend traveling pairs to stay here!

author: David
comments: Spencer’s place was great, clean, comfortable, centrally located and an awesome value. Highly recommend staying here for any person or couple visiting Toronto, I’d certainly stay here again!

author: Caroline
comments: Very clean and minimal, as pictured. Check-in instructions were accurate and easy to follow. We parked in an overnight lot that cost around $18, we maybe could have found cheaper if we looked more but the location was awesome! So much to do and see right outside your door. Right now the patio looks out onto construction but we didn’t have any issues with noise. We appreciated the air conditioner. Overall a nice short stay.

author: Brandan
comments: cool space and perfect location!

author: Bilal
comments: Nice spot

author: Jemal
comments: The concierge will ask you questions but you really don't have to talk to them.

author: Corinne
comments: This place is bare bones.  If you need a spacious apartment in downtown Toronto consider it but be forewarned- the apartment is very noisy and bright  there are very few amenities or perks.  We stayed for a business trip (two colleagues) and appreciated the space but did not find it to be a great value.

author: Sana
comments: Great location.

author: Howard
comments: great value and location. could use some "sprucing up".  some small repairs and new coat of paint.

author: Dawn
comments: The condo was fine but not worth the $$. What started off at $188 CAD per night ended up with added fees to over $300 per night. Be mindful of your receipt as mine was sent in Euros instead of CAD or US dollars- the cost appeared less than it really was. For that price we would have rather stayed at a hotel in a more central location with fresh linens.  The condo is at LEAST a 25 minute walk to core shopping/ restaurants. The walls are dirty, bathroom cabinets were dirty. And after paying for the room you then get these odd check in instructions sent to you indicating not to talk to the concierge, and if anyone asks tell them you are visiting a friend, etc... We are grown adults who are legitimately paying to stay here. If your condo frowns at Air BNB then you should NOT have one! Guests should not be made to feel like they are sneaking around.  On top of that the main AirBNB customer service is rude and useless.  Jessica didn’t even begin responding to messages until less than 24 hours of our arrival time.  We would definitely NOT stay here again- I would rather spend that kind of money and energy at a hotel.

author: Souleyman
comments: Amazing view

author: S.
comments: Great location. Amazing view. Great communication. Would definitely book again

author: Brianna
comments: This place was just what I needed for a weekend getaway with my girls! Location was perfect right in the heart of Toronto and I couldn’t be more pleased with the space. It was clean, stylish, and cozy can’t wait to come back !

author: Jonathan
comments: Place was dope. Great location whether you're looking to party or sight see. Felt like everything was within a 20 minute walk or short cab ride.

author: Alana
comments: This was my favorite Airbnb to date! The place is close to everything if you can’t walk you can bike for under $10 or uber anywhere downtown for under $20! This is my 3rd time in Toronto and this place made it much more enjoyable. Quick responses, amazing view, spacious, just amazing!

author: Mari
comments: During bring big groups. Maybe four people. Make sure you are familiar with Toronto driving. The parking procedures are lengthy and time consuming. Plan ahead.

author: Cali
comments: Nice place, insane view!

author: Alaina
comments: Great place to stay while visiting Toronto! Very clean and comfortable with an amazing view. The host, Ev is very nice and responsive. Everything you need this place has! You will not be disappointed.

author: Taraya
comments: Great place to stay and very spacious! Right in the heart of downtown Toronto!

author: Brooke
comments: Ev was very responsive. An amazing location! Would definitely recommend and stay here again!

author: Samantha
comments: Great location with a great view. Unit is very clean and quite cute!  Parking however is a bit of a hassle however the host gives very concise instructions, on how to deal with parking.

author: Chip
comments: Great location!

author: Stacy
comments: Great Location, 5 minute walk to Union station. Host is very responsive.

author: Jamie
comments: This place was amazing. The view was beautiful and it’s close to everything.

author: Sai Jithendra
comments: It was ok. It’s not beautiful as in picture but it is very clean. No good temperature control, mattress and couches are of poor quality and couldn’t sleep well.

author: Zack
comments: Cool space!

author: Annie
comments: I stayed for one quick night and this is an incredibly clean space. Though you are sharing with a lot of other people it was quite and everyone was very tidy. It’s a great value.

author: Philip
comments: Perfect for a day or 2 in the city. Whether visiting friends at the University of Toronto or just in town to explore the city, this space offers you everything you need at a good price.

author: Bizhong
comments: Good value for the price. The particular room facing the street is a bit noisy. Other than that, great!

author: Ornella
comments: House is clean but rooms are much smaller than they appear in the pictures. WiFi did not work for the 4 days I stayed there. I called the host multiple times and the issue was not resolved. There is AC in the house but not in the room, just a little table fan. Overall it wasn’t a bad stay. However, host should work on posting information that accurately reflect the unit.

author: Demeara
comments: Nice place. Its central cooling so if possible try to have a place closer to the ground floor. Really nice area

author: Jayesh
comments: Good place to stay ! Location is great.

author: Deanna
comments: PaperBox Mgnt was in a wonderful area of Toronto. The host had amazing communication and our stay was unbothered. Cute small place to stay.

author: Katie
comments: My friend and I had a very nice stay while we were in Toronto, it was a cozy room to unwind after our day. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a simple room to stay in while traveling. Great continued communication with the hosts, their directions were very clear and helpful

author: Brian
comments: Absolutely stunning apartment with a great view and location. Super close to the CN tower and in walking distance to a lot of good restaurants. Jay and Nat were also super accommodating and welcoming. Definitely will try to stay here again if I’m ever in Toronto.

author: Alex
comments: Good place to stay w minimal amenities but perfect location

author: Elsa
comments: Great place!

author: Caitlin
comments:
This was a great Airbnb. All the notes aspects including central location, close to public transportation, stylish. Jay and Nat were quick with responding, and offered a welcome letter with local recommendations.

It’s smaller than it appears in photos, but was comfy for three of us for a few nights. The queen bed sinks too much for my liking, so much that I preferred sleeping in the full which was supportive and comfortable. 

Overall a great stay and I’d recommend it :)

author: Deirdre
comments: Nat and Jay have created a very stylish and comfortable apartment.  It is in a very central location within walking distance of all the tourist attractions and lake front.

author: Nathan
comments: Great space and location, spotless when I got there and hosts for back to me right away whenever I had questions

author: Esther
comments: Great communication and stylish condo. Would definitely stay again!

author: John
comments: Great price for such a nice place in a central location

author: Gaute
comments: Modern and stylish suite located in central Toronto in close distance to CN tower. We had a great stay.

author: Lora
comments: This is a lovely apartment in a very central location! Quick responses and detail oriented for check in process and parking info.

author: Katie
comments: This stay was amazing! Located in the perfect spot of Toronto with so many places to eat and things to do around you. The view from this stay was breath taking & definitely an experience. If I ever visit Toronto again I would most likely try to stay here again!

author: Olivia
comments: Wonderful view, location isn't the best of the best for shopping/older, more destination parts of Toronto but if you were to go for any sporting event at Rogers Centre or Scotiabank this would be perfect.  Would definitely stay here again though as it was accessible to everything and really easy to check-in and check-out

author: Justin
comments: The pictures doesn’t justify how amazing this condo was for me and my girlfriend. The views of the CN Tower are absolutely stunning. I have been to Toronto numerous times and this Airbnb by far was the best. The location is near the supermarket, liquor store, TD Bank, shopping centers and more. Martha was very attentive to us and accommodating. I’m coming back!

author: James
comments: This is a great deal with an amazing view!! I loved the location of this place. Tons of stuff to do around here. I highly recommend this room!!

author: Joshua
comments: You can not beat the view and the place is nice.

author: Abby
comments: This place is such a great value and with the best view in Toronto. The hosts were quick to reply and helpful with any needs. It was within walking distance of many things, such as restaurants and activities. We will definitely be back. Thanks!

author: Faye
comments: Amazing place to stay in Toronto!!!

author: Dillon
comments: Very clean, professional, and am amazing view. Great value for the price as well!

author: Jade
comments: The view of the city and CN Tower from this apartment  is truly magnificent. It is good size apartment and is very clean. Washer and dyer inside the apartment.

author: Shantel
comments: If you like to spend money without having an actual place to stay then I highly recommend this venue.  Host left us stranded at the airport with no address and no method for check in even after numerous contact attempts from Air BnB staff.

author: Tania
comments:
This place is very close to down town, lots of stores, restaurants and bares near by. at my arrival the place was very easy to find  very safe even at night. So nice to walk around, subway and public transportation is right there. 
Place is very clean,  easy instructions to check in and out. 
Very happy stay, two big thumbs up!!

author: Vrunda
comments: They do not provide basic amenities in the kitchen (like bounty) and in bedrooms (like hangers). The place is extremely noisy at night. Once the bathrooms in all floors were extremely dirty and the host took more than 2 hours to clean them. They provide very little value for the money they charge.

author: Peter
comments: Great place and real close to everything downtown.

author: Juana
comments: absolutely gross room , there was mold in the bathroom , spiders , mosquitoes, and iam allergic to them horrible pictures I took compared to the ones posted.

author: Anu
comments: Paperbox mgnt’s place has a great location and is really clean. Although the walls were thin hosts responded quickly to solve the issue.

author: Stephen
comments: Very clean, updated, well-appointed and well located. I have stayed at this property many times and reccomend it!

author: Majda
comments: Place was clean location not idea if you are not Oky driving downtown... if you are driving there is no parking available.

author: Janet
comments: Parking is not guaranteed. There are two spots for maybe 6 or 7 rooms. When we arrived and throughout the duration of our stay there was one car double parked in the two spots. When I called the host to resolve the issue he left me waiting for a call back While I was sitting in my car for a half hour and his only resolution when I finally called him back was to pay to park my car elsewhere. I had to get up and be back out to my car that was parked blocks away by 7 a.m. to renew the parking pass for the day. The place itself was nice for the price. It’s not bad for a day or two stay.

author: Bryce
comments: This was a clean and welcoming place to come back to after a long day. I would compare it to something like an upscale hostel, but every guest gets a private room. There's a shared kitchen space, and there were several other guests staying in the other rooms which made for a fair bit of noise from the loud hallways, but aside from that we had a comfortable time here.

author: Alberto
comments: Convenient location, good price, however, it was very noisy all night

author: Michael
comments: Exceptional location, great for a solo traveler. Hard to find this kind’ve value in the heart of Toronto. Ben was very responsive and accommodating.

author: Owen
comments: Small clean space with a great location for getting out to see the rest of the city, just a short walk to all sports of public transit.  Comfortable bed, slightly noisy but effective AC.  Would stay at again.

author: Tiffany
comments: It's an apartment with simple furnishings.  The cleanliness definitely exceeded my expectations.  It's  clear that Ben works hard to make the accommodations clean for every traveler.  The apartment is located in a building with several other apartments, which does mean that you as the person staying there are subject to the noise of those tenants.

author: Mary
comments: Cozy, clean and an absolutely amazing location in historic Old Toronto! Ben is a top-notch host: he gave us great tips on places to eat, communicated regularly, and very graciously provided us with muffins and croissants for for our morning, enabling us to get to our appointment. I would stay there again in a heartbeat and hope I’ll have the opportunity to do so.

author: Maite
comments: Good location

author: Murray
comments: Great location and price, could use some fix up and window clean touches. Communication was quite poor, might help if he had english speaking support

author: Andres
comments: Great location with all what you need for a short or long stay.

author: Jenna
comments: Ben is a great host!! Responds quick and is willing to help with anything. If you get the chance to stay here you definitely should.

author: Jenna
comments: A great spot in a great location! It has everything you need and is steps away from the city centre.

author: Erick
comments: Great place downtown, close to everything, highly recommend it. Ben is very througtfull as well.

author: Katharine
comments: Amazing view!

author: Jason
comments: Great location, amazing view, great space, communication, and value! Would love to stay with Cherry again!

author: Kendra
comments: Beautiful place and view, super convenient location. Thank you Cherry!

author: Angela
comments: This place was amazing!!!!! Super clean and a great view.

author: Jena
comments: Awesome location.

author: Kristopher
comments: Wonderful location and view of the city. It’s close to everything we wanted to do. I would stay there again!

author: Cloie
comments: Cherry’s place was perfect for a little weekend girls get away! The view is insane and the whole place was so clean. The place had perfect amount of room, and the location you can’t beat! Would totally recommend!

author: Christy
comments: If you are looking for a spectacular view, amazing host, and with in walking distance to almost everything you could want this place is for you!!!  We had a wonderful time and Cherry was absolutely lovely and extremely helpful with anything we needed.

author: Mary
comments: Amazing views! Clean and fully equipped apartment. Centrally located in the midst of plenty of action. Cherry was very accommodating and helpful. A great value for a getaway!

author: Cara
comments:
Overall, we had a great experience with Cherry. She was very quick to respond and the check in and check out were very simple. 

The views in the unit were amazing! Location was great and very convenient for getting anywhere in the city.

It would have been nice to have some extra towels (we had 4 small towels for 4 people), top sheets, additional linens, and bath mats. There are no curtains of any kind on the large living room windows. The sun in the afternoon is very intense and makes it difficult to sit in the main room. If you are sleeping in that room you will definitely want a sleep mask.

We had a wonderful trip to Toronto!!

author: Thomas
comments: Super convenient location and wonderful hospitality, excellent stay for a great value.  will return!

author: Kristen
comments: Mercedeh is amazing! She and her husband are some of the nicest people. I stayed in a bedroom with a private bath and it was a great size especially just for me. I mostly spend time out of the house as I was only in Toronto for a few days and I wanted to see as much of the city as possible. Anytime I was coming or going either she or her husband would offer me some coffee or tea or something to eat. Any question that I had about how to get around they would answer. She is also a lovely person to chat with and she has the kindest soul. The area is actually very central to a lot of areas such as The Distillery District and downtown. Very easy to navigate around the area. I highly recommend staying here if you are taking a vacation to Toronto. The bedroom was sparkling clean and spacious. Also her location is in a safe area as I often walked by myself in the evening and it's easy to navigate around. I highly recommend this location for travellers.

author: Zihe
comments: Mercedeh is a wonderful host. My flight was delayed and arrived in the middle of the night, yet she greeted me and offered me food, water, anything I wanted. I really appreciate all her help. Her house is in a great location, an easy walk to the St. Lawrence Market and downtown attractions.

author: Bob
comments: The host was helpful with communications and welcomed a late check-in. Nice room and I was treated like family.  Thank You,

author: Connor
comments: Mercedeh is the most genuinely nice host I have ever stayed with.

author: Jake
comments: Easy check in and great communication! Awesome value for the private bedroom with bathroom in the room. Comfy bed and the place was very accurately as described and pictured. Very close to distillery district and not a bad walk to heart of downtown. Would stay again!

author: Karen
comments: Amazing place and it's located in a good place for visit Toronto.

author: Tia
comments: This is a perfect location to explore Toronto from. It is in easy walking distance to everything and Mercedeh was a fabulous hostess. She will welcome you and make you feel at home even in a strange city. the accommodations were excellent and very reasonable. I would recommend this especially for solo travelers who might need a welcoming home and someone to provide suggestions.

author: Lexi
comments: Mercedeh and her husband are wonderful hosts. They are warm and welcoming. The amenities and rooms are nice, and the location is great for the historic district.

author: Kathryn
comments: Wonderful place to stay!  It was my first AirBNB booking, and I hope they're all this nice.  I was able to walk everywhere from here, and Mercedeh is a great hostess.

author: Elka
comments: Jessica’s place has beautiful views, especially the sunrise. Good location for restaurants and entertainment. The condo was very spacious with nice high ceilings, too.

author: Derek
comments: Great view of the city and perfect location!

author: Morgan
comments: You cannot get a better value stay than at Jessica’s place. With spectacular high rise views of the entire city of Toronto (including the CN Tower, downtown, and the Scotiabank Arena) alongside an amazing location literally on top of the Scotiabank Arena, you cannot ask for anything better.

author: Ruby
comments: This apartment was in a great location and had an awesome view. However the listing was quite misleading. We chose mainly based on size and parking. The listing mentioned having on site parking available however Jessica mentioned 2 days prior to our trip that we had to find parking off site at a parking garage. The photos also show a much larger space, it was significantly smaller than the pictures make it seem. We were also asked to hide the fact that we were staying at an Airbnb to anyone in the building. Which was uncomfortable. Was a great location and we still enjoyed our stay, however we will find a different Airbnb for our next trip.

author: Desean
comments: Great view and great location. A short walk from a lot of attractions and buildings. Jessica, responded in a timely fashion and was very helpful. Would book again!

author: Champa
comments: Great view of the CN tower and rest of GTA. The place was very clean and came with all appliances, and especially enjoyed the pool/hot tub in the building in the evening. Central location gives access to almost everything including interesting restaurants for those that aren't from the area.

author: Chun Peng
comments: The place was clean and close to major attractions in downtown Toronto. However, the entire apartment was missing multiple shade panels for the window, which resulted in no privacy at all given the distance between the apartment and the neighboring buildings. We even had to get changed in the bathroom. We reached out and was told that the quickest date to get it fixed was the day of our check out. We weren’t sure if this was a persistent issue since if the shades were to be broken by the previous guests and the owner didn’t know about this, there would be broken shade parts remaining on the floor. Instead, there weren’t any broken shade/curtain parts remaining. Another complaint we had was the neighbor playing loud music at night, which was quite annoying. Overall experience was unsatisfactory since we weren’t really able to feel comfortable staying at the place.

author: Catherine
comments: We went to a Leafs game and this was the perfect location just steps from Scotiabank Arena! Beautiful view of the city and CN tower, definitely an added bonus!

author: Kevin
comments: Absolutely Amazing Location! Walking Distance To Several Locations! Stunning Views! The Place Was As Described If Not Better. Highly Recommend This Place To Anyone!

author: Brian
comments: Jessica is a great host and the place is very nice. Amazing views and great location

author: Jordan
comments: Rodney's attention to detail and constant micromanaging of his beautiful home was refreshing. You won't find a better place, his sets the bar very high.

author: Lauren
comments: Overall, we had an amazing time in this Airbnb. The neighborhood was safe, fun and Rodney was an awesome host! Had a great experience!!

author: Jessi
comments: I had the best night's sleep here. Also I love being able to utilize a code to enter an airbnb and also having a lock on a bedroom door, makes me feel really safe. The value was great for this space.

author: Michael
comments:
Staying here was a great choice! It's fairly close to many local restaurants, the subway, and the light rail; no more than a 10-15 minute walk away. 
The house itself is clean and cozy, especially with Gnüdles around!

author: Michael
comments: Easy check in, Rodney is a friendly and knowledgeable host. Nice breakfast in the morning. Great bright room and a large house and big kitchen. Really good location in the Bloordale village right on the busline ,which runs late and a few blocks from the Landsdowne subway station. Overall a great stay, and I'd be happy to book Rodney's place again.

author: Elisey
comments: Convenient location near Lansdowne metro station. Everything was as expected/pictured. Floor is a bit squeeky. Rodney was very hospitable! Three nights went by quick.

author: Mary
comments: We stayed for 2 nights and we felt really comfortable with his house. The Location is walking distance from Subway Station. The host was really friendly and understanding as well as fast responds. We enjoyed the days in this house and in Toronto. We will definetely come back to this house once we have chance to visit Toronto again. Thank you.

author: Kevin
comments: Rodney's place is great for what it offers, a no-frills stay with your basic essentials covered near downtown Toronto.

author: Miranda
comments: Rodney is an amazing host and his home is clean, bright and welcoming. He’s incredibly fast at replying and is helpful with suggestions on things to do in the city. His location isn’t far from downtown Toronto, but his neighborhood and surrounding areas are full of cute cafés, shops, and even some microbreweries. Multiple public transportation stops along his street provides an easy way to get around town. We will definitely look into staying here again when we come back to Toronto!

author: Nancy
comments:
Rodney is pay attention to all details to make guest comfortable,
extra clean sheet and many towel available in your room, I enjoy the keyless lock, very convenience to guest.
keep the house worm in the winter season, is a plus.
very clean bathroom and kitchen. 
take a public transportation is the best way to go. no need a rental car.

author: Michael
comments: This place was perfect and Nick was very responsive and made the place feel at home. The amenities were well stocked and it created a very enjoyable experience. I would absolutely stay at nicks place again.

author: Morgan
comments: The space was warm and enjoyable. Located near activities and restaurants, our stay was made easy thanks to this host.

author: Charlotte
comments: Clean apartment that is well designed. Great location!

author: Lindsay
comments: Everything was as expected, if not better, from the listing. So very well designed and maintained, this was a clean space with countless small details that made it feel like a home away from home. Nick communicated well, making the checkin process easy. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend this space to anyone.

author: Mary
comments: This place was just the peaceful getaway we were looking for! The location was perfect for my husband and I, and we are looking forward to coming back in the future. Thank you for making us feel at home in Canada. They were super helpful and flexible, giving us a chance to truly enjoy the city. Thanks!

author: Stephan
comments: Nick's place is charming and homely. Very clean, neat, and comfortable. This was a great place to return to after a busy day.

author: Rayel
comments: We LOVED Nick's place. It was sparkling clean, the appliances were gorgeous, the shower, bed, and over feel of the place was comfortable and minimalistic but also eclectic. El Pocho's was delicious and right across the street! Overall, good time. Thank you for having us!

author: Ana
comments: Perfect location, very clean place.

author: Katie
comments: Everything at this airbnb was wonderful! The nespresso machine was a nice added touch. Very clean and full of character. Would recommend to anyone!

author: Julie
comments: Wonderful little place to stay :) Very clean and put together.

author: Mike
comments: Amazing place

author: Aaron
comments:
Staying in Jennifer and Joseph’s place was a delight. It was a very homey feel, with great amenities. This space was in a prime location in Toronto, with dozens of bars and restaurants.

I highly recommend!

author: Mike
comments: Great location & skyline view!

author: Jed
comments: Better than I expected, the condo was clean and spacious for two. It was so close to CN tower and a 5 min walk to the train station. Would recommend to anyone. Jennifer and Joseph always responded to my questions and concerns and always checked up on me if there were any concerns through my stay, to me I appreciate that very much. 5/5!

author: Thomas
comments: I use AIRBNB exclusively for work and I travel a lot, this was one of the best ones I’ve had.  Walking distance to great food and experiences, and overall was a lovely experience.

author: Blake
comments:
As expected! 
Great Location / Clean & Sexy Condo / Very Responsive Host! 
BOOK IT!

author: Kayla
comments: Perfect location and in a very nice building, we enjoyed our stay at Jennifer and Jospehs apartment!

author: Nerissa
comments:
Stunning!!!

The apartment was super clean and beautifully decorated plus the view was amazing!  Check-In was fast and simple - the host was very responsive throughout the duration of my stay.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a convenient + trendy spot downtown!

author: Austin
comments: Wonderful location! Very convenient walking distance to just about everything I wanted to see in Toronto.

author: Jade
comments: Joseph’s place is very nice. Only the bedroom was a little dirty.

author: Meyer
comments: You can expect a charming space and hosts who care and pay attention to detail. The home has many thoughtful touches and is inviting. WARNING: You might grow attached  ;). This is a real gem of a space and a gem of a host!

author: Dorcas
comments: Very nice home in quiet neighborhood. Close to public transportation. Clean, cozy, stylish updated. Would definitely stay again.

author: Marcquis
comments: Brent and Lori's place is absolutely amazing.  We rented it for valentine's day for a couple's  retreat and it was absolutely amazing. The place is newly renovated and has a great cozy feel. The space and amenities are awesome and Brent and Lori are absolutely gracious and responsive hosts.  Absolutely recommend their place,  unless I need it..... lol

author: Shanique
comments: Great Place to stay and very clean. Brent and Lori were awesome host. I would definitely stay here again.

author: Elizabeth
comments: 10/10 would recommend. Such a perfect place!

author: Birgit
comments: Our family of 6 came from California to visit family and see Toronto. The home fit out needs. Brent is a gracious host and was there to greet us and answer any questions. We all enjoyed our stay. We would definitely recommend Brent and Lori’s place!

author: Abbie
comments: The home is beautiful and has every amenity you could possibly need for a successful trip! Brent and Lori keep the home spotless, complete with extremely comfortable bedrooms and well kept bathrooms . 10/10 recommend and will very likely return!

author: Huiyuan
comments: Brent and Lori and really nice and location is in the middle of North York and York, convenient for us to visit the city.

author: Tanzy
comments: This is a great space for bigger groups! Brett and Lori were super quick to respond and very helpful!

author: Frederic
comments: Brent and Lori were wonderful hosts.  We arrived very late on a Friday and Brent was up late and again early on Saturday to make sure we had everything we needed including the parking permit needed to park a rental car.  The house is charming on a quiet street.  The rooms are super comfortable - a nice place to rest and refuel from hectic Toronto.

author: Ben
comments: This place is a perfect cozy retreat, but right next to the heart of the city. Mark was fantastic at communication and made the place feel like home. It's right near Queen Street, with a variety of bars/restaurants/shops and is only 10-15 minutes away from downtown Toronto. Awesome find!

author: Jeff
comments: Had a wonderful stay at Mark's place. Bed is comfortable, but very soft. Worth noting if you prefer a firm matress. Space had lots of thoughtful touches and the location cannot be beat. It is for sure a basement, so be prepared for that.

author: Kevin
comments: Easy to get to - away from the madness of downtown Toronto but close enough for everything to be easily accessible (we used Lyft to avoid having to find parking spots in congested areas).  And speaking of parking spots - the one behind Mark's place was a real plus.  He's a very thoughtful host who truly cares about his guests being comfortable.  We'd stay there again for sure!

author: Laura
comments: Great location and Mark was a great host!

author: Chris
comments: By far the most cozy place I’ve stayed in. Definitely would recommend. If you’re looking for a place where parking isn’t an issue, I would also say this is the best place to stay.

author: Andrea
comments: Marks space is cozy and clean! He goes the extra step to make you feel welcome. :-)

author: Allison
comments:
The location is outstanding. Easily within walking distance to dozens of delicious bars, cafes, and restaurants. Wonderful little home away from home. Mark is welcoming and kind. 

One note: the ceiling was lower than we expected. This didn't take away from the excellent location, but fair warning to any extra tall travelers.

author: Paul
comments: Great spot, very clean and comfortable.

author: Tom
comments: Our second stay with Mark.  Great value in the heart of a great neighborhood.  Looking forward to returning there.

author: Elizabeth
comments: Mark's studio was quaint and a great place for rest during our trip. He has great suggestions and is very helpful and knowledgeable on the area. His responses were always clear and quickly penned. The area surrounding his place is beautiful and very much worth exploring. All of the personal touches and suggestions ensured that we had an amazing stay in the Leslieville/Toronto area.

author: Andrew
comments: Wonderful place to stay!!

author: Joe
comments: Amazing location. Renata is so communicative and friendly.  Place is clean and well decorated.  Great view.  Nice bed.  Lots of clean towels and shower amenities.   Very comfortable.  One of the best experiences ever.

author: Amanda
comments: Apartment was perfect! The view and location was amazing.. check in and check out was super easy and Renata was easy to contact and met all of our needs. The apartment had everything we needed to make our stay perfect. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone looking for a nice weekend get away.

author: Talaya
comments: This place is better than you expect. The view is everything, along with the decor and design— this stay feels very upscale. We had coffee in the morning from what was provided in the condo. In addition, the location is so prime, there’s a Tim hortons walking distance. Really the location could not be better. I will say finding the parking garage and the parking spot was not the easiest upon check in, especially if you’re from the states, our parking garages are a little different. But Renata sent detailed instructions that I’d be sure to follow upon check in to make it as easy as possible. Definitely will be back, this condo and host are awesome!

author: Erica
comments: Renata’s place is beautiful and very clean! The views are amazing!! The building is conveniently located minutes away from Union Station, the arena, CN tower and a ton of good food and shopping. I will definitely be staying here again the next time I’m in Toronto!

author: Dan
comments: Great place

author: Juan
comments: I honestly can’t put into words how amazing this apartment is. A view of the heart of Toronto from any window. Renata made check in a breeze and has everything you could as for in the apartment. Ice condos is a great place to stay and having an awesome host is the cherry on top.

author: Garrett
comments: Great place! Definitely would stay again!

author: Scot
comments: Fantastic! Not only are they a great host but the apartment is jaw dropping amazing. Falling asleep to the glow of the Toronto skyline is on your bucket list. Trust me. Can not recommend more! Book it!

author: Christopher
comments: Beautiful place with an amazing view of Toronto. It was a wonderful stay, Renata was a great host and check-in was smooth.

author: Hunter
comments: Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in! It was very clean and comfortable. It had everything needed and more!

author: Chyna
comments: MJ’s place was quaint, quiet, and easily accessible. A travelers dream if you will. Quick ride from the airport, close to restaurants of all kinds, and an easy stay. Stylish comfortable space and the fireplace is a perfect winter accessory..

author: Abdul
comments: Great location

author: Melissa
comments: A great place that was a lot more spacious than we expected! We had a lovely and relaxing stay. :)

author: Sierra
comments: Mj’s place was perfect! A nice spot for relaxing after a busy day in the city.

author: Charles
comments: MJ’s place was perfect for our needs. We had an overnight layover in Toronto and didn’t want to stay too far away from the airport. This location is about halfway between the airport and downtown so you won’t be in the middle of everything if that’s what you’re looking for, but it was exactly what we wanted. The space was very comfortable with an electric fireplace for warmth, a nice tv to watch some Netflix or play a few games, and a kettle to make coffee in the morning. It was exactly as described and communication was great!

author: Jamal
comments: Mj’s place was very nice and cozy and perfect for our overnight stay before an early morning flight at Pearson. It is about a 10 minute easy drive without traffic to the airport. Very roomy and clean with the right amount of amenities provided. Will def be staying here again. Mj was very attentive and quick to reply.

author: Alex
comments: Great place for great value. We checked in late because of flights, but check in was easy and had zero hiccups. The place is clean, quaint, and cozy.

author: Alika
comments: MJ is fantastic. He is super nice and took very good care to make sure everything was in order.The place is very clean and nice. An absolute steal

author: Yannen
comments: I love it!! Very clean and beautiful apartment, the host are very kind.

author: Deya
comments: The condo is very nice and lavish. The view is incredible! Very close to downtown and lots of places to visit that are close-by. Noura is a wonderful host, she replies quick and is very helpful. Thank you again Noura for the incredible experience!

author: Khalil
comments: The place was very ideal for our 4-day stay in Toronto. Very stylish and close to many eateries and other destinations downtown. It was clean and I felt very comfortable to stay there. Noura was quick with responding and was there for us if we ever had any questions. Overall an excellent stay.

author: LaShawn
comments: The place was everything we expected it to be. The view was amazing. The location was awesome. And Noura was an exceptional hostess. Will definitely book again!

author: Ngawang
comments: The location is very convenient and is right in the hub of Toronto by the lake. The condominium was cozy and overall just as you see in the photos. The viewing of the city from the balcony is superb. Noura is very courteous and was well responsive to all questions. Great find.

author: Peter
comments: Great host and space. Awesome communication.

author: Esther
comments: We enjoyed our stay, however the space was much smaller and much less modern/updated than pictured. There was also not much of a view but the residence and amenities were nice. Overall, it was convenient and clean, just not the best value with the add-ons per guest and for parking.

author: Nicholas
comments: Noura was an incredible host and everything in this place was as advertised. Close to restaurants and city centre.  Extremely clean!

author: Alexus
comments: I enjoyed staying here.

author: Travis
comments: Noura is a very hospitable host. She is very communicative, and her place is very cozy and comfortable. Very close to notable attractions in Toronto! I'd recommend her place to any  one and would definitely stay again!

author: Jeremy
comments: Very nice place. Noura was a great help.

author: Danielle
comments: This place is great! Great value, great view, and super clean and cozy. I did not quite realize how truly close it was to many popular attractions (CN tower is literally across the street) and also close to a path by the lake that is convenient for running. I would definitely go back here next time we are in Toronto!

author: Stephen
comments: Great space.  Excellent hosts!

author: David
comments: Clean, comfortable condo in a convenient location.  Great 33rd floor balcony looking out at the city, lake and CN Tower.  Safe, easy walk to many attractions, theaters, bars and restaurants.  Building and garage are very secure.  Check in and parking instructions were spot on, with no issues checking in after hours.  We would definitely stay here again.

author: Serena
comments: Erin and Carole’s place is a perfect location for visiting a new city like Toronto.  Right in the middle of the best restaurants and bars in downtown. It’s kept very clean and neat and has everything you would need. We did not once say “I wish this place had this...”. Not to mention it has a balcony with a beautiful view of the CN Tower and Lake Ontario. Erin and Carole are great at communicating and answered all messages very quickly. Definitely in our top Airbnb stays!

author: Yves
comments:
Fantastic location, wonderful apartment, and very detailed hosts. The value of this place is fantastic; the view is marvelous, the beds are comfy, and the place as a whole is best put as stylish.
Check-in and check-out were an absolute breeze, and we loved being able to walk wherever we pleased in the downtown core. As others have mentioned, since this is in a high-rise there can be a little bit of a wait for the elevators, but that's a fair trade-off for the stunning view. We managed to snag this on extremely short notice and the hosts were very prompt. You would be remiss NOT to book this place!

author: Valerie
comments: Very nice space. Close to CN Tower with amazing view.

author: Lauren
comments: We were in town for the marathon. Was a perfect home base for comfort and location. Exactly as pictured and very clean. We loved our stay and highly recommend this apartment. Thank you Andreanne and Carole!

author: Nick
comments: Great location and amazing views. Perfect launching pad for enjoying the city!

author: Kathryn
comments: Great location, close to everything. Easy key pick up and drop off. The hosts were fast with responding to our questions which is always nice!  Overall, a lovely place to stay!

author: Trish
comments: Great place and location!

author: Nikhil
comments: Perfect place to feel at home. Clean, good location, safe neighborhood, beautiful view. Natalia was very prompt in replying to all the questions. One of the my best airbnb experiences.

author: Anthony
comments: Great stay, enjoyed the view

author: Nick
comments: Cozy apartment with plenty of amenities , good location.

author: Emily
comments: This place is in a great location, plus parking is such a great benefit. The bed was very comfortable and the property is well equipped in case you need to cook yourself a meal. Great place overall, host is sweet.

author: Manasa
comments: Great host! Would definitely stay again!

author: Nicholas
comments: Great space,great location, free parking is awesome but was confusing to navigate the garage.

author: Sandra
comments: This is a great location to explore Toronto, with the added benefit of parking.

author: Elizabeth
comments: My first Airbnb experience & it was amazing. I will definitely stay here again !!!

author: Andy
comments: Great location.  Cozy and stylish unit.  Super responsive hosts.  Good value!

author: Coretta
comments: Quick responses, clean place, and definitely a home away from home!

author: Dantae
comments: By far one of the best airbnb I have stayed in. Great spot an not too far city. Joanna and Chris were great host.

author: Haile
comments: Cute and cozy apartment that was very quiet. Hosts were very welcoming and hands off. I would defintely stay again!

author: Yuelin
comments: Area is not too far from downtown Toronto and is a great choice to wind down after a day of exploring. Free parking and a private entrance as well as a stylish apartment make this place a great choice! Felt like a home away from home.

author: Aleisha
comments: I enjoyed my stay here! Joanna was very accommodating with my need to check in early due to work time constraints. The apartment was quiet and private. We were able to cook our meals easily with all the necessary kitchen supplies provided. The rooms were nicely decorated and cozy! It was definitely a little home away from home! Joanna was quick to respond to my messages, which was so helpful for planning my trip. Thank you Joanna and Chris! Very nice to meet you!

author: Maria Elena
comments: Wonderful and cozy place. Loved the cleanliness and easy access in and out. Would definitely stay with them again.

author: Carolyn
comments: Lovely modern apartment. Comfortable and very m ce

author: Niall
comments: Great apartment, great location, 10’mims walk to train, and great hosts. A definite place to stay in Toronto.

author: Gus
comments: Great people, great place, great apto, awesome location,  all went well with Joanna. Thank you for having us At your place, your hone has an excellent atmosphere

author: Kayla
comments: Wonderful, wonderful place. This was my first time renting an AirBnB, and Joanna answered all of my many questions quickly and efficiently, and made my significant other and I feel very comfortable. Beautiful home, great location, and amazing hospitality:)

author: Lori
comments: Close to the GO train station, and Bluffs park and beach, the spot was convenient for us. Although we spent a fair amount of time in the city, we also enjoyed relaxing in the back yard and watching Netflix. Joanna was very hospitable and the space was very clean and comfortable.

author: Douglas
comments: Great stay and friendly host. I would recommend

author: Jarita
comments: This condo is in a fantastic location close to restaurants, transit and nightlife. The unit was super clean and it was very easy to get in touch with this host if anything came up.

author: Adam
comments: Clean modern place. Great location for downtown. Would stay again.

author: Jeannie
comments: Great place to stay . Conveniently located to bars, restaurants and lounges . Walkable location . Some am construction however not unbearable . Host responded to question via app within a reasonable time .

author: Sydney
comments: Great downtown location, very stylish and clean space. Definitely recommend!!

author: Jarred
comments: Thank s

author: Thomas
comments: Wonderful spot in a great area - strongly recommend!

author: Alexandra
comments: All about location with this one! I stayed here while I was attending a conference. I had to come in early to help set up and then stayed a few days to attend.  It was all within walking distance and a great walk every time. Awesome food and restaurants super close to the listing, and a supermarket literally half a block away. I slept like a log and enjoyed the gym in the building. Internet was fast and I loved the little balcony. Thanks for a great stay!

author: Erich
comments: I was in town for business for a night, and Shawn's place was a great alternative to a hotel at a much better price. Excellent location, clean. I probably would choose a different place if I were with my family, as it's more like a hotel, less like a home, but for a solo business traveler for a night or two, it's perfect.

author: Athena
comments: Shawn's place was perfect for my work trip! It was super conveniently located and easy to get to. I walked everywhere and found this to be a great neighborhood. The space is well laid out and had everything I needed, including laundry. Shawn was communicative and helpful when I had questions. Would stay again!

author: Kathi And John
comments: Superb quiet, central and safe location in The Annex. The owners are very helpful and communicative, and the space was very clean. While it may not be the kind of place you want to stay if you are planning to spend a lot of time in your room (but who does that in Toronto?!): the celings are low and there is minimal daylight through two small high windows. But we were out and about each day and those minor drawbacks didn't bother us at all. We will stay here again when we visit the area.  Thanks to Chris and Quinn for your hospitality!

author: Emily
comments: I am so glad that I chose to stay here! Overall, it was a really awesome stay! The only downside - as others have said - is that the ceilings are a bit low and the bathroom is on the smaller side. But, it's totally worth it! The location is absolutely perfect and you're able to walk to just about everything you could want. We only had to use Uber when the weather got drastically colder and it started snowing. The place itself is really nice - simple, but sparkling clean and stylish. We had everything we needed, and Chris stayed in contact with us, making sure we were doing good, and ensured that we had an amazing experience. This was definitely one of my favorite stays through Airbnb :)

author: Sam
comments: Cozy place with nice amenities and very conveniently located

author: Rico
comments: Host was very friendly. We are coming back and stay here again

author: Cynthia
comments: Great location; close to fantastic restaurants and mass transit

author: Laura
comments: Great location and communication between us and the host. They helped us secure a parking permit and were really responsive. Highly recommended for folks who wish you use public transport or to walk places!

author: Natasha
comments:
We stayed at Quinn and Chris’s place for three nights this summer, and here is the list of of pros and cons as they appeared to me. 

Pros: 1.Good location. Most of the places were an easy Uber/Lyft ride away. And we had a very easy and pleasant walk to Kensington market. The neighborhood is lovely too and safe to walk around at night. 
2. Quinn and Chris were very helpful in accommodating our sudden need for a car parking spot. They printed out the permit and had it ready for us almost as soon as we asked. I also found them easier to reach through text messages than over the airbnb app.
3. The space itself is large and roomy though the bathroom is tiny. The kitchen serves well for quick and easy breakfast needs and it was stocked with staples such as butter/sugar/tea/ coffee/ necessary spices and so on. 
Cons: 1. The apartment listing mentions that the ceiling is low and might be a challenge for people who are 6’2 and over. However my husband who is a shade under 6ft had to continuously walk with his head bent in the hallway. Plus with the bathroom being small and the ceiling being low , the light there was almost at his temple. And after three days of walking with head tilted sideways he was thoroughly fed up. 
2. Since this is a basement apartment sounds do carry quite a bit from upstairs. 
3. The bedsheets and towels were all cleaned and washed, but bore mild stains from prior usage.

author: Johann
comments: Great place to stay. I would like to start saying that Quinn was really a great host, helping us to find a spot to park our car and flexible with the check in time. The studio is located in a great old-residential neighborhood. It is well equipped for couples or one person, who look for a good place to rest, get a good shower, have a good sleep and eat some easy food before go out. Is really close to the university of Toronto, Casa loma, Yorkville (best spot in town) and Kensington area but you have to walk or Uber your way. I’m not quite sure about the public transportation in the area. I will stay again for sure.

author: Jake
comments: Great location, great space for a couple!

author: Madeline
comments: Great find! Pictures are accurate, extremely walkable location, and the hosts are very easy to reach with any questions. The outstanding and comfortable stay helped make Toronto unforgettable!

author: Sarah
comments: This place is a perfect little cabin with extremely comfortable places to sit/sleep! It felt cozy and calm and I highly recommend it.

author: Brian
comments:
The place is magical. Once you make your way back, beyond the lanterns and foliage, down the flagstone path-- you're in for a treat. The house is removed from noise, perfectly decorated, and so warm-feeling. Everything you need (including laundry, Netflix, and a written history of the house) is included. The kitchen contains everything you need (no microwave, but an oven and fridge), down to magnetic spice jars. The lofted space is warm and cozy. Just a street away are shops, restaurants, bookstores etc-- Toronto is a short drive/Uber away.
While I encountered no issues, Brett was very kind and communicative. I highly recommend this property/Brett. It was a magical experience, and we truly felt at home.

author: Ann
comments: Brett’s little hide-away was so charming. He has thought of everything when it comes to making his guests feel at home. My husband and I had a chance to unwind for a few days.  Had such a nice stay!

author: Sheena
comments: Beautiful spot in a nice area, so many thoughtful touches, easy and positive communication with the owner.

author: Matt
comments: Brett was awesome, and the tiny house was a lovely change of pace. Really enjoyed it :)

author: Jessica
comments: Simply amazing!! The place was so cute, cozy, and well maintained. Will stay here again whenever we return to Toronto :)

author: Jesika
comments: This was a great location, and it felt like home.

author: Shannon
comments: Absolutely loved this little place! Brett made my girlfriend and I feel extremely welcomed. Definitely a perfect place to stay if you’re in the area!

author: Amy
comments: Wonderful stay, great location, excellent communication. Brett’s place was cozy and quaint. Access to his place was a breeze. A perfect get away.

author: Katie
comments: A great hideaway! The cottage is perfect for two people. Made for a cozy weekend. Highly recommend if you’re staying in Toronto! We were also able to walk around to different parts of the city from the house.

author: Phan
comments: great location

author: Arjun
comments: Great location. It's clean and convenient. The only problem I felt was the noise. The walls are too thin and it gets noisy. If anyone is moving around in the night then it can easily wake you.

author: Neil
comments: Fine for a single night stay, although felt more like a college dorm than a B&B.

author: Timothy
comments:
Cons:
-Thin walls, bring ear plugs
-Slow wifi
-Room wasn't clean when we arrived, even though we were later than expected.
-Photos not completely accurate
Pros:
-Good value
-Good location
-Responsive host

author: Catherine
comments: Room was exactly as expected.

author: Daniela
comments: It’s a really good place, location, room and bathroom clean.

author: John
comments: Pretty good deal and a nice spot for a few nights!

author: Omar
comments: I had the chance to stay for 2 nights at this location. The room was as described by the host. Everything was clean and check in was super easy and convenient. However, the washroom on my floor lacked warm water and I didn't have access to room temperature control. I also had problems with the WiFi connectivity and the inescapable noises. As other people mentioned you can't avoid these noises due to guests going up and down the stairs, opening and closure of the house's main door or other rooms' doors, the noise might be very disturbing so be prepared.  The parking spots were occupied the whole day and it's very difficult to find a free parking spot in the area.

author: Rosalie
comments: The space is really lovely, clean, and comfortable. Check-in and parking were super easy. It was a tad noisy as the doors are heavy and people were letting them slam when they went to the bathroom, etc. Overall, great location and quality!

author: Kristy
comments: The check-in process was easy. The room was spectacularly clean. The on-site parking was a wonderful thing.

author: Meredith
comments: You cannot beat the location of this apartment, and the view is beautiful. Martha was super accommodating towards us, and left thoughtful touches throughout the apartment. Cannot recommend this place more!

author: Jesse
comments: Martha was great with communicating and very accommodating

author: Yajing
comments: Martha is a really responsive host! The room is neat and nice! The view is amazing! I had a great experience staying here!

author: Sara
comments: Amazing view and perfect for a couple.

author: April
comments: We absolutely loved our stay in Toronto. The location was PERFECT for all the adventures we wanted to take and places to go while in the city. It was in walking distance from pretty much everything including Scotiabank, Rogers Center, the aquarium and Union Station. We couldn’t have asked for better accommodations. The view was also breathtaking. We would go back or recommend this to any of our friends!

author: Tiffany
comments: We had a great time!

author: Karissa
comments: Land's place we absolutely amazing! I happened to be in town during the NBA playoffs and was able to walk out to Jarrasic Park and experience watching the game with the locals. I loved being on the 66th floor, the view was amazing! I plan to visit Toronto again and I will definitely stay at Lan's place

author: Abhishek
comments:
This place is really nice. Small studio. Good for two people. Perfectly located in the downtown area and easy walk to many tourist attraction. The apartment is on the 66th floor with great views. Union station is 4 mins walk. I took the train in and out to the airport (Pearson) and my wife flew into billy bishop which was 7-8 mins drive. 
Getting Uber was really easy and the host was very quick on responding to a couple of questions we asked. 
overall if you are in Toronto for visit this place is perfect to stay! 
Thank you Lan for having us!!

author: Yijia
comments: The condo is very clean and the view is great.

author: Chris
comments: Lan’s place is absolutely beautiful and luxurious.  It’s clean from top to bottom and the view is just STUNNING! Lan was quick to respond to a question I had.  The whole vibe was incredible and I can’t wait to visit Toronto again!

author: Marc
comments: One of the best hosts and stays I’ve had with AirBnB. Highly recommend Marie and her beautiful place.

author: Marjolaine And Yousuf
comments: Marie’s place is the hipster, bohemian dream made manifest. The loft is glorious—open, light-filled, with soaring ceilings and exquisite details. I once lived in a similar place in TriBeCa and was enchanted and made young again while at Marie’s. It is, however, for a particular kind of traveler—one charmed by beautiful flaws (like moderately unpredictable heating) and happy to climb four flights of stairs. If the charm of industrial lofts is your thing, few places will beat Marie’s.

author: Mario
comments: A-mazing - Marie is the epitome of best AirBnB host!

author: Aaron
comments: Marie, the host is very kind. She communicates with guests promptly.  The loft was a place that provided us a sense of class and comfort with lots of natural light. The location was conveniently within walking distance of things or just a short ride share away.

author: Apolo
comments:
You have to try it!
I was there for a week and I loved it!
It was excellent!

author: Douglas
comments:
Wow! We were blown away by Marie. So kind, so attentive, so thoughtful. Never pushy or overbearing just always there if needed. And that’s just for starters. 
Okay,  I suppose we’ve lost our objectivity. We fell in love with Marie, she’s beautiful inside and out. We came as strangers and parted as friends. So very sweet to my son. There are many things to see and do. Walking or public transportation puts you close to everything. She offered the use of bicycles and there are wide bicycle lanes. 
Lying in bed with just candle light
you get the feeling you are up north in a cozy cabin.
We didn’t want to leave.
 As Yankees, our dollars went a little further which was nice. 
Looking forward to coming again.

author: Mario
comments: Always amazing - Marie is the best host and her AirBnB is magical!

author: Kyra
comments: Marie is wonderful, the place is perfect and I can’t wait to return.

author: Kip
comments: First, let me say that the host was very communicative, helpful, and responsive - some of the best and clearest host communications I've experienced.   The location was convenient for me, as it is near a business location.   The space was as described - quirky and designer focused.    Bathroom was small but well appointed and clean.
