Kitchen is not the best if you plan on doing any extensive cooking - it's functional, but barely.   Bed was extremely comfortable, and entire place, though "vintage" in styling, was very clean.

author: Jack
comments: This was a glorious place to stay, filled with light and charming touches. Marie is a kind and brilliant host. I would gladly stay again!

author: Andrew
comments: This condo is right in the city just a short drive or an average walk from everything you’d want to see or do it Toronto. The space was clean and in a nice neighborhood too. Parking nearby is very expensive however.

author: Janet
comments: Very comfortable and quiet location . This is my second time using this building because of proximity to the museum ( 2 blocks from ROM museum) . Close to everything, some within walking distance. More expensive than other parts of Toronto but very nice . Good section of town with shopping, exclusive shops and some malls .

author: Najma
comments: Beautiful place, beautiful location! You’re right in the city, close to food and shopping. I would say the only downside was that there was so parking if you have a car. We ended up paying $40 a day for overnight parking.

author: Hailey
comments: If you are looking for a place to stay in the city, this is it. An almost full kitchen, a beautiful view and the most comfortable bed! I loved my stay because it was close to public transit and in the nice part of town, great experience, would recommend to solo travels or couples!

author: Yi-Tan
comments: Beautiful apartment and good location.

author: Laura
comments: My friends and I had a great stay here, it was clean and had all that we needed for the night. It’s also located in a great location in Yorkville.

author: Hideko
comments: Very Stylish space to enjoy your single time in Toronto, Great Location, Lots of Restaurants and Shops, Safe Neighborhood,  , Whole Foods is just 5 min walk across the street which is the big YES to me!

author: Jennifer-Hoa
comments: Probably one of the cleanest airbnb’s I have ever stayed at. It’s super cozy and the perfect location for a weekend getaway with your honey. It’s located right there from the shopping district and a really close drive to everything else in toronto! Parking ramp was a 1 min walk from the loft itself. The only thing that was a little confusing was how to get to the front desk to check in, but the host picked up the phone really quick to address any needs! 10/10 would recommend.

author: Csaba
comments: Great place, close to the metro and museums, and there are plenty restaurant, cafes, etc around! Nice view of the city, comfortable place to sit and relax after a day out and about.

author: Christine
comments: Beautiful space in a really nice neighborhood

author: Maggie
comments: Awesome location, and great communication! Highly recommend

author: Ryan
comments: Great location

author: Susanne
comments: We had a great stay!

author: Kevin
comments: The apartment was really great. Very clean, perfect size for two people who are out and about all day. The location is amazing as well. Very short walk to the Eaton Center, the subway, and the PATH. Parking is tricky to work out, so pay attention to the hosts suggestions in the listing. Overall great value and great apartment!

author: Vikram
comments: Good location, great communication with host

author: Ben
comments:
The place was very clean. Had all of the basic amenities one could expect. 

The location cannot be beat. Everything is workable from this location. 

Thanks for a great stay.

author: Sandy
comments: Great location, small but well-equiped. Recommend to short stay travelers.

author: Dr. Lyron H.
comments: The place is centrally locates near great Resturant’s and Huan is very accommodating! It could use deep cleaning of the floor and rug and a coat of paint.

author: Steve
comments: We had a great stay at the Cozy Studio! Good value and great location. We look for unpretentious accommodations like Huan's studio and will look to stay here again for a future trip to Toronto.

author: Erika
comments: Great place and location for a few nights!

author: Mike
comments: The condo, building/ amenities, view, and location are all top class. Shawn is a great host and is always in communication with the guest. I would definitely stay here again!

author: Collin
comments: Shawn was very thorough. He gave us all the information we would need for check in/out, what to do during the stay and even set us up with cheap underground parking in the building. The condo was beautiful and very well maintained, with an amazing view of the city and CN tower. This was my first Airbnb experience and it set the bar pretty high for the future.

author: Mikey
comments: Awesome place and perfect location!!!

author: Andrew
comments: Amazing location, very modern condo. My stay was stress free and I would go back anytime.

author: Alex
comments: Great view, slept 5 with no problem. Walkable to just about everything, and being able to park was a huge bonus.

author: Jenna
comments: Amazing view and great location— would book again!!

author: Daniel
comments: Place was great, awesome view, everything was clean

author: Tara
comments: Shawn’s place was everything we expected and more! Very near to all local tourist attractions and restaurants! We really appreciated his quick responses to any and all questions we had! Including car troubles. We would stay there again in a heart beat.

author: Michael
comments: Outstanding rental. Everything was clean and in working order and the location was perfect.

author: Joseph
comments: This condo could not be positioned any better in downtown Toronto. We were directly across the street from the aquarium, CN tower, Rabba - grocery store, starbucks, and more. beautiful view and modern space with plenty of sleeping space.

author: Florian
comments: Great location and nice apartment. Unfortunately communication with the host is very bad und unresponsive. TV does work. Dryer and Washer cant be used by guests.

author: Andrew
comments: Really clean, simple and quiet!

author: Michael
comments: Great location and host!  Highly recommend this property!

author: Grace
comments: Highly recommend this place! Super clean and very modern. We had no issues whatsoever. Perfect for our stay in Toronto and close to lots of activities and restaurants. And we loved the balcony too,  just wish there were chairs! But overall probably the best Airbnb I have had so far!

author: Jared
comments: Modern space in an ideal location. Has everything you need, and definitely clean, though could be better maintained (a few household items needed repair). Communication with Trace was a bit difficult, but fortunately check-in and check-out were painless. Would stay again, but hopefully they make a few minor improvements to their procedures.

author: Amanda Angeline
comments:
Excellent location within walking distance to everything. There is a affordable paid parking garage next door! 
Easy check in process with great instructions and communication. 
Would highly recommend!

author: Michael
comments:
Pros: 
- Amazing location close to everything 
- Fairly clean aside from dirty carpet
- big patio (though no furniture)
- plenty of extra sheets and bedding
- modern place with hardwood floors and solid kitchen and bathroom

Cons:
- non responsive via text, must call
- elevators took 10+ min 
- never fixed missing blinds despite sending pics
- too much light
- rude front desk worker (bigger dude with short dark hair)
- no privacy from neighbors as you can hat everything and can see each other when they are outside on their patio
- washing machine wouldn’t work half the time 
- a bunch of stuff leftover from past guests..(bud light and wine in the freezer) 


Overall, location alone might be worth booking if you can deal with other stuff

author: Caroline
comments: Our stay exceeded expectations. The apartment was modern, spotless, and extremely comfortable. The location and view were unbeatable. We were able to walk everywhere and parked the car in a lot across the street.  I highly recommend and would definitely stay here again.

author: Liz
comments:
Pros: Great location near theater district, clean and neat. 
Cons: Didn’t have working Netflix or cable throughout stay and host was not helpful and didn’t followed through when notified of this.

author: Cara
comments: Really cute, modern apartment in a great location. Couldn’t figure out how to get the tv to work but brought my laptop and a hdmi cord so it was all good. Would recommend!

author: Nathanael
comments: Great place to stay, cheap, good location, the whole package.

author: Shane
comments: Convenient location for a cheap price!

author: Erika
comments: Max is super nice.  The place is exactly as described.  Funny thing is even tho two others were staying when I was, I never saw them.  The room is nice and dark - just the way I like for sleeping - and if I wanted it colder or warmer, Max had that set up in case I needed it.  For the price it can't be beat!

author: Christina
comments: Good place for the value.

author: Umar
comments: Good place

author: Ibrahim
comments: Max's place is quite affordable given its location & I would gladly book it again for future visits.

author: Ronaldo
comments: Max is an Excelent host and I’m very thankful for all his help . That place is clean affordable and close to everything. Awesome !

author: Michelle
comments: Max was an extremely clean, considerate, and thoughtful host! He responded quickly to questions, helped with parking, and gave great suggestions. I would definitely stay with him again if I were to visit Toronto.

author: Julia
comments:
Max is such a great host! I had to do a late check in and even coming super late he waited up for me to show how me around the place and give me some tips 

The place is super well located, I was close to everything

author: Cristina
comments: Max is welcoming and great at communicating quickly. Enjoyed my stay!

author: Chris
comments: Enjoyed my stay thanks to a great host!! definitely look forward to visiting again

author: Ankit
comments: Amazing location and beautiful apartment. Very convenient check in and check out. Also, the house has a very modern character to it similar to the Toronto vibe. I definitely recommend this place and will be looking forward to book it each time i come to Toronto

author: Lydia
comments: Thank you so much Chris! We had such a great time, and really enjoyed staying at your place. I’ll check for you again next time I come to Toronto.

author: Craig
comments: This place is fantastic... right downtown... very cool location... and very stylish inside.

author: Melissa
comments: Good stay, good value, fairly good location. Was in town for work and the space worked. Chris was a good host, very communicative.

author: Jeff
comments: Thank you for your kindness and hospitality. It meant the world. I wish you infinite success and wellness.

author: Danny
comments: Easy check-in, excellent host, lovely place, and perfect location. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay!

author: Frank
comments: Location was ideal!

author: Holly
comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Great location!  Super comfortable space!  I would stay here again.  Love the self check in.

author: Chris
comments: Chris & Steve's check-in instructions were great and very easy to follow.  They even reached out a couple days into my client's stay to make sure everything was going smoothly and that they were comfortable and happy in the condo.  The condo was very clean and well kept.  Just like the photos.

author: Angela
comments: Very European-style design. Great downtown location and incredible view. Be prepared if not staying alone as there are no separate spaces besides the bathroom. Even the bedroom only has glass sliding doors for “privacy”; not sure the purpose of those sliding doors as they don’t provide privacy or reduce the sound from the rest of the apartment. Also elevators take a long time, 37 floors, and there are only 3 so be ready to be patient while you wait. I would definitely stay there again and recommend to others traveling to Toronto.

author: Kevin
comments: Beautiful studio paired with a beautiful view. Located very close to CN tower and Ripley's aquarium.

author: Alfred
comments: Great view of the CN Tower and overall an amazing BnB.

author: Gideon
comments: We had a great stay at Helen’s apartment in Toronto, comfortable, clean space. Spectacular view as advertised. Helen was quick getting back to me when I had questions. Had a very nice stay with my family in Toronto. Definitely recommend.

author: Reece
comments: Thanks Helen for the lovely stay! Such an amazing view and could not ask for a better location! Would 100% stay again

author: Stanley
comments: Loved my stay at helens place simply amazing!!

author: Eunice
comments: Great view. Convenient location. Picturesque interior. Loved it.

author: Diane
comments: Great location with fabulous views of tower & harbour!

author: Ashley
comments: Cozy high rise with beautiful view! We enjoyed our stay.

author: Matt
comments: Helen was awesome. My plans changed last minute and booked the night before. It is 2 blocks away from roger center. We could see the stadium from our room. Perfect location for the cost!!! I would definitely stay here again

author: Swapnik
comments: It is very nice place to stay near downtown

author: Oludele
comments: Totally worth it!

author: Taka
comments: Abul is a kind person. He always helped me if I had problems.

author: Cheryl
comments: Convenient to the subway

author: Lisa
comments: Great deal! Hard to get into the city.

author: Sony
comments: Abul is a great host. His place is good to spend the night with a low budget. It is close to the Science Ontario Museum, Walmart, McDonalds, 35 mins from the downtown in car. It is private (finished basement), no garage but you can Park on the street. It Looks like it is located in a nice neighborhood. It has one queen bed-that sounds if you move, little kitchen, dine area, and private bathroom. Some days we had limited internet (just for emails and maybe upload 20 min. Movie), no TV and somewhat quiet, the heater is in the basement, and it is big enough for 2 people. It is spacious but the bathroom, the kitchen and the floors in general need more attention (presence of mold).

author: Ling
comments: Clean/private space.  The host is responsive and accommodating.

author: Aahbab
comments: Overall a not a bad stay, however i did not like they the fact that the host entered my airbnb without asking and also the bathroom had used soap that was used by other guests. Finally there was a strong oder perhaps from food and it was occasionally very noisy.

author: Victor
comments: Abul, daughter, and wife were helpful to us. The place was great. There are just two improvements, a small hole in the roof made us felt a little bit of cold on both nights, we wear more clothes to sleep well, and the light in the garage that connects to the room doesn't work well, we were struggling to pass to the place.

author: Alysson
comments:
My stay at Abuls basement was very comfortable. There was a washroom, queen bed, mini-fridge, microwave just for me. 
There was also a bus 4 minutes away from his house that goes directly to the Scarboro City Centre. Would definetely stay there again if I need

author: Ovi
comments: great location

author: Emily
comments: Super nice apartment in a great location. Very cozy!!

author: Mez
comments: Nice apartment and location with nice amenities. 100% would recommend

author: Winnie
comments: Adam’s place is incredible! It’s super clean, literally downtown, and has an incredible view. The building is also very secure. I would recommend this place to anyone!

author: Juan Camilo
comments: Sparkling clean apartment in the heart of Toronto, the location was amazing, close to public transportation and to tourist attractions. We loved our stay in this apartment.

author: Luis
comments: Adam's place was great, he gave us tips and was really responsive. The place was clean, and great looking. The view is amazing as well. If you are looking for 2 beds this is probably not the place though. We booked it because of the 2 beds however it only had 1 bed and a futton. Overall great experience.

author: Michael
comments: Great host!

author: Chantae
comments: Adam's place is in an ideal location. Close to several stores, restaurants, and "other" merchants. This was a great 1st trip to Toronto. I will definitely look to book this apartment again when I return.

author: Tracy
comments: Great place, spotlessly clean.

author: Shannon
comments: Exactly as the picture shows, great location, great view.

author: Rottar
comments: Check in and out was a breeze! Loved staying here ok because they had public transportation across the street. There was also a convenience store across the street and a cafe in front of the building. I couldn’t stop looking out the window every night because of the views. Host kept in contact to make sure I was having a nice stay!!! Will definitely be booking here again when I come to Toronto again :)!!

author: Gabby
comments: Great stay!

author: Aaditya
comments: Great location for people landing at the city airport. The view from the room is great. The host is friendly and very responsive, I would definitely recommend staying here

author: Nicolle
comments: My husband and I loved our stay here! Great location and a lovely building

author: Amaury
comments: Place was amazing had everything we needed and check in/out was super easy. Would definitely stay here again

author: Nikki
comments: Great apartment. It was perfect for our short stay in Toronto, allowing us a great view from the 19th floor windows. It was clean and the communication with the hosts was straightforward and professional. Would recommend!

author: Alexandria
comments: Edwin was extremely accommodating. We arrived earlier than check in time so he allowed us to park so could tour downtown.  His place was super clean and stylish.  The view of the lake and the city is beautiful! We highly recommend staying here. Amenities of a hotel without the cost.

author: Brian
comments: Very clean and in a great spot

author: Qixuan
comments: very nice

author: Adam
comments: Great place, would stay again.

author: Sydney
comments: Very clean and located in a great location. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to stay in Toronto.

author: Katelin
comments: This place was great! So clean and quiet and is in a wonderful location. Food and entertainment close by! Dale was a great host.

author: Aston
comments: Great space in a great location! This place is within walking distance or ride share to any amazing place in downtown TO! My girlfriend and I had an amazing time! Communication was easy, thanks Dale! Definitely would book again! Thanks

author: Geoffrey
comments: Dale’s place was very comfortable and great for an easy quick stay.

author: Monica
comments: Overall I had a good experience staying at Dale’s place fir my first visit to Toronto! The place is pretty big, easily could fit 3-5 people comfortably. I appreciated small things such as hangers in the closet fit my clothes. There really wasn’t anything kissing, had everything I need for my stay. One thing to note is there’s some construction going on (late this was late November) so it might be confusing if you use Uber for getting around. Some great abecitues such as a gym, pool, and in unit laundry, very nice and good value!

author: Nadine
comments: Centrally located to everything

author: Michelle
comments: Perfect downtown location. Just a 10 minute walk from Union station and close to all kinds of restaurants and things to do. Communication made it easy and seamless process and was convenient to get the keys for the unit. Nice little place that beats staying in a hotel!

author: Morris
comments: Great location you’re literally in the middle of everything!

author: Hitomi
comments: The room was clean and located in a very convenient area. We could check in & out without problem. We enjoyed our stay here!

author: Vanessa
comments: Great spot. Close to everything we needed. Fit our  family of 4 just fine. The heated spa was a nice warm up to the cloudy/rainy weather we had.

author: Sean
comments: The space was amazing. It had everything an Airbnb needed and on top of that, had a few small touches that made it even better. Check in was easy and communication was always fast and very responsive. Would definitely stay here longer next time!

author: Jennifer
comments: Nice and spacious, bed was stiff but overall good value and clean.

author: Donn
comments: Great place. Very clean, high floor, awesome view. The lighting, hand towels and shelves in the bathroom are all simple touches that are too often lacking. Will definitely stay here again

author: Parth
comments: Great place

author: Viviana Angeles
comments: First time using Airbnb and for sure left a great impression! Great view and beautiful condo! A must stay if going to Toronto, I look forward to staying here again! Thank you for your attention to detail and making this a smooth stay for me!

author: Paige
comments: A great stay!  Will stay here again when in Toronto.

author: Stephanie
comments: This was our first time in Canada and the stay with Emmie was really nice. The condo complex was great and felt safe. There was construction going on right behind our condo and a lot of noise going on morning through night, it would’ve been nice to have been aware of that. The beds were also a bit uncomfortable. But Overall good experience and thankful for letting us stay at your place!

author: Vincent
comments: Nice clean cozy apartment!

author: Barb
comments: It was a convenient place to stay since I had to attend a business dinner right down the street.  Nice, clean condo.  Fine for me for a one-night stay.

author: Gabrielle
comments: Emmie was very sweet and even moved my check up time earlier for me! Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a cozy place to stay in Toronto!

author: Michelle
comments: A great value and lovely space while in Toronto. The view is wonderful, space is clean, the host is friendly, and the city is walkable and in reach at this location.

author: Lauren
comments: We had a great stay! The unit was in a great location with lots to do in walking distance. There was also a great view of the city and lake. We also appreciated the small things like water in the fridge and a well stocked kitchen

author: Lu
comments: It was a great experience! The location is great.

author: Delene & Killick
comments: We had a comfortable stay and experienced our hosts being very accommodating for our delayed very-late-night arrival. Too short but restful visit...

author: Colleen
comments: Sekar's place was perfect for a short stay in the city. It was close to everything I wanted to see, very clean & convenient to navigate. I would definitely stay here again for my next visit! Thank you!

author: Tim
comments: Great little hideaway in area convenient to many Toronto sights! Love the firm mattress and balcony. Taking your shoes off at the door helps the small space stay clean! We would definitely come back!

author: Lindsey
comments: There was cereal, milk, toothpaste, and mouthwash all ready for us. The only problem is that it was all opened and had been used before. Not a huge downfall but it felt a little icky to share these things.

author: Paul
comments: I was a little nervous when I was searching for a place in central Toronto that this seemed too good to be true but it exceeded my expectations! The location was perfect, the check in was easy in a safe and secure building and extremely clean! Beautiful views also!

author: Paul
comments: I had a wonderful time at Sekar’s AirBnb home. It has a wonderful view and incredibly central location in the heart of downtown Toronto. Amazing value.

author: Jennifer
comments: Sekar’s studio was clean, has great views, and is in a great location downtown.  Everything you needed was within walking distance.  The check in process was easy and he was efficient in responding to any concerns I had.  I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Toronto for the first time.  Thanks again Sekar:)

author: Michael
comments: Communication and check-in were great. The apartment is as described and comfortable. The one downside was the lack of a top sheet, we just had a bed sheet and comforter.

author: Jacob
comments: Exactly what we needed for a quick trip to Toronto. It was very clean and decorated nicely. There is also a metro  line right outside that will take you downtown. I would definitely stay here again!

author: Nicole
comments: Absolutely loved staying in Heather’s space, it was clean, cozy and in a great location. My sister and I are already making plans to come back!

author: Sarah
comments: We stayed for one night to attend a concert at the Budweiser stage. We were very close, we even walked. The location was amazing. At first we were kind of scared because the outside of the building is a little run down but once inside the apartment we were pleasantly surprised with the space and the cleanliness and even our safety. The space is very cute and bright and the bed was comfortable, I would definitely stay here again!

author: Shane
comments: Convenient and cheap

author: Magdalena
comments:
It was a really nice stay and everything was like we expected it to be. 
We liked Heather’s place and would recommend it!

author: Stephanie
comments: Heather is a fantastic host who made our stay very easy with prompt and valuable communication. The place is a true gem! The style and layout are functional and adorable. We appreciated all the necessary amenities and were thrilled with some bonus items and perks, like a record player and books! It is easy to find in Toronto, in a great neighborhood near downtown and having a parking space is incredibly helpful. There are many stairs to go up and down the building to get to the apartment, and it smelled like smoke in the hallways, but once you are in the apartment it is a little slice of heaven in Toronto!!

author: Kris
comments: Staying at Heather’s place was ok. She is really accessible and concise in her directions in how to use the house. She also has a parking spot so you can park your car. That was really awesome! My only concern was cleanliness, but that might also be just my obsession. It was a little bit tight with three but with two I guess it is perfect!

author: John
comments: Heather’s apartment was very nice and was definitely a great value. My girlfriend and I greatly enjoyed our stay and if we ever plan on going back to Toronto for a trip we plan on staying at Heathers again!

author: Devesh
comments: first of all, I would like to say that never ever will I suggest this place for any one, single or with family/kids. The place is extremely small as compared to the description given. it smells of marijuana all over and no matter if you open the window the smell belongs there! entire apartment is utmost shabby place as if given to a homeless person. Lets start from bathroom, broken bath tub with no bathroom accessories, dirty stinky towels as if hung and used for months. Shampoo botel filled with water!!no conditioner/lotion/tissue. Toilet is dirty and the used towel paper are sitting there, utmost small but could adjust if clean which is absolutely missing. Cleanliness is maintained at negative standard. Next in line is kitchen where dustbin is overflowing with empty soda cans and glasses, Pullout sofa is like 50 years old at least and if you plan to sleep there be ready to visit your Orthopedician, nude homosexual content at display which is highly traumatizing for young kids, half used cigars, emty soda can and blood stained antelope horns..yes! I am posting pictures to save your time and money. Bedroom is no different, with no linen, bedsheets or pillow cover. Here, you see utmost negligence of the host and you wonder that this kind of people are still functional. Gay content magazines and images kept right at front. This apartment is the dirtiest place I have ever seen in any of trips world wide and trust me I have traveled a lot including third world countries. I categorize my experience not just as terrible/worst/bad but traumatizing.

author: Kailen
comments: Great affordable place. Gregory was very helpful and quick to respond. The place was also very nice and clean.

author: Hilary
comments: Super friendly host!

author: Neha
comments: I really enjoyed my stay at Gregory's. He was very responsive and had provided detailed instructions about the check in process. The room had an amazing view and you are located in the heart of the city so lot of eating joints are within a walking distance

author: Nina
comments: Clean, gorgeous, convenient place to stay in Toronto.

author: Katherine
comments: Gregory is so kind, friendly, and willing to accommodate. He went above and beyond to make sure that my stay in Toronto was enjoyable. The apartment has a spectacular view of Lake Ontario, and everything was very clean and stylish. Definitely going to book Gregory’s space if I’m ever in Toronto again!

author: Meg
comments: I highly recommend Gregory’s place to anyone visiting Toronto, especially solo travelers looking for security and a great value. Communication was clear and quick. The accommodations were comfortable and clean. Gregory was polite and welcoming. Five stars all around.

author: Corinne
comments: Gregory was a fantastic host, my friend and I were very lucky to find this place on short notice. If you’re looking for a clean, comfortable space that’s close to pretty much everything, this is the place to go. Can’t recommend it enough!

author: Kevin
comments: Gregory was great ! Awesome location with a beautiful view. Very clean and great natural light.

author: Donna
comments: Excellent as described place to stay in Toronto!

author: Bre
comments: This was an excellent place to stay! The check-in process went very smoothly, the views are excellent, and the location is very beautiful. I look forward to returning to Toronto!

author: Yifan (Lisa)
comments: I loved this place, it was very clean, quiet and comfortable. Host is super friendly and nice. I would definitely stay here again.

author: Mitch
comments: Great hospitality and great location in the city.

author: Barb
comments: This was our first trip to Toronto, and we had an amazing visit! Judy's Airbnb was the nicest accommodation we've ever stayed in. The attention to detail was really appreciated and Judy's recommendations were spot-on. The studio was well-appointed & so clean, and perfect to come back to after a day of exploring. Thanks so much!!

author: Albert
comments: Very cozy place! I would recommend this to anyone. Very close to good restaurants and public transportation to get you in and around the city. I’m definitely staying here again when I visit the area again :)

author: Steven
comments: Judy’s place was a great place to stay in a beautiful neighborhood. Many shops and restaurants were within walking distance. Judy was very welcoming and friendly during our entire stay! My wife and I would love staying here again.

author: Jason
comments: Comfy place and great location! Judy was a great host and very helpful with recommendations for our stay. We would definitely stay at her place again!

author: Rebecca
comments: My stay at Judy's place was fantastic. From a warm welcome, friendly (but understanding of jetlag) hosts, fantastic recommendations in a helpful binder to a well located and decorated  space with thoughtful touches. They really went above and beyond, helping with various travelling mishaps with good grace and infinite kindness. Whilst being given my own space, and actually being out of the house working for the majority of my trip, I left feeling recharged with the knowledge there's a friendly hello in Toronto should I need it. I will definitely be back, and wholly recommend you stay here!

author: Sam
comments: Judy’s house is amazing! Highly recommend to stay here. It’s in a perfect location if you want to stay a little bit outside of the city but still have the city feel. Felt very safe in this neighborhood. It’s surrounded by great restaurants and a 5 minute walk from the subway. The place is very clean and well decorated. Judy has an amazing garden in her backyard, very nice place to enjoy your coffee/breakfast. Definitely would stay here again when I visit Toronto!

author: Nguyen
comments: Judy’s place is amazing and is as described! What I enjoyed most was how friendly she is and how available she is to answer questions and to help us explore Toronto! Her place was clean, safe, beautiful and comfortable! It was also very close to very cool places, restaurants, Ktown and public transport! Very pleased

author: Kirill
comments: Great Airbnb! Judy made our experience there super easy. Everything was set up and super convenient for us to use. Great location, close to Casa Loma and easy to get to downtown Toronto attractions. And we couldn’t stop talking about how quiet the neighborhood was and how it felt like it was the suburbs in the middle of downtown Toronto. We would definitely stay there again! You should too!

author: Christa
comments: This place was amazing! Best air bnb I’ve ever stayed in. It was super clean, the location was great and the views were unbelievable. I’d stay here again in a heart beat!

author: Rebekah
comments: The Airbnb is beautiful, great value and awesome views, the balcony oversees the whole city and is awesome at sundown. Very well placed for bars and activities and there is an attached parking structure. It’s perfect for one or two people, any more than that would be a bit cramped and the couch may be a little stiff to sleep on. My only turmoil was with the bed, it was similar to sleeping on the floor, such a nice place you would expect a nicer mattress. We spent the next day hiking south of Toronto and we were very sore and tense the next day from that. Other than that a lovely place and I would return.

author: Ci
comments: Very stylish place!

author: Dave
comments: Alexandra has a beautiful apartment in a great location. Everything went smoothly and it was easy to get in touch with her. Highly recommended for a nice stay in the downtown area.

author: Lauren
comments: This place was great!! Just like the pictures and I highly recommend!

author: Jamie
comments: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL views! Check-in was super easy and we loved every minute of it. No complaints at all - hope to visit again in the future.

author: Jessica
comments: Our stay at Alexandra’s place was exactly what we expected. Beautiful view, perfect indoor temperature (we stayed during the winter), and the prime location were everything! Easy process to check in and out. Enjoyed the tips and restaurant suggestions that were left. Thank you Alexandra!

author: Cameron
comments: Could not have been happier with the stay.

author: Ashwini
comments: Nice place, exactly as pictured.  The views are really special from that high up.

author: Bianca
comments: Alexandra’s place was not only exceptionally clean and stylish, but the views are breathtaking! It’s in a perfect location for enjoying everything Queen St. W has to offer and parking was so easy with a garage that offers overnight parking just next door. Will definitely book this place again next time I’m in Toronto!

author: Henry
comments: Great place to stay near everything, but the ceilings were a little lower than imagined.

author: Magdalena
comments: Wonderful spot right near a bunch of places to eat and see. Easy to get around. The space itself is nice and clean - I liked the little labels for everything, made navigating the space easy. The heater was a great touch too.

author: Judi
comments: This was a return stay at Frank's.  As with my first stay, I found the place to be spotless, comfortable, cozy, and well-located -- in Koreatown and a block from the subway.  I also appreciate that it is well-lit, as I like to read and knit.  Frank was very accommodating with any requests I had. I felt quite at home.

author: Matthew
comments: Lovely spot!

author: Hanover
comments: Sparkling clean, cozy, and a perfect location in Koreatown, Toronto. I had a lovely, peaceful, and productive stay!

author: Scott
comments:
Ideally located near the metro stop, Frank's place is located near endless shops and delicious restaurants to explore with easy access to the downtown areas.
The space itself has everything you might need in a roomy and clean package. There's even a cooking range. If you are tall, the ceilings are pretty low.

author: Cody
comments: What a great stay! The place was so easy to access and was ready and sparkling clean. It had everything we needed and was very nicely decorated. Very welcoming! 10/10 Would recommend to anyone in the area.

author: Brittany
comments: Frank’s basement apartment is just as described. Tiny and cozy and in a great location! We had a lovely stay for a short visit in Toronto. Convenient check-in directions too. Would stay again on a future visit.

author: Dimitri
comments: Amazing. Would definitely return. Thank you!

author: Maceo
comments: Easy to get to airports. Simple, easy place with responsive host.

author: Sumeer
comments: Awesome host. The place is in a very family oriented neighbourhood which is quiet and respectable. The unit is a great value for money so it's all 5 stars for me. Ceser was an awesome host and a great human being. He let me use his parking space for my one month stay. There are small grocery shops neat by and decent restaurant choices. If I was on a short visit again, I would be looking to stay at this just because the host is a really nice fellow and unit is comfortable with great value for money.

author: Sudeep
comments: Great place to stay and not too far from the center of the city.

author: Logan
comments: Cesar’s place was perfect for us. It was near a lot of great food spots and about a twenty minute drive to downtown Toronto. Cesar was super responsive and super friendly. Next time I come to Toronto I will book Cesar’s place again.

author: Preston
comments: This was a decent place for the price. The ceiling is especially low so for tall lodgers you may want to think strongly about this. There was a parking spot in the driveway which was nice transportation wise. If you are not bringing a car, there is a metro station 20 min away by foot. The bedroom is right behind a boiler room so there is a loud noise throughout the night. Overall pretty good.

author: Vanessa
comments: Great value at a great price! Cozy, clean, chic and very close to transportation. Not to mention a wonderful Portuguese bakery around the corner I frequented rather often, during my stay. Cesar is also a quick communicator. I would stay here again.

author: Audrey
comments: The place was great if you're on a budget. It was a little annoying to sit in traffic for so long to get into the city, but you get a full kitchen and the place to yourselves so its a trade off. Also if you're a light sleeper just know the bed shares a wall with a utility closet and the water heater turns on in the middle of the night.  Overall  though it was fair for the price and very clean inside.

author: David
comments: Communication with Cesar was great. Keys were where they were suppose to be. Upon enter the apartment, nicely cooled and low ceiling for someone 6'2". It was later discovered the the downstairs apartment does not control the thermostat, and was never as cold when we first arrived. Made it hard to sleep a few nights. Also only one set of towels where available and no hand towels. There is no table to eat at so a little inconvenient. Not great pillows on the bed and a few ants where found around the bedroom area. Parking on the street was okay never had any problems. Over all not to bad, control of the temperature would have been nice.

author: Genesis
comments: I stayed here for 8 days, 7 nights. Very warm and cozy place. Quick ride to Downtown, Toronto (about 30 minutes to Union Station). Buses near come extremely quickly. Nearby stores and restaurants. My partner and I never met the owner during our stay but he did communicate very well and fast. Stylish and clean place. Allowed us to check-in early and check-out late! Very helpful since our flight back home was late in the day. Definitely recommend!

author: Bianca
comments: Was very impressed with how clean and stylish this spot was. My partner and I fell in love with the space. Perfect for those looking to save money while enjoying all that Toronto has to offer. Would definitely stay here again!

author: Greg
comments: Cesar is super accommodating and the apartment is super convenient and cozy. Great place to stay at!

author: Hailey
comments: This is an amazing spot to stay for a solo traveler! It’s about a 10 minute walk to the subway station that can get you most anywhere, and within in that same distance is a decent amount of restaurants and grocery stores, so it’s super convenient if you aren’t renting a car (which I didn’t). Michael was really helpful and communicative, and left a little note with some local recommendations of places to eat. The room is actually a lot bigger than I expected, more than enough room for one person. There are two closets, a little kitchenette with everything you need, and a balcony. There is also both a heater and AC in the room! It really is such an amazing deal for the price, would happily stay here again if I am ever back in Toronto.

author: Victoria
comments: The description is accurate, it’s an old house with shared rooms, but everything functions fine and it’s a good place for the price. My stay went smoothly without any issues.

author: Samuel
comments: Great place to stay, lovely space quiet and peaceful. And clean!! Will stay again

author: Analie
comments: Michal's place is quiet and a great deal for the price. The room with the balcony and kitchenette offers a lot of privacy and if you're looking to chat, Michal is friendly and willing to give suggestions on what to do in Toronto. Close to Davisville station, which is on the TTC 1 line, but if you're looking to get outside of city center, there are plenty of restaurants to the north of the house, and it is easy access to the Moore Park Ravine and the green spaces around Don River.

author: Redmond
comments: Was in a great location and overall was very easy.

author: Arkeif
comments: Convenient and very comfortable

author: Bingying
comments: Pretty great place to stay for the price.

author: Susanne
comments:
I totally enjoyed the stay at Mike's place. Found everything I needed right away!
The neighborhood is very safe and beautiful with plenty of food stores and small restaurants. Very easy access to public transportation.  Room was clean, equipped with a kitchenette, no stove, but could use the stove in the kitchen downstairs.  A nice touch were free coffee, tea, spices etc.  Actually, everything I needed was there. Had to share the bathroom with a few other people but never ran into problems with that. Everything worked out well. Felt that the bathtub was not sparkling clean but must admit that I am a clean freak.  Would definitely stay there again! The guests were absolutely delightful!

author: Kevin
comments: Very quiet and cozy. I really enjoyed the area and it's close to a few local shops just in case you're having the feeling to go for a walk. Mike was very quick with his responding time and his check ups were very appreciated.

author: Franc
comments: Mike is a great host and his place is excellent. The house is located just 8 minutes walk from the subway station and it is very peaceful and quiet. Mike is also super fast with his responses, he will certainly give you good tips regarding Toronto. Highly recommended.

author: Melissa
comments: Oscar's place is exactly as advertised. Very clean, comfortable, and cute! Great location to downtown, too. I'd definitely stay again!

author: Mike
comments: This space is absolutely as advertised with breathtaking views of downtown Toronto. The CN Tower is three blocks away, the Scotiabank Arena is 50 steps away and all of downtown’s best amenities are a cheap Uber ride away if you’re like me and coming during the winter months. Oscar’s communication is excellent. If I ever go back to Toronto, I will look at staying here again. Easily accommodates a couple.

author: Ty
comments: Couldn’t ask for a better view for the price! Felt like we had a nice studio apartment in the city. Very close to great attractions like the Aquarium, CN Tower and much more!

author: Daniel
comments: Great location for anyone looking to stay downtown near the attractions.

author: Becky
comments: Wonderful host and amazing condo

author: Sean
comments: Great location, nice space

author: Rachel
comments: Oscars place was definitely clean & nice, but unless you choose correctly on where to park you’re going to spend a fortune on parking and it’s not going to be that great a value of a place to stay! Also that sliding door does not close!!!

author: Zachery
comments: Oscars place was clean and bright, it has a nice balcony with two chairs that is great in the summer time. The CN tower is viewable from the balcony as well!

author: Julie
comments: Oscar's place was amazing. He was a fantastic host. Responded in a timely manner. The location was incredible, about a 10 minute walk to Roger Centre and restaurants in the area. We recommend Evviva for breakfast. The apartment had a beautiful view of CN Tower. We definitely recommend staying here. You won't be disappointed.

author: Leslie
comments: Great location  definitely staying here again

author: Sherry
comments: Christopher place is wonderful! Comfy and stylish and centrally located with nice restaurants and places to hang out. Christopher is prompt responses and extremely hospitable! If we ever make it to Toronto Canada we are definitely staying again!!!!

author: Tyler
comments: The host is very thorough with communication and check-in instructions. The condo is very clean and the location is unbeatable. Not to mention the morning view of the city you wake up to.

author: Melissa
comments: The space and location was amazing! Getting around Toronto was easy. There were five of us and we were very comfortable. Christopher responded quickly to messages and check-in and out was simple.

author: Tara
comments:
Wonderful stay in a well appointed downtown condo. 
Great view of CN Tower. Downtown Toronto is so walkable and Lyft easy to get. 
Loved the soaking bathtub.

author: Dave
comments: Great host and a fantastic stay.  Christopher was very quick to respond to questions and provided extremely detailed instructions for checking in.  The place was immaculate, well appointed, in a great location, and the skyline view is awesome.  I didn't want to leave and would definitely stay again!

author: Alexandra
comments:
Christopher’s place was great for the spring break trip with my mom, daughter and friend. Nice and clean, spacious even with all the beds opened out. Instructions given for the place were very easy to follow. Great location to the local tourist attractions with just a Lyft away and many restaurants a close by walk away. Loved the coffee maker with all the available options. 

Just wish I would have known the pool was out of service for my daughters use.

author: Lena
comments: Stay here! Location and the apartment itself are superb. Both check in and check out were a breeze. The place was super clean when we arrived. The amenities were great. The bed and couches are comfortable. Streetcars and buses are only a minute away, grocery stores as well. Communication with Christopher was easy and fast. We would stay here again and definitely recommend his place.

author: Sejal
comments: Christopher was absolutely an amazing host. He was so timely with his responses and provided clear instructions re: checking in and access to various amenities in the building. His condo is beautiful with floor to ceiling windows and so comfy! I would definitely come back and stay here again.

author: Richard
comments: We enjoyed staying at Christopher's place.  Loved the decor,  cleanliness, the convenient location, and all the amenities.

author: Kelsey
comments: We enjoyed our stay so much at Christopher’s Airbnb. Check-in and parking were super easy with Christopher’s detailed instructions! The location was perfect and within walking distance to shops and restaurants. We will definitely be coming back here for our next visit to Toronto! :)  Highly recommend!!!

author: JayBreezy
comments: Wasn’t what I expected but it was ok.

author: Katie
comments: Very good location!

author: Brendon
comments: Alper’s place is amazing and in an amazing location. Will definitely be staying here again.

author: Randy
comments: Great stay in Toronto! Alper has an amazing place in the middle of Toronto. The views from the condo are outstanding. Next to a lot of restaurants and bars

author: Nick
comments: Great location, clean, great communicated.  Check in was super easy and painless, will book again.

author: Brian
comments: This place is amazing with some amazing views. Highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay in downtown Toronto

author: Austin
comments: Alper’s space was fantastic! The view was better than we thought and his kitchen had exactly what we needed to make dinner. Thanks for the stay!

author: Ashley
comments: 5/5 stars! Alper’s place is in a great location, within walking distance/a short subway ride away to everything we wanted to do in Toronto. The condo has absolutely stunning views and we felt very safe and comfortable during our stay. Alper is a great host and was responsive to any questions we had. We especially loved the Netflix and comfortable couch in the living room. We will definitely be staying here next time we’re in Toronto, thanks Alper!

author: Sukhbir
comments:
Overall, great place. Would stay there again. 

Pros:
- Good location
- Responsive host
- Essentials provided
- Clean apartment
- Nice view
- private parking included in price 
- comfortable bed
- extra linens provided

Improvements
- Make check in a bit smoother. Concierge couldn’t be aware of the Airbnb so you’ll have to have hide the fact
- Sofa bed was not as comfortable as we thought it would be
- shower could use more pressure
- one of the bathroom doors doesn’t quite lock

author: Amanda
comments: This place is very easy to navigate with the instructions Alper has provided for you. We ran into some unexpected difficulties while checking in with the door being locked, but Alper and his cleaner were able to be in contact and help us with what we needed within 20 minutes which is great. Free parking was definitely a plus like the other reviews have written and it was right under the building, so you don’t have to walk far for it. We were able to find the parking space very easily, but please be very careful in the parking garage because the corners are narrow and it’s a small unit to drive through. Other than that, the stay was much better than I expected. The view from the apartment was beautiful and the balcony was very nice. It felt very home-like with the comfortable bed/blankets and was overall very cleanly. Your offered a good amount of bathroom needs such as towels and toiletry products. Your offered a wide variety of spices and coffee which we didn’t use but is definitely a plus for others who enjoy that. You definitely won’t be disappointed when you stay in this condo. It was a great price for what you’re provided with. Thank you again, Alper!

author: Brian
comments: Great place , very clean and in a convenient location to the subway station

author: Zach
comments: Really nice space for 1-2 people. Super close to the subway which takes you right downtown. Toronto’s subway system is very nice and that’s what we used every day for transportation.

author: Brandi
comments: Excellent place! Would definitely stay again!

author: Amanda
comments: Staying at Holly's place was awesome. From the self checkin, to the killer AC in the unit we loved it. This place was in a 5 min walking distance to major public transport and was super close to some sweet retro video game stores. Would def stay here again on our next trip!

author: Wilson
comments: Holly’s place was very clean and the self check in was very easy. Their private parking made it very easy for us to travel around Toronto. Overall, a great stay and highly recommend this place for a short or long stay as Holly provides outstanding hospitality.

author: Raymond
comments: First off I would like to say that the location was very convenient and clean. When we arrived we met Holly and James. They were very friendly and attentive. Holly's place has all the amenities you will need for a short stay or a long stay.

author: Jordan
comments: A beautiful and clean place. Has all the amenities to live there for a few days like silverware/plates and spare toiletries. There were some donuts left in the fridge for us and a binder of local places to visit which was a big plus

author: Alora
comments: Holly’s place is great. Super easy to get in. Very convenient and close to downtown without the cluttered feel.

author: Erika
comments: This was a great deal for our long weekend in Toronto. We really enjoyed the location being within walking distance to the subway which was a short ride to downtown. Parking was also very nice. The size of the space was perfect for two people.

author: Carolyn
comments: You can expect gorgeous apartment! Clean and very comfortable! After two full days walking around downtown, it felt was great to come back to a place that felt as comfortable as home!

author: Kara
comments: This place is such an amazing deal! It's was minimalist, modern,and very clean. The host responded quickly to any inquiries we had and even found us a place to park during a snow storm. Definitely would reccomend to anyone that wants a nice and affordable place in the city.

author: Kamolrat
comments:
Good place, clean, and convenience.
Just only the wall is thin then we can hear conversation from the next room.

author: Karyn
comments: All the comforts of home. Room 3 with private bathroom is a plus!

author: Carlos
comments: Nice place, very clean and everything new.

author: Tejashree
comments: This place was very close to downtown. Although the walls seemed thin. We could hear the TV at midnight from upstairs/ neighbors was loud. We could hear conversations clearly in the morning as well. Bed was comfy and room was clean.

author: Danae
comments: Our stay was wonderful- the room was sparkling clean and location convenient to downtown Toronto. Would definitely recommend!

author: Divya
comments: Super clean and located in downtown. Had a great stay!!

author: Hoshito
comments: This place is super clean!!!

author: Stella
comments: The room was perfect for my friend and I and the location was beyond amazing. Super close to downtown so I would definitely visit again if I get to come to Toronto again.

author: Mariam
comments: Amazing stay at Wincent and Linh. The couple is nice and convenient. We had a problem with the toilet and the door locker but Wincent was very helpful and kind! Would definitely book here again! Bus and streetcars are so easily accessible.

author: John
comments:
Very clean basement apartment located within a couple blocks of Bloor. Excellent location and very easy parking, which sometimes can be an issue in Toronto.

Would definitely recommend!

author: Kristina
comments: Lovely little flat in a great location.  We were there to check out the Univ of Toronto and it was very close for us to stay.  It's also close to lots of shops and restaurants. Would recommend.

author: Erin
comments: We had a great time at Michelle’s place and would stay again. The neighborhood is very cute, about a 10 minute walk away from the university and the 1 & 2 metro lines. A lot of bus stops nearby and easy to get around the city. The apartment had everything we needed and was in a great location. Definitely recommend!

author: John
comments: Michelle was very easy to contact upon reservation regarding additional request and neighborhood information.  The accommodation was very tidy with plenty of amenities for two people.  Never met Michelle, although her neighbor upstairs was very kind to show us to the proper door for check-in (our fault for not properly reading the instructions, haha).  Great location as well.  Stones throw from Bathurst Streetcar line, and Bloor Subway station.

author: Jeana
comments: Nice place, not far from Koreatown.

author: Dan
comments: Can’t say enough good things! Friendly and helpful host! Prime location, easy to find and walking distance to many things! Highly recommended for people visiting Toronto and want to stay on a street with pretty older houses.

author: Kyla
comments: Perfect spot for my work trip! Close to many restaurants

author: Clare
comments: Great location and quick replies. The apartment was a terrific value and I would definitely stay again.

author: Faye-Lyne
comments: This place was good for a quick overnight in the city.

author: Jose Luis
comments: Location is perfect!

author: Oronde
comments: Great location.  I stayed there for 1 night and parking was a royal PIA.  I would not suggest this location if you have a vehicle since there are only 2 parking spaces and multiple travelers in the building.  Chances of you getting a spot are a real gamble.  I completely lost. If you are visiting from outside Canada the phone pay app may not be the best option because I believe they take an initial 20-25 dollar deposit out upon first use.  You will need to keep running back to the meter to top it up.  The one pay lot is a bit of a walk so not the most convenient if you have a vehicle.   However the unit was super clean an comfortable.

author: Raphael
comments: Cool place! Great host and quick to respond

author: Chynna
comments: Host is friendly and gets back to you quickly, and location is close to pretty much everything. However, free parking on premises is first come first serve, so keep in mind if you don’t want to pay for parking. Additionally, the shower leaks when in use and no additional linens are provided, so if something gets wet, you have to wash and dry it yourself. Also, there’s no TV. This stay works if you’re not expecting much other than a place to stay overnight.

author: John
comments: Nice sized apartment, short walk from where I needed to me. Great experience.

author: Joseph
comments: A lovely little basement apartment, not too far of a walk from College Street and the Little Italy neighborhood thoroughfare. Comfy bed, we slept quite well, good outlet access. We weren't in the apartment much to use all of its amenities, but it was comfortable.

author: Mary
comments: Super convenient location within walking distance of lots of restaurants and shops. Nice and clean with fantastic blackout curtains. Easy check in, everything was as expected.

author: Joe
comments: Great location in Toronto but if you're a light sleeper I wouldn't recommend staying here as it is on a main road. The free parking that is included is awesome! If you're tall, beware, this is a basement apartment with a low ceiling (7ft?) And there is an HVAC run down one size which lowers the ceiling to about 5'8". I'd definitely stay here again as it's a quick walk to Korean Town, Kensington, and Little Italy. There isn't much to use by way of the kitchen but there are plenty of restaurants within walking distance.

author: Emily
comments: This AirBnB is in a nice location, and fairly easy to get into and out of if you drive there. The apartment is very open with a nice kitchen area if needed for your stay.

author: Diana
comments:
I beg you, DO NOT deal with any listings from this host & the management company, Paperbox.

Absolute disaster of a stay...
Hair on the shower wall
GIANT hair cluster in shower drain.
Hair appliance in bedroom thrown around carelessly
Kitchen sink drain dirty & full of food debris.
General uncleanliness of the kitchen- dishes from previous guest still out, dirty water in tea kettle, wet rag on counter, cleaning soaps left on counter, crumbs on toaster.

Check in instructions sent 3.5 hours AFTER check in time; paperbox/host did not notice until I had to call for the lock box code / check in instructions.

Paperbox/host claimed cleaner came by and cleaned the apartment when confronted with the dirtiness of the unit & tried to tell me that it was clean, when I have the text from them saying that the cleaner was not able to get into the apartment to clean.  Paperbox/host did not remedy the situation & had to stay in the filth of a unit.  I have not heard from them in regards of a refund.  They became unresponsive & had to get Airbnb involved.

Photos taken are misleading - 
No decorations in bedroom.
No mirror in bathroom.
No sunlight shining in from windows as the pictures depict because it is in between two buildings and the fact that it is a basement apartment.

Parking that is included is a gamble because it is dedicated to you, but on a first come first serve basis with all the other airbnb guests in the rest of the building.

What a poor excuse for a host / management company to be part of the hospitality industry.  Do yourself a favor and find another airbnb & if none are available for your dates, get a hotel and save yourself the hassle and migrant from hell.

author: Elwin
comments: Great place! Conveniently located near the subway and lots of food places only 5 minutes walk away. The place itself is pretty spacious and it's exactly how it looked on the photos. The ceiling is a bit low as mentioned by the other guests, but I didn't have any problems with it (I'm 5'10). The host was very quick with responding and the self check-in was very easy. Definitely recommend this place!

author: Doug
comments: Jessica's place is in an amazing location. Check in went smoothly.  Everything was great! Would stay again :)

author: Katie
comments: Jessica’s condo was a wonderful place to stay! The location was perfect and the condo was exactly as pictured and described. Very clean and has a beautiful view.

author: Lauren
comments: Great place to stay that is walking distance from all the great stores and eateries. It was quite easy to check in and out. Definitely recommend.

author: Cameron
comments: Jessica's place is a must stay if visiting the Toronto area! The condo was very clean and had a great view of the downtown area. Within walking distance to most attractions and a short cab ride away from the others. Jessia was an excellent host to work with and had great communication throughout!

author: Dan
comments: Excellent location and a very nice place, would recommend to people wanting to stay downtown in Toronto

author: Zack
comments: Great view and very clean!

author: David
comments: Had a great stay, the place is just like the pictures show, nice, clean and convenient. Plus great communications.

author: Graham
comments: Great host with a spectacular location. Very accommodating and easy to work with!

author: Max
comments:
Very nice place clean and great location. Was very easy to get into the place. We even arrived an hour early and where able to check in. 

Very happy over all. Would recommend this place to anyone needing a spot in Toronto for them and a couple of friends

author: Sheila
comments: Great location for downtown meetings.

author: Nicholas
comments: Very clean and comfy! Location was very ideal too!

author: Aaron
comments: Place is exactly like it promotes and great that is was right downtown.

author: Rob
comments: great location!

author: Edee
comments:
My boyfriend and I stayed at this Airbnb location form August 2-4, and our entire experience was horrendous. For starters, locating the address was so stressful, the physical address is quite different from what was listed, and on a busy street like Yorkville, traffic is despicable. 

Arriving at the Airbnb location, we weren’t able to park in the garage in the building although we had already prepaid for parking through the host. A refund took over 10 days to process. Basic amenities like towels and body wash wasn’t present in the apartment on our arrival. Overall, this apartment was really small, it has no scenic view and isn’t worth the price of the stay.

author: Christine
comments: A clean, comfortable, and stylish place with an unbeatable location.

author: Tim
comments: This place felt like home. It is in the heart of Yorkville and there are so many restaurants, bars, and lounges near by. Overall, this place was safe and I would recommend the stay.

author: Anthony
comments: Great location in a luxurious part of Toronto

author: Alex
comments: The place was great, convenient and so nice. The location made exploring Yorkville so easy- would highly recommend this to anyone!

author: Lloyd
comments: This place was in a great location but has seen some wear with being a frequently used unit.  Our host was great and was very good at communicating with us.

author: Ann
comments: I had a great stay at the apartment. I will book again when I'm in Toronto. Great location. Check in was very convenient, communication with the host was helpful and professional, and the apartment was easy to use and well appointed with a very comfortable bed.

author: Elena
comments: Great for a quick overnight stay but there is a good amount of noise as the rooms are not disconnected or soundproofed

author: Minerva
comments: Very easy check in, great recommendations from host..cozy place.

author: Doug
comments: Excellent place right downtown, with a grocery store next door. Two minutes' walk will bring you to restaurants offering sushi, korean, afghan food, and more.

author: Francisco
comments:
The location was close to transportation, shops and restaurants. Room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was shared with other guests in the house. You can you use the kitchen to prepare your own meal.  Overall a great stay for my vacation.
Thank you.

author: Isabela
comments: Expect fucking frying smell at 10 in the evening!!!!~ FUCK YOU!

author: Lyle
comments: Great place to stay! Well located in Toronto.

author: Lorena
comments: Very clean home and very friendly! Location is very ideal!

author: Sunny
comments: Located at a convenient place so it was easy to travel.

author: Jessica
comments: This place was in a great location and checking in and out was stress-free!

author: Jonathan
comments: Nice room in a good location (especially for University of Toronto). The room is clean, warm and comfortable and communication with James was prompt and helpful.

author: Eric
comments: Good value.

author: Raul Antonio
comments: Nice place to stay

author: Erick
comments: Lidia is a great host! Thank you Lidia for your hospitality

author: Katie
comments: Very kind and responsive host, very clean home and great value for the price. Did not warn us before hand that the toilet was not functioning, did not mention that we could not park at the house. Would stay there again though, location is great!

author: Suzanne
comments: Cozy is the word for it — this room is small. But since I didn’t need it for practicing my floor routine, it was quite comfortable. The wifi is good, there is a power strip for computing and charging, and you have your own entrance. I didn’t use them, but there is also a dresser and a TV. Hooks for even heavy winter coats are in the room, along with a mat for shoes and complimentary slippers to use. There is a kitchenette available, with a kettle for boiling water ready to go. While the bathroom is shared, I never noticed anyone else using it (great water pressure, too!). It is very clean, and I found the bed to be very comfortable (I prefer a firm mattress). The pillows have a firm side and a soft side, to appeal to everyone. There are some drawbacks: the path along the side of the house to your private entrance isn’t all well lit (I used my phone flashlight) and the gate catch at the top is a little tricky from the outside. You can’t flush toilet paper, which may put off anyone who has never been outside the US and Canada, but won’t phase world travelers. The parking is by neighbourhood permit, so it’s best to go to the Toronto City Hall site and purchase a temporary permit (24-hr, 48-hr, or one week), and print the permit off at home before you come. It’s $11CDN, as opposed to the $50 ticket you get if you’re parked after midnight without one. I didn’t know that and it was a little inconvenient to get it done once there. The location is excellent, about a 3-4-minute walk to College Street (where you could also park), where there are some great restaurants. I was in town for an event at the Mod Club Theatre, and I was so glad I had a brief walk back to my cozy room and not a drive back to Buffalo at the end of the night. Lidia and her family could not have been more welcoming, and it was a pleasure to stay in their home. I would definitely go back next time I have an event in that area.

author: Brandi
comments: Lidia's place is in a great location. She is great at quick communication and check-in was a breeze.

author: Muhammed
comments: Great spot to stay when in Toronto.

author: Bilal
comments: Amazing host very clean place and great communication!

author: J.
comments: Location is excellent and Lidia very kind. The place is near all, but on a quiet street. Comfortable back of house unit with great access. Will definitely come again!

author: Elisabeth
comments:
Great place in the city area, transportation is easy,
The air bnb had everything you needed and Lidia is very kind and able to help if you needed anything

author: Clifford
comments:
If you care about your HEALTH I would not recommend getting this place !

From the moment we entered this place, there were issues. The comforter has stain on them, bedsheet had hair and different material lingering on them. The mattress is disgusting to the point ones seen, no one in the their right mind would lay on them. 

When calling the owner to bring to their attention about the cleanliness of the place, I was greeted with disrespect and very un helpful mindset and behaviors. 

Over very disappointed experience

author: Mitchell
comments: Great place to stay if you are needing somewhere basic to stay in which you do not want to experience of room but more of experiencing the city of Toronto. Cleanliness was good and the building was really pretty.

author: Ashlynn
comments: Be careful take own blanket ours had cum stains on it towels smelled really bad

author: Minerva
comments: Would definitely recommend and will definitely return.

author: 黎奈
comments: cheap and nice!

author: Katharina
comments: Perfect location for exploring Toronto. Very nice small apartment in quiet street.

author: Ramses
comments: The apartment is amazing and well located, close to the university and one block away from the train, it was sparkling clean and Irina is a great host, she responded all of my requests in time, I would not hesitate to stay at this place again. Recommended!

author: Frank
comments: The only issue we had was the A/C unit was not working. Plugged in but the system switch was unresponsive. Made for a warm night. The open window was not enough. Would definitely stay there again

author: Zhanju
comments: Convenient location, for the price you paid you never get a better place. I wish they could have clean pillows.

author: Eve
comments: My fiancé and I were pretty disappointed with our stay. We felt like the description and photos of the listing were much better looking than the actual condition of the place. We feel like we could have paid a similar amount and stayed at a hotel.

author: Motasim
comments: Good location not recommended if your 6ft tall or taller

author: Elizabeth
comments: Karen is such an accommodating and caring host! She was so helpful and always responded quickly to inquiries. Her place is well located and the perfect size for two people!

author: Kaitlyn
comments: The outlets in the bedroom did not work when we stayed here. not sure if they ever work but this was inconvenient because we couldn’t charge phones in the room or hear alarms and the space heaters didn’t work in there so it was very cold. if you stay here beware of the parking situation. we assumed due to lack of signs on the street that street parking was free but woke up to 2 tickets the first morning. other than that, the bed was very comfortable and although you have to drive to get to downtown toronto, it is within walking distance to a store and a few bars.

author: Carmela
comments: It was a great experience. Karen goes above and beyond in communication/ recommendations. The space is very cozy and intimate. Food-wise, everything is a walk away!

author: Charissa
comments:
Karen is an awesome host! She 
made our time in Toronto way better than we imagined. Great hospitality!

author: Sarah
comments: Everything was great check in and parking was easy. Parking is public but very close. Many restaurants within walking distance.

author: Darrin
comments: Great location with a ton of stuff to do walking distances. Easy to get to the train station and therefore throughout all of Toronto. The hosts are very quick to respond to your questions.

author: Andrew
comments: Karen's place is great for couple. Paid parking and subway are practically next door. It's also right in the Greektown so plenty of restaurants around.

author: Becca
comments: A great spot! It felt extremely safe and well kept.

author: Thomas
comments: This place is spotless, with all the basic amenities and is literally steps (a two minute walk) to the subway. The neighborhood is quiet but not sleepy - there was a street festival going on a block away while we were there. I spent three nights and had a restful sleep every time. I would definitely stay here again.

author: Mandie
comments:
I have booked with Elizabeth twice. This second time was in her recently renovated suite, which is bright, cozy, and feel like home away from home. It's kitchenett was very handy to have. 
Elizabeth is a wonderful host, very kind.

author: Donyale
comments: I very much enjoyed Elizabeth's apt! It was just what I was looking for. Located in Parkdale near public transportation, lots of places to eat in the neighborhood, friendly folks on the street. The apt was newly renovated and quiet. Perfect for my business trip! Thanks, Elizabeth!

author: Antun-Denis
comments: Charming, clean apartment with a wonderful view in my favorite Toronto neighborhood. Every possible store and restaurant is within walking distance, and the streetcar stop is right in front of the entrance to the building. Elizabeth is a very kind, thoughtful host.

author: Sue
comments: Large apartment right on Roncesvalles. Very clean and comfortable. Hostess is responsive to the guest’s needs. Have stayed here numerous times.

author: Marcus
comments:
Cozy AirBnB next to public transit and a sharebike station. I really enjoyed the room itself, though the showers water pressure was kinda weak and the room could get a bit dark in the evening.

Elizabeth herself wasn’t very kind and understanding. I was initially supposed to drive in at 9 pm, but was delayed to 10 pm, and Elizabeth was still there to greet me and check me in.

Note on parking: it’s a bit of a workaround, but I would park in the paid parking lots (free through the night), then use the app to pay for a couple hours in the morning, and then move my car to the side street until I was ready to use it. A bit annoying as the app requires a $20 prepaid, but it was workable.

author: Saisha
comments: Met with Elizabeth to check in, she was very pleasant, gave us a ran down of everything. Easy free parking on the nearby streets. Many restaurants and cafes. Close to downtown. Highly recommended.

author: Mina
comments: Great spot just outside downtown Toronto located near various lines. Elizabeth was so accommodating when we were stuck in traffic for check in and helped us with getting everything in the apartment and covered our parking.

author: Brandon
comments: Great neighborhood! Easy to hop on the street car and so many great restaurants and bars in the area! Easy walk to the waterfront, also! Convenient location if you want to stay outside of the city center.

author: Diane
comments: Great host great location.

author: Laura-Lynn
comments: Perfect place for a layover.

author: Katie
comments: Nice, clean place as pictured. Location is close to downtown, but be aware of the parking rates/costs. The lot is fairly expensive, and the street parking isn't that much cheaper and has fairly restrictive hours (will have to pay a $2/hour rate on the street unless you plan on only leaving your car from around 9pm-8am worst case, but Mon-Thurs was free street parking after 6pm). Neighbors could be a bit loud, but really only noticed on weekends. Otherwise, place was a good home base for a 4-day vacation.

author: William
comments: Very clean and a good value. Interesting neighborhood

author: Kenny
comments: The place is well put but only issue was the coldness of the room at times.

author: Fahim
comments: Underground bunk. Gets cold so you'll probably have to use the space heater. Really cold at night. Unusual area. Parking is really expensive. Full of nearby AirBnb rooms, and guests were loud and can hear everything else that goes on in the basement. Felt like I couldn't breath in the room. Fire hazard, as there are no windows in the room.

author: Joe
comments: One of the coolest neighborhoods I saw in Toronto. Super quick to get into the city as well. The room was clean with all the necessary amenities. Overall great value.

author: Vinay
comments: Clean place. Excellent location close to everything. Fast and easy communication. Great value for money.  Safe neighborhood. FIVE STAR!!

author: Jared
comments: This is a great spot for travelers looking for a simple, clean, inexpensive place to stay. It was perfectly clean when I arrived and was easy to keep that way. The neighborhood seemed safe and public transportation was very easy to access. Cheap parking was located right across the street, which was great to have. I should note that the mattress is quite firm (which was just fine by me) and on the rare occasions that people came in and out of the other rooms, I could hear them pretty clearly. Otherwise, it was a great stay and I would definitely recommend it. Sheng was very accommodating and communicative throughout, as well!

author: Rachael
comments: Sheng's place was very neat and clean. Parking was available in a payed lot across the street. It was a great place to come back and relax in between events.

author: Nicole
comments: Very easy communication for a quick trip. Clean and efficient, would recommend!

author: Caitlin
comments: Convenient, clean space with great communication. Perfect for a weekend trip!

author: Patrick
comments: The definition of getting more than you paid for... this condo is incredible! Beautiful views, excellent amenities, and even better communication and service!

author: Jay
comments: Apartment was exactly as described. Nice view. Very clean

author: Cynthia
comments: Martha's place is perfectly situated near the center of downtown and Union Station.  Incredible views and everything you need at your finger tips.

author: Kathy
comments: Cool flat in a location that’s convenient to Union Station— and basically everything in Toronto. The view was flabbergasting! We would return again.
