P.S. If you’re staying at CJ’s place, it is just around the corner from a doughnut shop called Cops that has the absolute best doughnuts I’ve ever had the pleasure of eating.

author: Yosneida
comments: Ideal location to explore downtown Toronto, and host was kind.

author: Braxton
comments: Awesome place in awesome location!

author: Adam
comments: CJ’s apartment was the perfect place for me to stay on my weekend trip to Toronto.  It is located perfectly with a countless amount of bars, restaurants, and shopping within a 5 / 10 minute walk.  The apartment itself was great also.  It had  a very modern design and the bed was unbelievably comfortable.  The central air worked great and helped me stay cold and comfortable on a hot day.  The 70 inch tv was visible from both the couch and the bed.  The modern / clean bathroom also had a huge rain shower head which was great. Would recommend this apt to anyone !

author: Gaurav
comments: I highly recommend CJ and his suite near the fashion district! It's right in the midst of the best nightlife in Toronto, and if you decide you want to stay in rather than hit the town CJ's suite is downright luxurious, with decor and furnishings that are both stylish and comfortable. Between the balcony, the giant TV, and the rainfall shower this was a great place to call home for my most recent stay in Toronto. CJ is super responsive and provided thorough instructions on how to check in and enjoy the suite. I would love to stay here again!

author: William
comments: Very clean, and everything matched the description. Great location, close to main attractions in the Toronto area. Would highly recommend if looking for a classier place than typical hotel rooms.

author: Brittany
comments: LOVED CJ's place! would definitely recommend

author: Sakshi
comments: I dint stay at the place so I honestly can't say. I left because I arrived late night and found area unsafe with a toddler. It's just a single opinion. CJ is very responsive to messages and seems like a reasonable person. Don't let one opinion sway your judgement. Thanks.

author: David
comments: My family of four really enjoyed our visit to Toronto.  The environment was great and CJ was a great host.  We have a few questions and he responded quickly.  The apartment is well within walking distance of many attractions.

author: Josh
comments:
CJ provided detailed direction to the parking and room, which was very helpful for me.

The place is in a good location, close to bars and restaurants. It’s definitely a great place to stay for people who like food, drinks and bar hopping.

author: Gabriel
comments: Place was outstanding, With an even better placement in downtown Toronto, can’t wait to go back!

author: Mike
comments: Great place, large windows with beautiful views of Toronto. Joseph was extremely quick with responses and was very accommodating. Would love to stay here again!

author: Anne
comments: Great location. We have stayed here twice and love the convenience, location, and style. Had one minor problem that was quickly resolved. Thanks a million!

author: Edrico
comments: Place was great value for money.  Hosts were great at responding to messages and queries. Great location. Great size for couples.

author: Tifani
comments: The location was great, walking distance to everything!

author: Timothy
comments: Jennifer & Joseph were great hosts and will rent again.  Great location amenities & secure.

author: Bethany
comments: My stay was unfortunate. I'm not sure the last time the place was used but I found it in a state which took 3 full days to rectify. Black mold and extreme condensation in the fridge, dirty tub, towels were stained and the bathroom fan would not turn off, was loud and unfortunately kept me up for 2 nights. There were stains on the kitchen table and the floor infront of the fridge was really dirty - like someone had dropped blobs of honey. The bedroom light needed to be plugged in and unplugged to to work. You can't sit on the couch. It's a pull out and has bucket seats - you need to sit on cushion. I sat on kitchen chairs the whole time. The hosts are responsive but never once came to fix it. I had to continually send pictures to prove what was happening. After all that they only refunded me $50. The bed is comfortable, there is a starbucks right downstairs, a great LCBO down the street , check in is easy, and the kitchen is stocked for anything you may need for a long stay. I did a lot of work and the place should be ready for the next guests but it was a lot of work on my part with little thanks. There are a ALOT of units in this building for airbnb with 5 stars - I wouldn't say they were superhosts based on this experience. I wanted it to be different

author: Gustavo
comments: I had a great stay, everything was smooth and went pretty much as expected.

author: Kerri
comments: Wow...y’all about a dream Airbnb pad and host team! Jennifer and Joseph were so incredibly hospitable and responsive. The views were breathtaking .

author: Cassee
comments: Unbeatable view and incredibly comfortable/stylish luxury apartment with easy access check in process and friendly concierge. Amazing location right below CN tower and really comfortable bed. Will definitely stay there again.

author: Carlos
comments: The place is great, the room beautiful and the staff is amazing.

author: Erin
comments: Great place, very clean and stylish, and the breakfast was amazing. Parking was pretty expensive though.

author: Caroline
comments: Typical hotel stay at half the price. Super clean space with very nice staff to offer anything you may need.

author: Wendy
comments: Very nice place, my first Airbnb but much better than I thought. Recommend

author: Norma
comments: This place was perfect for our one night stay. The receptionist was seriously the most incredible guy ever!! He was so so nice and great customer service! He offered to help take our luggage upstairs and to our car. He constantly made sure we were doing ok and making sure we weren’t missing anything. I forgot his name but he truly made us feel safe and at home.

author: William
comments: We had a awesome experience at this place in the heart of Toronto, our room was perfect and the hospitality was beyond compare. Hope to make it back there again next time I am in Toronto. ❤️

author: Kira
comments: The room was not clean, especially the bathroom. My tv did not work. Staff is nice and gave me updates. Room was quiet.

author: Cheyanne
comments: The place is very nice and kept! Wifi is good as well. The walls are a little thin but honestly for the price you are paying it’s okay. A great stay!

author: Devonte
comments: Great room

author: Andrew
comments:
A good place to stay and a nice area of Toronto; very accessible and close to the downtown core. Could be better priced but overall it’s still worthwhile. 

Ps. Hosts followed COVID19 protocols very strictly - perfect if you want that sort of thing.

author: Andrea
comments: Richard was a wonderful host who was attentive and thoughtful. I would highly recommend. Andrea

author: Jenna
comments: Great place to stay! Centrally located and  the place was beautiful. My favorite part of the stay was how safe it felt. Everyone needs a fob to enter building and to use elevators.

author: Dorianne
comments: Perfect place to stay for one or two people in Toronto. The apartment was spotless and very warming. The location couldn’t have been better. Would recommend it to anyone.

author: Maya
comments: For it being my first time in Toronto, this place was in the heart of the entertainment district and a perfect location. Host was super helpful and informative. Will definitely be back!

author: Brendan
comments: Great location! Perfect for a single traveller or couple!

author: Harry
comments: Been an avid AirBnB user... from A to Z, this stay and host were best to date!

author: Walter
comments: The place was located in a great area right across from the CN tower. It was a really nice building that was kept very clean. The bed was a little hard to sleep on and I also had some maintenance workers knock on the door while I was working without a notice someone would be stopping by. Overall it was a comfortable stay.

author: Brandon
comments:
Richard was a great host and his place was perfect for my stay: spotless and comfortable and in a great location downtown.

I would highly recommend his place!

author: Elliot
comments: If you are looking for a great place to stay while in Toronto look no further. I stayed here on a recent business trip and you could not beat the location. I forgot my toothbrush at home but sure enough the host had a brand new toothbrush ready just in case this happens. The entire check-in process was very easy and the host was very quick to respond to any questions I had. I definitely recommend staying here if you are in Toronto.

author: Lily
comments: Loved staying in this beautiful city apartment. Great location with a communicative host. Sparkling clean and comfortable furniture. Thank you Richard!

author: William
comments: The description explains it is not the nicest listing in Toronto however it is still not an accurate description. The apartment had a very bad smell, and the sheets were unclean. Please be wary when booking with Brahm, and only book if you have no other option. We were extremely disappointed and after arriving, we stayed for only an hour before booking another listing, unfortunate yet the wasted $300 was worth it after we booked a much nicer airbnb. Overall Toronto is a great place you just need to stay somewhere other than Brahm's listing.

author: Fernando
comments: The place looks much better in photos than in reality. Nevertheless, it is centrally located and somewhat inexpensive. It is great for no longer than three days or so. The host is polite and informative. For what it’s worth staying in this place was also like a trip down memory lane. We are New Yorkers so this sort of arrangement took us back to life in NYC.

author: Andrew
comments: Host communicates well. Space isn't finished as cleanly as the pictures let on but for a tucked away place in Chinatown/Spadina, it was great and secure.

author: Tessa
comments: Fantastic location - convenient to all and in a cool, safe area near UT! We were also pleased with the low cost, prompt communication, and accuracy of the listing. Brahm, the directions you provided were precise and easy to understand. Thank you!

author: Evette
comments:
Small apartment that is in China Town in Toronto...Cozy and has basic (Website hidden by Airbnb) sure to bring your laptop and tv connections because their is no reception... Buy food to cook, and any coffee, etc...their is a kitchen to cook in that will help you save money. Also, the shower is very tight and right next to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) be careful getting in and out. 

It was an affordable place for a week and I was out most of the time so it served my needs

Thanks

author: Heather
comments: Nice place with about a 20 minute walk to downtown!

author: Michael
comments: Very comfortable and cute place.  Highly recommend!

author: Rebecca
comments: Cozy place near some great neighborhoods.

author: Kenton
comments: Great value to see an amazingly beautiful city

author: Zor
comments: Location is super and the place is quiet and cosy. We had great time staying here. This is truly an old house so manage your expectations-everything is clean and working. The host is helpful and responsive.

author: Martin
comments: Clean, stylish basement near Greektown that has lots of walkable options while in Toronto. Make sure to review the parking policy and have your pass printed in advance if bringing your car.

author: Lindsey
comments: Exactly what we needed for our stay!

author: Stephen
comments: fun cozy stay in a good spot.

author: Liam
comments: Great place to stay, pretty convenient.

author: Brendan
comments: Great place for a stop and go sleep space in Toronto.

author: Lyndsey
comments: Lily's place was perfect for our 1 nightstay while passing through the city. Exactly as described!

author: Tom
comments: This location was VERY clean and well kept. We really enjoyed our stay and felt very comfortable. Would recommend to anyone staying in Toronto.

author: Steven
comments: This spot is a good deal for the price and the communication with Lily is excellent!  Pay close attention to her parking instructions...we got a ticket.

author: Markanthony
comments:
Fantastic place for short stays. Everything was as described and was the perfect amount of privacy.
Ceilings are a little low - about 6 feet, but other than that, no issues!

author: Martin
comments: Nice place with great value and great response times

author: Andre
comments: Stay was great. Place is definitely small but has everything that you need. And it was nice and clean!

author: Marco
comments: Very well located with all the services, we could basically go shopping or eating to eaton centre cause is very close

author: Haosen
comments: Overall a great stay. Pretty small but surprisingly organized. Even a small balcony is included!

author: Halle
comments:
This place was pretty much as pictured. The location was amazing. Walking distance to many of Toronto’s main attractions and blocks away from the Eaton Centre if shopping is your love language. :-) The space is very small but is fine if you aren’t planning to spend much time in the room and plan to be out exploring! 
Enjoy,
HC

author: Emily
comments: We had a great stay in Toronto at this airbnb. It is right in the heart of the city and a lot of restaurants and shops are within walking distance. The space was a bit smaller than expected, but we had no issues with it as we were out and about every day. Definitely would recommend for a quick trip to the city!

author: Ashley
comments:
Place was fine.
Location, I would say, is the best feature of it !

author: Francesco
comments: Cheap, clean, and conveniently located. Huan is very easy to communicate with and the check-in is very efficient. A perfect spot to spend a couple of nights in Toronto!

author: Angelyn
comments: This studio apartment is in a great location, the building is well-kept, and the apartment itself is nice. It was small, but for two tourists who were basically only sleeping in the room, it was perfect. Definitely a good value and great experience!

author: Adam
comments: Juan was very accommodating and let us drop our bags off at his place before check-in time because I am on crutches. Very cool place with great location in the city. 5/5

author: Cristina
comments: Perfect size if you’re going to be out and about on the town! I’d never been to Toronto so I wasn’t aware of the public street parking rules and hours, so do a little bit of research before your stay and I think you’ll be good!

author: Marques
comments: Zamani's place was great. Right in the middle of everywhere I needed to be. Very quiet and cozy. Perfect for a single traveler or couple.

author: Audrey
comments: Very convenient having the subway 1 block away. We left our car parked at the apartment and took the subway to downtown Toronto. Apartment was very clean.

author: Forrest
comments: Great cozy space, easy to check in and contact host with any questions. Great location too, especially if you want to do some shopping at Yorkdale.

author: Craig
comments: Zamani's place was clean and comfortable.  Access is easy and well lit. The subway to downtown Toronto is very close by.  The neighborhood feels safe and there are delis and pubs nearby.  You can hear every footstep in the apartment above you but this was not a problem for me.  A very convenient and pleasant place to stay at a great price.

author: Sarah
comments: The place itself is very clean and stylish, and in a great location.  However, the description is right in saying there will be noise from other apartments. I was woken up at midnight and again at 7 am from continuous noise from upstairs. Just something to be aware of if you're a light sleeper.

author: Liridon
comments: Zamani’s place was exactly as is described, clean, comfort and convenient location. Definitely we would stay again

author: Savannah
comments: Best spot so far in Toronto. It was cozy, clean and quiet! Normally, I go to Airbnb’s and they have really loud guests but we were the only ones. The Subway is a block away which was extremely convenient. It seemed to be 10-15 minutes from the city. I hope to go back soon!! Thank you, Zamani for your hospitality!!

author: Adam
comments: Enjoyed my stay there.  Everything was as expected.  I would stay there again. Adam

author: Andrew
comments: Great place close to the subway! Would recommend

author: Sam
comments: Great location, clean and everything you need for a couple of days in Toronto. Would come back or recommend.

author: Bailey
comments: Overall really solid place to stay for a great price. Great location and you get what you pay for. Would recommend.

author: Iliana
comments: The space provided by Huan was clean and conveniently located by the St. Lawrence market. The apartment is small but has everything you need for a short term stay.

author: Katherine
comments: Very nice cute place to stay

author: Carolann
comments: Great location! Cute space that's walking distance to downtown Toronto and Yunge street. Easy check in and check out. Location is ideal to explore.

author: Shiyi
comments: It's a nice place! Very convenient. Walkable distance to anywhere in downtown Toronto

author: Hailey
comments: Great place for the price! The house was clean and well maintained. Perfect for our wedding weekend getaway!

author: Karin
comments: Very convenient place to stay in Toronto!  Thanks!

author: Jenna
comments: Huan's place was a cozy place to relax after long days of adventure and travel. The city is within walking distance and there were many places to eat or access public transportation nearby. Quick responses made us feel at ease if we had any questions about the area or the apartment. Would definitely recommend this clean and quiet space!

author: Renee
comments: Good for a quick stay in Toronto

author: Mandy
comments: Huan’s place was perfect for our weekend in Toronto! Check in was easy and perfect for our late night arrival. The location is great. With a parking lot nearby. It’s just a short walk to the Eaton Center, Dundas Square and many restaurants with easy access to the Dundas Subway Station. The space clean and the perfect size for our party of 4. The foldout bed was set up and ready for us. The apartment was also nice and quite, perfect for a good nights sleep. I would definitely stay again!

author: Bethany
comments: Great location! Within walking distance to many great sites. Nice and clean apartment. Good wifi experience and clear directions for check in.

author: Bryan
comments: Great stay!

author: Timothy
comments: Ling keepin it 100

author: Dominick
comments: Very clean apartment in a great location.

author: Jerry
comments: The apartment is very well-kept everything is easy and accessible. It has a view it’s also very close by a 24 hour convenience store. Ling is very help and Detail oriented.

author: Amanda
comments: Great location, sparkling clean.

author: Neeraj
comments: Excellent apartment and ideally situated close to great restaurants and the Path. Will definitely stay here again.

author: Dan
comments: great apartment and great location.

author: Cory
comments: Close to everything downtown.  If you arrive late there is a 24 hr food mart on the same block.  Lots of space in this 1 bedroom  unit compared to other similarly priced studios downtown.

author: Daniel
comments: I think one of the best things about this place is that it is centrally located downtown. You are only a few minutes from Osgoode Station (which is a stop on the subway system), you are close to the main train station (Union Station) and you are only a few blocks away from Queen Street West, which has the streetcars, and has a lot of great restaurants and shops (record shops, shopping, etc.). Also, once you come out of the building there is a 24-hour shop around the corner where you can get basics (water, milk, eggs, cheese, cold cuts, etc.) at any time of the day or night. The bed is comfortable, and the shower has great water pressure and lots of hot water. You are about 16 stories up, so you'll be somewhat isolated from the street-level noise, although this is a bit city and you are downtown, so you'll get some noise. There is a coffee maker and an electric kettle in the kitchen, which was nice for early morning coffee. This is not a luxury condo, but it is a good apartment where you can stay and have access to all things downtown. One point I feel I have to mention is that we were told not to use the front door of the building, and to walk in through the back (through the parking garage). I think if you come by car, this is probably no big deal, because you're going to park in the garage anyway, but we came in by train and were on foot and, had we known we couldn't use the front door, we would have rented elsewhere. But other than that, we had no major objections.

author: Petar
comments: Great apartment in a great Toronto neighbourhood. Apartment was exactly as described and shown, couldn't have been happier. Kitchen was clean with plenty of pots, pans, utensils. Bed was very comfortable and there's clearly more than enough space for 2-3 people easy. Balcony is a huge added bonus and Sandra was incredibly quick to reply which made the stay even better. Super convenient, plenty of space, super stocked with amenities. I'd definitely stay here again! Thanks!

author: Andrew
comments: Perfect Airbnb for a couple visiting Toronto, the loft bed was a fun addition to an overall great and cozy apartment. Check-in and check-out was very smooth and was close to  lot of restaurants and the downtown area. The hosts provided everything needed for a relaxing stay. I would definitely stay here again given the choice.

author: Nicholas
comments: Great space in a quiet spot to share with a friend (or have to yourself) near Queen St. and all the attendant nightlife. We stayed for a concert at the Opera House.

author: Christiana
comments: The place was at a great location, a quick drive to any tourist spots in the city. The place was very clean, with good wifi and games. The parking spot was also a plus! Overall my stay at this place was great!

author: Elizabeth
comments:
Lovely upstairs private unit near Dundas street, which appears to be one of the main streets of the city. The bed is in a sort of loft but is very, very sturdy and the other bed is more of a futon, but still nice. 
Sandra provided toiletries and towels for the bathroom, as well as made up our beds. 
There’s also a nice little balcony outside. 
Overall great value for our weekend stay!

author: Amanda
comments:
Sandra's place was absolutely perfect! It was within walking distance to a lot of bars and restaurants, and public transport seemed to be pretty accessable. There was free parking (which was a HUGE blessing, especially bc it was in a driveway and not Street side) if you're looking for privacy, I would definitely recommend staying here! I felt as if I was in my own little place. The loft was spotless! Everything was so clean. 
If you're coming in the winter (like I did) and hate the cold, there's lots of games, video and board, to play so you don't have to brace the weather. Sandra was quick to respond and checking in was super easy. 10/10 staying here is a great choice

author: Renz
comments: Great location and Sandra was very responsive! We had a great stay.

author: Donald
comments: Great location and comfortable space. Really enjoyed my stay here.

author: Molly
comments: A great location and very comfortable stay!  Sandra was quick to respond to any questions and gave great recommendations for restaurants.

author: Chelsey
comments: Sandra's place was great, clean and warm. The area is so hip and cool. Loved the loft bed, it was so cute and snuggly. Thank you!!!

author: Ilona
comments: Lily’s place was sparkling clean, in a great location, and had a great view. Highly recommend!

author: Theresa
comments: Great location! Perfect amount of space for 2 people. Check-in was easy. Highly recommend

author: Dave
comments: Amazing place with a great view of the CN tower

author: Kristy
comments: Great location!

author: Jenna
comments: Great view, perfect location, clean and homey!

author: Orlando
comments: Lily's place was excellent! Very nice and clean.  In the perfect location! We were able to walk to the Raptors game, CN Tower, and other fun places near by.  Highly recommend!!

author: Mikayla
comments: The view was fantastic and the location could not have been better!

author: Neil
comments: Amazing location, sparkling clean and excellent amenities. Highly recommended!!

author: Allison
comments: Lily’s Place was perfect: fantastic location, easy communication, lovely touches in the condo. The washer & dryer was absolutely wonderful to have! Lily is a perfect host!

author: Kasha
comments: 10/10 would recommend to anyone. Lily’s place is extremely clean, comfortable, and the location is perfect for any events at the arena or tourist attractions down town! Check in is very easy and navigating around down town from this location is a breeze.

author: Vincenzo
comments: Solid space, right in the heart of Toronto. Thanks Jay!

author: Tal
comments: Very good location! The apartment is good and pretty much the same as shown in the picture. I would recommend to stay there! Thanks

author: Joe
comments: It was no really good experience no internet service the tv I can’t turn on I call several time to the host never answer so unfortunately no good experience are all

author: Ty J.
comments: great location, clean,

author: Stephanie
comments: The condo was just as pictured. Within walking distance to entertainment and restaurants. If you follow the check in instructions, everything will run smoothly.

author: Jake
comments: Great location! Love the place.

author: Todd
comments: Great space, perfect for our family of four to visit Toronto. Within walking distance of the entertainment district and other Toronto must sees. Beds were comfortable, view was beautiful and it was super clean.

author: Faina
comments: Everything you see on the pictures is true.  The apartment is modern with all the necessary amenities.  The check-in was smooth if you follow all the instructions to the dot. We used the parking he offered in the building garage for additional price, which was worth it.  We used Uber/public transportation.  The apartment is centrally located to restaurants, shops, cafes, supermarket, buses, street cars.  You can walk to a lot of attractions, which is great, especially in the evening when it's not so hot. The only thing I would like to note is it might get loud because of the proximity to a busy highway.  Especially at night, when it's not so busy, cars/motorcycles speed up and make a lot of noise.  It did not bother me so much, but my husband woke up at night several times because of it.  We were there with 2 kids, so we used the kitchen to eat breakfast and prepare food to take with us for a long day ahead of us.  The kitchen had all the necessities.  We also used a pool across the street. Overall, good experience.

author: Ajay
comments: We enjoyed our stay in Toronto! The place was clean and looked new. Nice view of the water. Great location! Would recommend to anyone!

author: Rachel
comments: Great location to downtown Toronto! We stayed for a concert at Echo Beach and it was incredibly convenient.

author: Nicole
comments: Rick is a great host! He is not only personable, but he also took the time to provide thoughtful touches in our room and pamphlets that outline all the fun things that Toronto has to offer!

author: Devin
comments: Beautiful and comfortable place. Homey and cozy with a wonderful view.

author: Joshua
comments: The best value I've ever witnessed in an AirBnB. Beautiful amenities. Incredible hospitality. Spotless rooms. Wouldn't have changed a thing about this AirBnB. So impressed.

author: Cherif
comments: Great place to stay , close to downtown , and the host availability is something you can count on

author: Jonathan
comments: Rick has an incredibly nice home and I'll be staying here every time I come to Toronto. The bed, shower, rooftop patio and location of the place far exceeded my expectations and I truly enjoyed staying at his home.

author: Jan
comments: The former review could be used as a public review!

author: Richard
comments: Beautiful place in a great location. Rick is very friendly and kind. We will definitely book again.

author: Cynthia
comments: Rick's place was perfect.  The location was in a fun neighborhood with the bus/trolley stop just around the end of the block.  We had our own private suite/entire floor.  Rick offered wonderful suggestions and made us feel perfectly comfortable.  Would definitely stay there again.

author: Flynn
comments: Space was impeccable, balcony was small but cute and perfect for two people. Lovely place to look at part of the skyline in the evening. Ran into the host a few times, very friendly and eager to share info about the neighborhood if requested. Would definitely recommend this space!

author: Brian
comments: Rick's place is a great place to stay if you're looking for a cute area a little ways away from downtown. It was very clean and Rick was very communicative. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was spacious.

author: Hannah
comments: very nice place!

author: Srujal
comments: Nice & clean place!

author: Ajay
comments: Place was very clean, comfortable and close to everything. Will defiantly stay again if it’s available.

author: Babs
comments: What you see is what you get!

author: Shannon
comments: This place was light and bright as described.  Very clean.  Check in and check out were seamless.

author: Nathan
comments: The ad is accurate and the space is stylish and extremely clean. Above average bed size and comfort compared to many AirBnBs I have stayed in. We barely had any time in Toronto but we got around fairly easily from the location. Communication was good and the check in and out were painless.

author: Trent
comments: The place was pretty clean and was exactly as pictured. Easy location with parking. Good spot for a night.

author: Deborah
comments:
Apartment was clean and as described. It is a good location, convenient to eateries and stores and was very comfortable. But be aware that the floor is unleveled (especially in bedroom area) and it may cause a sense of disorientation or like you are off balance. 
Also this is good for a night or if you don’t really plan on cooking. Very minimal cooking utensils or pots.

author: Melissa
comments: Llona place is exactly what it is described to be in the listing. Very spacious and clean. Llona and her co-host Chamil was also very responsive to all of our questions and needs before and during our stay in Toronto.

author: Daniel
comments: Great area, great price, great host! I enjoyed my week in the air bnb and would book here again in the future!

author: Elizabeth
comments: Brian was very responsive and attentive. He was able to recommend several local places with great food and entertainment. Location is in the heart of Toronto. I would highly recommend staying here, sparkling clean with a great view.

author: Alex
comments:
Brian's place is right downtown, just minutes away from Union station. Super convenient for a night of transit through the city.

The place was clean and comfortable, and Brian made check in painless.

Thanks for a pleasant stay!

author: Ernesto
comments: Brian is an amazing host and his place is perfect!

author: Gail
comments: Everything is great about this place.  It's in a superb location, it's immaculate, the view is spectacular, and the room is comfortable and quiet.  Brian is an outstanding host - friendly and helpful without being intrusive.  I hope to be able to go back and stay in his place again.

author: Amanda
comments: Brian’s place had a beautiful view of the lake, and the room itself was very clean and comfortable. The building is just a 5 min walk from union station, the convention center, and the waterfront. Brian was a great host, and was very friendly and welcoming! I would highly recommend!

author: Tab
comments: A great location! Very close to Union station and Toronto islands.

author: Jennifer
comments:
Brian was an excellent host! 

My husband and I had booked a different Airbnb. That host cancelled on us 2 days before our trip, leaving us with little options available on Labor Day weekend. Luckily Brian’s place was still available and Airbnb was very accommodating by helping us getting in touch with Brian (who was very responsive and polite). Brian’s place was beautiful and clean. He was a very welcoming host. The view outside our window was incredible; we were downtown right in the middle of everything. We would stay there again!

author: Lee
comments: Brian's place is super spacious, clean and provides an incredible balcony view. Exceptionally convenient if you're staying in downtown Toronto as it's walking distance to some of the city's essential attractions. Highly recommended!

author: Felix
comments: Brian is communicative and welcoming. his place is easy to access with beautiful view. would love to stay there again

author: B
comments:
Brian was helpful and attentive. Organizing and accommodating our schedule .

Location is excellent, for downtown and short stay

author: Hope
comments: Clean space, quiet neighborhood within walking distance of everything! I did take Uber/Lyft back every night from my conference instead of walking but mostly because it was dark.

author: Navin
comments: Shirin is an amazing host. Easy to communicate with her before and during. Her place is in a great location. She is very kind, considerate and accommodating. Would definitely stay at her place on my next visit to Toronto.

author: Roger
comments: Shirin is warm and kind!! The place is cozy and in an amazing location, can get anywhere and in a neat neighborhood. Don’t know why you wouldn’t stay here if you are passing through Toronto— great place to stay.

author: Dennis & Christine
comments: Appreciated Shirin's warm hospitality and communication.  Her place was pristine and conveniently within walking distance to transit, St. Lawrence Market and the Distillery District.  I had a car and easily found paid street parking nearby, the area is safe and quiet.  Would recommend my family and friends to stay here!

author: Marian
comments: Second visit in one month.  Beautiful town house with cute bedroom on third floor.  Immaculately clean.  Fantastic value. Thanks again Shirin!

author: Frank
comments: Great price, great location, and great hostess!  If you're travelling by yourself, it's the perfect place to stay while you're in Toronto.  Shirin is a sweetheart and a lovely host!

author: Brian
comments: Great location and always very clean. I've stayed here before and will again!

author: Allison
comments: What a great stay at just the right price!

author: Marian
comments: Shirin is a gracious host.  Thank you.  The room was clean and sunny, and the location worked very well for me.

author: Joshua
comments: Shirin is an absolute sweetheart. The house was always friendly and inviting. If you're coming here to see the city then this is where you should stay. Everything in the city is walking distance.

author: Rebecca
comments: Clean tidy room, stairs to get into the apartment. Walking distance to city hall and other spots.

author: Wenyi
comments: Sarah is such a great host. Her apartment is at a really good location, I basically walked everywhere in downtown Toronto. Check in and check out was super fast. Sarah also offered me lots of good tips on exploring the city. Would come back!

author: Denise
comments: We loved the location of this AirBNB, it is close to many shops, cafes, restaurants, parks and more! We walked and took the local bus everywhere and just parked our car outside the apartment. Street parking was pretty convenient and you pay the meter by the hour. Sarah recommended great food and sites to see while we were in town. She even shared fresh made coffee with us in the am. Chloe, the dog is the best greeter. We hope to visit again! :)

author: Andrew
comments: Great start, no issues. Very nice open and warm flat layout

author: Myron
comments: Very friendly and considerate host! The entire place is stylish and spacious! Location is superb, walk to Queen station in 5min

author: Tim
comments: The host canceled this reservation 52 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

author: Ryan
comments: My stay here was great! Sarah replies quickly and I had no issues with communication. The location was perfect for me. It was close to the locations I was looking forward to. Also there are great places for food within walking distance.

author: Michael
comments: This was a truly lovely experience. The place is wonderful inside, with a very cool private roof deck. We only rented one bedroom, but felt comfortable using the deck and living area, which were very stylish. Sarah herself was very friendly and provided many tips on experiences in Toronto. Thanks for a great stay, Sarah!

author: William
comments: Awesome place. Great location. Clean, quiet, and spacious

author: Leah
comments: Very comfortable bed! Great, clean, and unique space. Easy check in and out.

author: Katie
comments: Wonderful place! Would gladly stay again!!!

author: Nikki
comments: vasily’s condo is in a great location that was close to everything! it was spotless and the directions were very clear and easy to follow! would definitely return!

author: Andrew
comments: Very clean place to stay in a great location. Very courteous host as well.

author: Neria
comments: It was a really beautiful and romantic place to stay. Really love the the sunset view from the room. The room decorations were really neat and cool. Vasily was really nice and details with instructions which made it really easy for us to check in and out. It felt like home for both my boyfriend and I. Will come back again in summer.

author: Alitia
comments: First off Vasily made everything seamless from check in to check out. Communication was great and on time. I really enjoyed saying here. I love the location and view. It was easy to get around once you have a Presto pass (metro card) and everything was within distance. Thank you for making me feel welcome!

author: Sam
comments:
The unit was in a great location and very modern/clean. Vasily was very welcoming and responded quickly
to all messages.

author: Carla
comments: Vasily's home is an absolute gem. From start to finish, the process was very streamlined. and easy to understand. Parking was a major plus. Finding the parking was confusing at first, but we quickly figured it out. Communication was great and the property is as described. The location is without a doubt the best aspect of this listing.

author: Monet
comments: Had everything I needed and were very helpful and catered to any need I had !

author: Ami
comments: This place was great! Very close to all the night life and super comfortable to stay in!

author: May
comments: Vasily made sure that check-in was seamless. I really appreciated his attention to detail in explaining where to park and how things operate in the building. There is a water view from the balcony which is really nice and a sweet dog park in view. It is walkable to downtown however I suggest if you are spending your day at the distillery district. You should rely on ride share apps instead of transportation on foot. Everything was spotless. Vasily was incredibly thoughtful in his communication and made sure I felt welcome.

author: Evan
comments: Great place! Clean and the host was awesome.

author: Nikki
comments: Cute little studio space! It has everything you need for a short time in the outskirts of Downtown Toronto. The bed was incredibly comfortable, there is a mini fridge, microwave, space heater, extra blankets and pillows, and info about Toronto all available. The bathroom was small, but doable and stocked with necessities and such. Michael's communication was great. I would absolutely stay at Michael's again when I'm in Toronto. Great bang for your buck!

author: Christopher
comments: If you want an easy stay in Toronto, this is the place to go! Michael provides all necessary amenities such as glasses, a microwave, toaster oven, fridge, television, trendy furniture, a comfy bed, and to top it off the room is of course spotless! Quick to respond to any inquiries as well !

author: Neel
comments:
Micheal’s basement suite was an amazing place for me to stay! The suite was small, cozy, clean and comfortable. 

I was lucky enough to stay in his suite 2 weeks. With great access to the 501 and 504 street car lines only a 5 min walk away, it was the perfect location in Toronto for the price. I had great access to not only the St. Joe’s west end of Toronto, but downtown as well. 

Micheal went above and beyond as a host. He had great communication and was always available within the day if I needed help. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for an AirBnb in Toronto!!

author: Devin
comments:
Everything was perfect, but be warned, this place is not for tall people. If you’re under 6 foot this place will work beautifully. 

Other than height, the stat was exceptional.

author: Hanna
comments: Sweet place! Great for a quick trip :)

author: Luis
comments: This place is perfectly located, clean and with all the essential for your stay. My wife and I used mostly for sleeping and resting between our exploration around Toronto. It is close to very nice restaurants and shops and with easy access to public transportation and a 10 min ride to the Billy Bishop Airport. It is small if you are very tall, but for us it was not a problem at all.

author: Rebecca
comments: My bf and I stayed here for the night and is was absolutely great! Granted the space isn’t meant for people who are 6’7  (my bf), it was super comfy and homey and we definitely appreciated how easy communication was. Oh and it’s super close to a lot of nearby restaurants and shops, it was perfect. Thanks for everything Michael and Carole! (:

author: Caleb
comments: Great place. Convenient location. Great host.

author: Hailey
comments: A wonderful place to stay if you’re headed to Toronto they were so friendly and helpful. I would stay here again!

author: Connor
comments: We had a great stay at Todd's place! The location was excellent and we greatly enjoyed it.

author: Elan
comments: Clean, quiet space to rest your head.

author: Abby
comments: Todd’s place in Toronto is a great option for people wanting a cheaper place to stay while being so close to downtown. The best part about this apartment is the location! Spadina station is located literally 2 doors down from the house. It’s only about a 15 minute subway ride to the heart of Toronto. The location is also very close to The University of Toronto, and had a very safe feel to it. We had no problem arriving home late at night. The place is very small, so be prepared to feel very squished if there is two of you. Overall, I’d definitely recommend if you want a very basic and cheap place to stay in Toronto.

author: Helen
comments: The location of this place was perfect. Literally steps from a TTC station or a quick 5 minute walk to busier streets for food. The room is definitely no frills--basically only enough room for the bed-- but who's trying to stay in doors anyways? The bed was amazingly comfortable and hard to get out of. There's a heater by the window kind of hidden by the desk that is essential during the colder times of the year, we definitely did not see it after the first night.

author: Sophia
comments: Good place to stay for a weekend or night in Toronto! Todd is helpful and responsive (-:

author: Courtney
comments: Perfect location! The space was great for one person.

author: Julie
comments: Todd's place is well situated and provides the basics for anyone in town for a short period of time.

author: Bethany
comments: Todd's place was very conveniently located just a few blocks from the subway station. It was close to downtown and easy to get around on public transportation. The space is quite small, with the bed taking up most of the floor space, but was comfortable and had everything we needed. We liked that there was a lock box so that we could check in and out on our own schedule. The hosts quickly responded to questions and were well organized. We would definitely stay here again!

author: Justin
comments: This is an outstanding location, just a short walk from some of Toronto’s best restaurants and cafes, and an easy commute to pretty much anywhere else in the city by metro.  Communication is great, and instructions for self check-in are perfect. The unit is on the small side, but has a high ceiling, so it’s cozy without being claustrophobic. I think it’s ideal for short stays, and wouldn’t hesitate to visit again.

author: Brett
comments: Todd and Jackie were very responsive. The place was clean and exactly what I needed. Great location for a great price.

author: Calli
comments: Great location!

author: Wendi
comments: What a gorgeous place to stay! Loved having a whole condo all to myself, the location was perfect, and I can’t overstate the amazing views. The condo was clean and exactly as it looks in the pictures. Just be aware, there is no onsite parking, and the suggested paid parking is 2 blocks away (but not a bad walk) and somewhat pricey. Make yourself at home at Amanda’s, you’ll be glad you did!

author: Liz
comments: Awesome view, cozy and perfect for 2. Everything is walking distance.  No Free parking! Great amenities .

author: Clara
comments: Overall great place - amazing value, nice view, very clean, pool and hot tub were great. Only negative would be that there were no towels or cloths for dish drying in the kitchen, and there was only one spoon.

author: Prachi
comments: Nice place and stylish apartment. Will definitely rebook next time I’m in Toronto.

author: Mohit
comments: It’s a good place to stay! Good view!

author: Lukas
comments: Amanda was quick to answer all questions we had and made the stay great!

author: Kayla
comments: This is a really nice spot for a stay at Toronto. It's conveniently close to everything in the city. The whole process was really smooth; the hosts did a good job on their part, very clear with instructions. Overall, I enjoyed my experience.

author: Dominic
comments: Loved the location. Great views. Solid communicator.

author: Hillary
comments: Amanda's place was exactly what we were looking for.  The location is fantastic and within walking distance of Rogers Center and lots of bars and restaurants.  She was very quick to respond every time we asked a question during booking as well as during our stay.

author: Lindsay
comments: Awesome view!

author: Emory
comments: The place looked great and was in a fantastic location.

author: Jim
comments: Great location, accommodations, communication and value. We would definitely stay at Jhon and Sisi’s again.

author: Colette
comments: A wonderfully located apartment. Only a 10-minute walk from Billy Bishop Airport and close to many venues in the city on foot. The apartment is well appointed and the hosts are amenable. We would definitely stay again if in Toronto.

author: Daniel
comments: Due to problems with a previous location I had to rebook to another place. Sisi and Jhon where able to get me approved and ready to check-in extremely quickly, a big help during a stressful night. The place has wonderful views, a stylish design, and is within walking distance of many nice locations. Great host, great place.

author: Benjamin
comments: Great location and great views!

author: Michelle
comments: Gorgeous space, great location, and the included parking is a huge plus! Thanks again!

author: Hugh
comments: Had a great stay. The view from the place is amazing!  Everything was nice and clean. We would definitely stay again.

author: Thomas
comments: An amazing location and beautiful view of downtown. The rooms were perfect!

author: Kylie
comments: Great location! Cool space. Awesome views! Parking included is a plus!

author: Sherri
comments: Awesome place.   Will stay here again next time I am in toronto.

author: Lori
comments: A beautiful space in a groovy part of Toronto (Wellesley Church Village, I think it’s called.) Comfortable in every way. Highly recommended.

author: Juraj
comments: Everything went great - stylish apartment and sparkling clean place.

author: Daniel
comments: The location is great; the apartment and room were impeccable. I would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a comfortable and reasonably priced stay.

author: Lisa
comments: We spent one night in this beautiful and welcoming home and everything about the stay was absolutely perfect. Bradley was a gracious, friendly host offering local recommendations. He made our stay pleasant and comfortable. Our conversations with Bradley were genuinely a highlight of our trip. And Marley, his pup, is the sweetest! The space is so lovingly and tastefully decorated that we found ourselves taking notes for decorating our own home. The bedroom is comfortable and was ideal for our overnight stay. The shared bathroom is so spacious, organized, and clean. We drove to Toronto and kept our car in the pay lot only a few steps door to door - and thank you to Daniel for the very helpful parking information ahead of time! I cannot say enough positive things about our stay in Toronto - the Christmas activities and culture in the city, the gorgeous home, and the warm and friendly people. We only wish it had been longer than one night. Looking forward to returning soon to explore more of the city and when we do we hope to book Daniel's place again!

author: Amy
comments: We had a great stay! Brad welcomed us with his sweet pup Marley. We had great conversation and he helped us find an incredible restaurant with vegan/glutenfree pizza - virtutous pie (we highly recommend)! The bed was very comfy and the apartment was very stylish and cozy. We drove so we had to pay extra to park in the lot next to the building (as to be expected in the city), but it was worth it! Thanks again, we hope to stay with you again!

author: John
comments: Had a wonderful experience. Room and home were clean and well decorated. Bradley was a lovely host. A great value too.

author: Losalind
comments: Daniel's place was great for a quick layover in Toronto. Close to bars/restaurants. Flight came in later in the evening and they were accomodating in communicating with us to ensure we got checked in. Bedroom was cute and bed was super comfy.

author: Matt
comments: Very nice building and apartment!

author: Nick
comments: Amazing place in a great location! Walking distance from lots of great shopping, restaurants, and bars. The place itself was great, and Brad was a great host as well.

author: McKenzie
comments: Had a great time staying at this place. Very clean and the host was very responsive.

author: Petila
comments: This is a great location!!!! He was a great host!!! Highly recommend! If you’ve never been to Toronto before, Union Station is a huge complex that is completely covered and it’s called The Path, look into that to help familiarize yourself with the area and look into how to use the transit system beforehand and save yourself the learning curve! But great stay, would do it again!!!

author: Natalie
comments: This is a stylish space with a great view of downtown Toronto. Very convenient for any event at the Scotia Bank area or nearby and everything you need is either in the building or nearby. The bed is firm but outside of that it was a lovely stay. For being downtown it wasn’t too noisy either! Host is very easy to communicate with and friendly.

author: Joey
comments: Hope to visit again. Great location right in center downtown!

author: Shakayla
comments: Overall my stay was great very clean and a nice host

author: Leony
comments:
Everything fas fine, Sam was very helpful and courteous, place and its location is by far the best..

Keep in mind that if you need a parking space you’ll need to arrange that ASAP with Sam, and whatever you do, DO NOT PARK UNDERGROUND at longos, they charge me $96 for almost two days... you’ll get no in or out benefits...

author: Megan
comments: Sam was very responsive and accommodating! The condo is so convenient and has a great view! Highly recommend!

author: Robert
comments: Sam was super accommodating and was very responsive before and during our stay. The condo is in a great location and is close by to Union Station and the Scotiabank Arena. The views from the balcony are spectacular! Getting from and to Toronto Pearson International Airport was easy and stress free. This condo was a great value and will consider staying again my next time in Toronto!

author: Alison
comments: Great location and place!

author: Victoria
comments: As ever "Sam" is a great host and very attentive.  Highly recommend this condo and location.
